This is my first fiction and i am loosely basing this on Mage:The Awakening rulebook.  Naturally i am going to change things a bit but i don't intend to make this a novel where the main character goes around changing the whole world. Title: Reincarnation of an Anomaly
Synopsis:
A diary, abandoned on the side of the road, soaked with rainwater.
A lonely man picks it up, and opens it. The first page has a small paragraph scrawled on it.
‘In this diary, there’s a story. To you, who have found it by chance, I offer a challenge. Turn this diary into a novel, written from any perspective you want. I’ve detailed this enough for you, so I ask again. Do you accept my challenge?’
While reading, the man felt the words... echo in his head. He smiled.
“A challenge? Let’s see how much of one it really is. I accept.”
The Diary shined, revealing a book that looked much different than the one before. It looked brand new.
He chuckled, and began to head home to prepare to finish the first challenge he’d had in years.
This is the novel he wrote, The Reincarnation of an Anomaly.

Title: Heroes & Harmony
Synopsis:
The White Knight advanced into the black throne room, flanked by the Blue Sorceress and the Red Archer. The man on the throne, the Black Knight, laughed, a laugh betrayed by a sickly wheeze. “Why have you come here?” His voice was gravel and weak, yet still conquered the silence of the hall. The White Knight lifted his gaze up to the wreck of a man on the throne, but didn’t speak. After the moment passed, and the silence stretched, the Black Knight spoke again, “You wasted your time. I have ruled long, conquered much, but now time conquers me.” It was true. The Black Knight was frail and ancient, a shadow of his youth. Almost, it seemed as if death itself, a pall figure, stood at the Black Knight’s side. “You need not have come.” 
The White Knight strode forward, mere feet from the dias. He paused a moment, struggling for words, before announcing, “You are found guilty. The Light has judged you for your crimes.”
The Black Knight laughed, laughter so hard it turned into a coughing fit. He laughed and laughed anyway, though it seemed his laugh might be enough strain to kill himself.

Title: Frozen Heart
Synopsis:
In this world. 7 races which is humans, fairies, sea creatures, beasts, angels, demons, and divine beings. Only 50% of the population of the seven races except divine beings have magical power. There is six elements, which is fire, water, earth, wind, light and darkness. Humans commonly have fire as their magic, fairies commonly have earth as their magic. Water for sea creatures, wind for beasts, darkness for demons and light for angels. 
While the divine beings can control six elements. The divine beings are the ruler of the world, however when battle suit is created. Only the six races, humans, fairies, sea creatures, beasts, angels and demons can use it. There was a war then after the war ended, a peace treaty was signed. As the battle suit made the six races have equal power against the divine beings. It is very rare, 2% to be exact for the six races have different elements other than their traditional element. However, the six races can only master one element. 
Ranks are very important in this world, the higher rank you are, the more wealthy and powerful you are. You can take the test, with the requirement of being older than 10 years old. If you passed the test, there will be a battle royale. A death match until there is 100 of you left. The people who get killed in the battle royale is resurrected. The 100 people have to do challenges and battles, how much points have are how they are ranked. The top 10 people are really respected.

Title: Rebirth: Rise of the Slave Master
Synopsis:
Synopsis:
Rick Nelson is a man who thought he had conquered the world, that is... Dream World Online, mankind's first and most successful VRMMORPG. His fate changes, however, when those he trusts most turn on him, crippling his chances for future success. Faced with a sudden and tragic death, he is shockingly reborn. Now in the past with a chance to do everything over again, Rick learns an important truth:
Cold or not, revenge must be served!
Willingly embracing the path of darkness, Rick embarks on a journey that will take him beyond the realms of good and evil, right and wrong, and onto his own legendary path... the path of the Slave Master!
So begins the tale of a game-obsessed loner as he is inevitably side-tracked on his road to revenge!
May Also Include: A hopeless attempt at Comedy and stale, tired Romance tropesWarnings: Some Strong Language (PG-13)
 
A thoroughly unoriginal, yet (hopefully) entertaining story that will give you hours of enjoyment!

Title: Warhammer: Dropped Story
Synopsis:
Miyamoto Hisashi, an 18 year old male is an avid fan of the warhammer series, especially the lizardmen. Upon his last breath, his mind is crowded with the thoughts of lizardmen. As his vision darkens, he finds himself in a white room with a glowing white screen in front of him that said, "Soul Character System" with his new body in a fantasy world full of unknown wonders, he lives as a being made for war.

Title: The First Realm
Synopsis: Frank Richland sometimes dreams of being a character in one of the video games he plays or the fantasy stories he reads, but he never expected to be come the leader of his own country and the master of a realm.  Frank is not given a choice by the mysterious system that kidnaps him during a relaxing walk upon one of the many paths around Austin.  The system warns him that other Realm Masters will try to conquer his realm which will kill him.  The only path to survival is to build a strong empire, to become a powerful psion, and to grow as quickly as he can.

Title: A Sage's Different World Logs
Synopsis:
Without any warning signs, I suddenly found myself in a place that's not my room. Looking at my front, left. right, back. up and down, I concluded that I was in a forest. What's more, I wasn't in my own body anymore! Well, I already considered this body to be my second body because of a certain game though. Well, for now that's not the case, Judging from the above descriptions I managed to squeeze out of my dried up brain. I think it's safe to assume that I'm not on Earth anymore.
First is obviously because of the body and the forest. The second one is kinda special. You see, it seems like I can use magic here. Furthermore. the knowledge of what to do and why I can do it is all stoed up in my head. So, don't blame me for thinking that I am no on Earth anymore, okay?
Ahh, also, because of my shut-in nature, I decided to live inside this forest though. I have been a shut-in for one and a half decade already. So meeting up with unknown strangers in an unknown world with an unknown culture and language feels kinda hard. 
No, let me be blunt. I-M-P-O-S-S-I-B-L-E!!!
So cut me some slack on this one. With that said, time to hole up in the middle of a forest!
After a while of immersing myself in magic research, who knew that 3000 years had passed by already.
Nn? You wanna know what I did during those 3000 years? It's simple! I fought against monsters with my magic, did some reasearch on magic and got blown away by my own magic! In short, I was doing some magic stuff!
As for why I'm still alive after 3000 years, don't ask me. I don't know. Maybe, god did something. Anyways, after living for 3000 years on this world, maybe it about time for me to explore the world and see some nice views.

Title: The Greek Apocalypse Volume 1: Sweat, Blood & magic
Synopsis:
Just a hot day a college student that finished his year in college decided to stay a few days before he goes home but it was probably his worst idea. Now he has to fight to survive away from his home that is so close to him but now so far away, teaming up with normal people to survive a not so normal apocalypse by creating a community in Katerini. Is it time to survive the Greek Way?
This is a realistic view to a lit-rpg apocalypse with medieval use of weapons that sees how so many people died to such few survivors and how they straggle to get skills to survive
This is my first book and I don’t expect a positive review but I want reviews to improve it.

Title: SPECTRUM!!!

Title: The guardians of time
Synopsis:
We all have dreams, right? But have you ever had one, so terrifying you wake up screaming? Yes, i bet you have... but if i told you that mine returns several times a year.. what would you say then? 
I never have other dreams... its always the same one, always the same events.. the mystical man with his ring, the german soldiers.. Me almost dying.. And then i wake up.. But it is not a dream.. The ring is real! The events in my dream really happened..
On that faitful day, during some of the hardest battles in World War 2 my family received a ring which automatically named us Guardians of time.

Title: Saga of the Overgod
Synopsis:
A mediocre young man is walking back home after selling from the market. Unexpectedly, He encounters an injured man and then he treats him with the help of his relatives. The man offered him the chance of being a cultivator as a payment for his help.
But in the world of cultivation, dangers are lurking everywhere, fights are inevitable. Cultivators are struggling to find themselves a way to get even more stronger. 
How will he survive in this merciless, violent and irrational world where conflicts always arose and strenght rules the world. With his passion, dedication and also his capable mind he will try to dominate other beings and reach the place where gods resided.
 
Editor: afanficaddict

Title: Proficient
Synopsis:
He stood at the apex of humanity and looked down upon it all. He had challenged everything humanity had to offer and came out on top. He grew cocky, and unsatisfied, thought himself unbeatable. Long story short, he challenged the gods and lost. 
Before he perished he, like many others before him, abandoned his body, attempting to reincarnate in a different one. He planned to bide his time,regain his lost power, and get his revenge. Long story short again, they followed his soul to his new body, sealed his memories, and banished him to a dimension outside of time. I mean what kind of gods would they be if they couldn't find one measly soul. 
 
This is the story of Hal, his escape, and his journey to find meaning in his life.
I'm going to apologize now for the sporadic updates, because it's gonna happen. This is going to be my first story, and I'm still trying to get the hang of this whole writing thing. I'd really appreciate any and all encouragement, errors you find, and suggestions to make the story better.

Title: The Combat Crafter
Synopsis:
Far into the future, humanity has finally found world peace under one single conglomerate of nations.
During the midst of this great peace, virtual reality technology was finally made a reality. With it's introduction and enhancements into time dilation, many begin finishing their formal education by age 10 and often live on their own by age 16.
Many now work from home with the help of VR technology, finishing month's worth of work in a single day’s time.
One such stay at home office workers, Vance, play a new genre of games in his free time, VRMMORPGs.
With the now critically acclaimed Eternal Legend Online drawing his attention he decides to take a break from his usual games and try it.
 

All credit for the for the cover of the story goes to the clip art site I found it on, here’s the link:

Title: Odyssey of the Unrivalled
Synopsis:
What do you do when you have it all? When you can do anything, go anwhere, know anything with less effort than stretching your fingers? When you feel jealous of any passer-by, just because they have something to do, somewhere to be?
The answer was simple to him: erase your memories, seal your power and live a normal life.
Still, something felt wrong. It just didn't feel... fulfilling.
But then a magical formation appears in his office, and he and his co-workers get catapulted into another world.
 
Profanity will be kept to a minimum, but will be included to keep realism. There will be some gore, vegans and animal activists alike beware. Will include some comedy, some meaningful conversation (I hope) and some things you will (hopefully) never expect in this genre. Hopefully quality will increase as it goes on.
No schedule for chapters, but they will keep coming. Feedback welcome.
View my other story at https://royalroadl.com/fiction/13168/fork-this-life

Some names may have been taken from real life but everything else is fiction.
Ratings and comments would be appreciated.
I put the drama tag but i'm not sure if I actually manage that. 
Cover pic found via pintrest. If the owner of the art wants it removed, please contact me.

Title: Even Monsters Pray
Synopsis:
"Sora.
"Not the master of conjuration. Not the finest summoner to walk the halls of this old Academy of Magic. Just Sora.
"You know of me, if you know much of anything. But there's more to me than the official story in the textbooks. All of that is just the grand details. That's not the story.
"I've made mistakes. I've held secrets. I've done impossible things. Good things. Terrible things.
"I'll not die before I've said my piece. With aching bones and a heavy heart, I fear that now the time is right for my confession."
This story is about 13k words. It's a short story, and deals with dark content. Please be advised that this story is not suitable for children at all.
Trigger warnings: Non-graphic rape; child death.
A new cover is currently being commissioned. I'll update it as soon as it exists! :D

Title: Ravana

If the scriptures of the ancient times are to be read, people find devas also known as gods and Rakshas also known as devils fighting against each other since time eternal. This is the story of a devil created a legend that still rings to this day. This is a story of a rakshas that paved a way towards the heavens. This is the story of a king who revolutionized the living of his people. This is the story of a brother who fought the world for the tears of his sister. This is a story of the Ashur who rose to the skies and shook the heaven and earth with his rage. This is the story of a simple man who fought to create his own legacy.
This is the story of Ravana.

Title: Demonic Inscriptor
Synopsis: A young man stumbles upon a demonsional pocket whilst exploring the world and becomes trapped, with no other choice he cultivates a powerful technique and smashes through the demonsional space only to find a significant amount of time has past and the world has become more dangerous than he once knew.

Title: Dryad
Synopsis:
She was born next to a golden tree, in a cavern where the her forefathers once lived. It was a place where the grass was soft, the trees glowing in gold and silver, where food was plenty.
The wolves told her, "The outside world is dangerous," the birds chirped, "The things outside are unfriendly," the grass whispered, "How can we protect you if you leave?"
And for a long time, she stayed behind.
She trusts her companions, those that took care of her since she was born. However, she just believed that there must be more outside, instead of the ruins and rocks that the creatures had said. The place where her forefathers had left for and never came back, all those years and years ago.
The beasts whined, "Please do not leave us. The world is too dangerous,"
With a sigh, she turned her back to the tell-tale glow of the exit again and padded back to the tree.
She swore to herself — one of these days she'll leave the confines of this cavern, and to truly discover the world.

Title: Camelot Overthrown
Synopsis:
Christendom is threatened by the minions of the evil one and King Arthur, king of the Britons, calls out for brave knights to come and defend Holy Mother Church. Come into the latest virtual reality fantasy role playing by Miskatonic Games and become a stalwart paladin upholding the laws of chivalry and defending the weak from the machinations of monsters, or a wicked necromancer raising the dead and preying on the unfortunate.
The choice is yours!  See you in Camelot!

Title: Dungeon of the Dead [hiatus]
Synopsis:
The dungeons in this realm usually do not develop truely sentient personalities until much later on in their life. As such they are unable to generate the power the Dungeon God needs to function. Plus when they do develop their personalities, they are usually sociopathic killing machines because...well...their dungeons. Because of this the Dungeon God isn't doing so hot, and in a latch ditch attempt to preserve his Godhood he creates one final dungeon that will have a personality immediately.
Unfortunately this particular dungeons seems to be just a little.....incredibly stupid. Due to the dungeon not paying attention during its earliest moments it ends up being a dungeon of the undead. This dungeon is the Dungeons Gods last chance and if it fails he will be stripped of his power by the other deitys and his creations will be exterminated. As the sentient races throughout the land despise undead and seek to destroy them where possible, this could well mean the extinction of the dungeon race...

Title: Jatendra's Saga
Synopsis: A man laid down on a large ornate bed, his large body supported by a mattress containing feathers from a thousand of the finest geese.  There was a time when his bed was the ground, his blanket whatever clothes he happened to be wearing.  He laughed at the thought, a dry weezing sound, lacking the vigour and volume of his youth.  He looked around at the faces surrounding him. Wives, sons, brothers, sisters, friends, scribes. All here to hear the final words of their dying sovereign. To hear the true story, not the legend or the myth, but the autobiography of Jatendra, one of the greatest conquerors the world had ever known. The man opened his mouth, and the story began thus:

Title: Earth's First Dungeon
Synopsis:
Reginald Montgomery was a high class Rules Lawyer, specializing in the 'art' of Min-Maxing a Character.  He had been the secret behind the ability of the Guild 'Eternal Gamer' being able to obtain the World First Clears of various MMOs for the last five years.  The political entities of the world had hidden the imminent approach of a gigantic meteor, of similar size to the one that theoretically wiped out the dinosaurs, until it was able to be spotted by high powered astronomical telescopes.
The United Nations sends nukes into a crater located deep on the meteor, breaking it into millions of smaller fragments, except for around two areas, where there was a building that looked like an old school Roman temple and one where there was a giant metallic cube.  The cube crashed into Reginald's backyard, and his 'gamer' senses were itching at the chance of supremely valuable loot.
Upon investigating, he is injected with a control crystal for a 'Construction Core', but when it releases an extremely high density of pressurized mana, his body seizes up and the Core draws his mind into it before merging the control crystal back into the Core and retreating into the Cube and digging itself deeper.
Two months later, Reginald becomes aware again, only to find out that nothing is as it was and he is now the Earth's First Dungeon...

Title: The departed worlds
Synopsis:
On earth there lies a man who was known as the greatest genius of the world, he comprehended basic math and linguistic skills at one and moved on to advanced therioes and application in all main categories being math, science, language, history ect. At 12 he graduated from the most prestigious school with doctorial degrees in multiple areas. A couple of years later he invented technology which broke the minds of the old scientist who lead the way at the forefront of science and technology. But then all of a sudden he dissapeard, some say he died from a jealous attacker, some say he broke through the limitaions on space exploration and started exploring. But, no one had guessed hes living as a hobo underneath a bridge passing his days inside his mind and begging for money.
The once smartest man who could have gotten any country to do anything to have him:zero. The man self deemed zero lived life doing nothinh because there is no challenge but this all changed when half the world turned to zombies and the rest teleported to an area later known as the starting world.
What will become of this man named zero?

Title: My Second Time in this Terror-Stricken World
Synopsis:
Until this day, calamities of various magnitudes have threatened mankinds' population...
That doesn't amount to the one that humanity is currently facing...
Now with social order collaping, would Humanity be able to continue?
...
Author here! This is my first web novel I have ever written, please be gentle with me! Thank you! ^~.~^
Ummm, and the cover isn't mine! if the artist wants me to take it off then notify me!

Title: Mortal
Synopsis:
Mortality.
That which we are and that we struggle to overcome.
Mortality molds us, makes us who we are.
From courage to cowardice, it effects all our actions.
And hence some try to escape its grasp, to be free of chains.
Our tale follows such people forgetting which they'll remain.
 

 
Chapter updates around once every 2 days

Title: Tale Of A Warrior: The Wicked Beginnings
Synopsis: Bear witness to the birth of a famous warrior named Aes Flameborn. Born of a union between the hated dark elves and the enemy to life itself, one of the Fallen. Watch his rise and watch his struggle. Listen as he tells a tale of his aventure and the the wretchedness of the path he was forced to walk.

Title: Short stories
Synopsis: The sole purpose of this book is to train my writing.

Title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls When You're Disguising as a Girl?
Synopsis: Mashiro has a girly name, girly personality, girly body, but he actually is a boy.  Many boys at his school have asked him out knowing he's a boy. Girls are jealous of his soft skin and pretty face. Because of his girl personality and body, he has no real friends. When school ends and summer begins, he's relieved that he has a break from school. Suddenly, a demon interrupts his rest and offers him a contract that can change his life. If he disguises himself as a girl, he can once again live with his long lost sister that he has been searching for his whole life. Demons sole purpose is to be entertained. To this demon, this is entertaining. His mission is to disguise himself as a girl even though he's a boy. If he in any way reveals that he is a boy to his sister or her friends, then he will die a most painful death. What is his decision? If he disguises himself as a girl, what problems will he face?

Title: The World Where I Truly Belong
Synopsis: Story about a girl going through an existential crisis. Things escalate and it turns into much more.

Title: Prison of Killing and Judgement
Synopsis: A group of 30 teens find themselves locked away in an unknown place, known by the wardens as Judgement. The 30 teens will live in a place where no wind or light of the outside world would reach. The only way out? To commit a perfect murder. If found guilty, the murderer will suffer an execution, if the guilty party is wronged, everyone else besides the murderer faces execution. The survivors will be allowed free once the numbers reaches a bare minimum. Can they keep their calm and survive? Or will they fall into despair?

Title: Balthazar, a case study
Synopsis: A chronicle of seemingly unrelated events revolving around an enchanted granite statue and its owner, Dracula.

Title: Gods' Game
Synopsis:
A man lived the life of a drug addict. Lying and stealing was the name of his game till a blow out of his trucks tire led him into a head on collision with a pole. Death to blood loss this young man is transfered into a new world. Only told his god's domains he is sent into this world with no knowledge or money, now he must make his way through this world. His only option is life or death and if life is what is chosen what branch will he follow: survival, Common life simillar to his previous life, or will he strive to thrive in his new world?
 
LITRPG elements may come later and maybe some romance, but in the beggining I plan to only have minor flirting appear.

Title: The Raven Effect
Synopsis:
As childhood friends re-connect and fall in love, all that they know about their lives and those in it, is about to change.
Family secrets long forgotten are unearthed... Murder for Hire, Kidnapping, Devestation...
The past is in the past... The present is surrounded by danger... There may be no future...

Title: Blunt Knives
Synopsis: "After more than a decade of fighting the forces of the Northern-Alvarir Kingdom, we are victorious! The nightmare has ended and an era of change has come!" - The people......And it did change, only not for the better.The king promised prosperity and peace in exchange for the live of those Northern traitors after the war. Instead, we received years of stagnation and decay. The disparity between rich and poor grew ever wider as corruption spread. Without the looming threat of war and chaos, the king and his nobles drown in their spoils and riches, ignoring the plight of us commonfolk. Faced with debt, starvation and disease, our only choice is to rebel against the kingdom that once protected us. Our king should have saved us from ruin. But now, who shall save us against the demon that is our king?

Title: Shan Yan
Synopsis:
A young monkey lords over a mountain called Yan, on the province of Shan where it underwent many struggles to achieve its current position. It defends it's mountain with pride until one day, a hawk beast from a mountain across the valley invades after transcending from mortality and overthrows the monkey.
Heavily wounded the monkey flees into a forest filled with similar creatures but manages to hide in a crevice. Inside the crevice is a stroke of fortune so immense that it changes the monkey's future forever, allowing it to reach heights it would never have imagined...

Title: Monster Inside
Synopsis:
Three days ago I was human. Three days ago I didn't kill for need. Three days ago I wasn't... I wasn't a Monster.
 
My name is Holden Rays; I'm a Class 3 Monster Hunter. Or at least, I was. I now am a Monster, running from the ones who were once my friends, my family. I live on the run, trying to find a safe place with those I used to hunt. I don't know how much longer I can live like this, sleeping with rats during the day and killing innocents for food in the night. Why am I telling you this? Because you might be the only one who believes me.

Title: Take my heart
Synopsis:
This is the 2nd book in the Murderous love series if you haven't read the first book I suggest doing that.
-------
Zeke Guerrero disappears for two months without a trace, when he returns will Lindsey welcome him back in her life or shut him out completely and whos the new detective in town and why is he opening up his mother's murder case once again.

Title: Twenty Two Cards
Synopsis: There are twenty two cards in the mystical roe deck, each one a different omen. A person is chosen for each sign, to represent what the sign is, and could be. The person chosen is treated as an equal to kings and queens, but what happens when the chosen person isn't a person at all?

Title: Glass Girl
Synopsis: A girl given a second chance decides to spread her little bit of luck onto the bored god who gave it to her. Now in another world in a body of a fourteen year old, she travels her new world with her 'grandfather' trying not to make everyone fall for her new looks and timid personality

Title: Skeptic Loyalties
Synopsis:
Loyalties
Where do they lie?
With your loved ones
With your leaders
perhaps your friends
Maybe yourself doesn't matter, sit and listen.
A story of trust, betrayal and lies. 

This is just a past time so don't expect too much.

Title: The story of an protagonist
Synopsis:
My first story, I will not promise an uploading schedule, this is sort of a side project in life for me. Updates will be sporadic
The story of a overpowered MC who shapes the world around him by his chaotic and attacking everyone.  What could possibly go wrong?
not to dissapoint there will not be much of a plot

Title: [Esmé] Fallen Zeal
Synopsis: This book is currently undergoing heavy rewrites after a 4-year hiatus.

Title: A Jump Into Fantasy
Synopsis:
The group of four chose to leave behind their world. Tired of the mundane, they jumped at the chance to experience the magical. Now, displaced in a world unlike their own, they’ll have to forge their own path through the unknown.
Yet, some higher power has called them here. Somebody offered them this chance. Somebody chose them. 
Perhaps one day, they’ll find out. I guess it can wait until they figure out just what they need to be doing, right?

Title: Echoes of Shadow
Synopsis:
A thousand years ago the Godstone was destroyed and a cataclysm brought an end to magic. 
Now magic has returned to the world, and with it the shadow from the past. The demi-god who once tried to unite the Godstone has returned to finish the deed. 
In the northern kingdom of the Engrall, teenage Kai loses his parents during a brutal attack on his village. Only the timely appearance of Tirrin saves him. Kai struggles to find his new place in the world while plagued with nightmares of the past. 
In the south, gunslinger Dobrius loses his mother and learns of his destiny. He embarks on a journey with the legendary Poepa to stop the evil demi-god from obtaining the Godstone. 
The teenage assassin Eriyana, carrying out the dark will of her father, embarks on a journey to integrate herself into a group of heroes with the intent of betraying them. But she is not prepared for the change they will make in her.

Title: Gods, Kings, Beggars and Filthy rivers.
Synopsis:
In a magical world were mychical creatures roam and humanity is not the only sentient species, we follow Ilaayachee an orphan boy and his life where not everything is sunshine and rainbows.
My first story, would love feedback as i would like to grow as a writer.
The story takes a lot from Hindu mythology and other pantheons, however I have never been to india so alot of stuff will not be correct. Hope you enjoy :D

Title: I'm Raising A Chuunibyou Dragon Girl?!
Synopsis: I'm Raising A Chuunibyou Dragon Girl?! Chuunibyou is a word for "8th Grade Syndrome" This 'syndrome' is the reason that Eminori Kanae is 'a dragon'!? As you read this weird story, you'll meet several deluded and odd humans?! You'll also get the to see me, Shiro Sukuri, and my struggles with raising a dragon girl and more misfit oddballs?!

Title: HELL IS A VRMMO!!!???
Synopsis:
Our main character Lucius Blackwood was a developer for the hit game Alkareth: The New Beginning, the first VRMMO out... or he would've been, if it wasn't in "development hell" with constant budget cuts and the oncoming pressure of the nefarious villain! The Deadline! *DUN DUN DUN*... Our main character dies, in a ridiculous fashion and... welp, he's in hell and his punishment is... going into his VRMMO, Alkareth: The New Beginning...
 
(Sorry, I SUCK at describing stuff -_-)

Title: Prehistoric Barbarian
Synopsis:
The future became a peaceful utopia in the Core Regions. No crime, no wars, no conflicts, even rude behavior is rare.
People became complacent and lazy.
The main character isn’t a hero or a typical protagonist. Calling him an… opportunist would be the least offensive probably. In this age, he’s sticking out like a sore thumb.
Who would notice a few shady happenings when crime is a foreign concept and there is nobody to catch you?
*Book 1 - Done.*

Title: Emotionless Pain
Synopsis: From the moment he was born, he was different. This difference scared others as he was thought to be a freak or a retard. But, not known to him or others there was something incredible hidden within him that allows his body to change. Follow Shawn as he walks the path that changes his life.

Title: I'm No Hero
Synopsis:
My name's Adrian.  Simple, easy to remember, right?  I'd agree, but it's just that a lot of the people I meet always get it mixed up with the darndest things, like "Parasite," "Trash," or something having to do with profanity.  Not that I'm dissing profanity, I use it just as much as the next guy, maybe a little more. 
The ones who usually do this are the Superhumans, specifically the Heroes.  Now, again, I'm not dissing the Heroes.  They provide a necessary service in this day and age where just about every type of crime has a Super at the center, Villains, essentially. 
Who am I?  Well, the short version, again, is Adrian.  This here is the long version

Any use of copywrited names, like Superman, Captain America, or the like, are simply meant as references, repurposed as charcter names for  and at the very most parodies.  I don't claim to own them, and I'm not trying to pass this off as one of your stories, so please, please don't sue me.

Title: The Accidental Archmage - BOOK 9 (THE DRAGON HOUSES)
Synopsis:
The Accidental Archmage Series (BETA CHAPTERS)
 
NOTE: DRAFTS OF EARLIER BOOKS (BOOKS 1 to 8) HAVE BEEN POSTED BEFORE ON RRL. THEY ARE NOW ON AMAZON AND HAD ATTAINED BESTSELLER STATUS IN THE FANTASY-MYTHOLOGY GENRE.
ACTUALLY, MANY RRL STORIES PUBLISHED ON AMAZON HAVE GONE ON TO BECOME BESTSELLERS AT ONE TIME OR ANOTHER. HOWEVER, AMAZON KDP RULES REQUIRE THAT MOST OF THE DIGITAL CONTENT AVAILABLE ELSEWHERE BE REMOVED.
 
GENRE: CLASSICAL EPIC FANTASY
An epic mythological fantasy in another world. 
Immerse yourself in a grand and dangerous adventure. In a world both familiar and strange.
A world where magic and gods still exist. Meet deities, beings, and exiles from Earth’s pantheons. Encounter warriors, huskarls, satyrs, hoplites, dark and evil mages, and strange beings from myths of pre-history up to the age of iron.Match wits with the likes of Loki, Zeus, Athena, Odin, Amun-Ra, Coniraya, Viracocha, and even Dionysus. Escape plots and schemes played by powerful gods of life and death.Find the truth behind the dark and otherworldly beings from the Lovecraft mythos.Play with dire wolves, drakontes, lamias, keres, amphisbaenae, a sphinx, ice giants, creatures of nightmares, empusas, gigas, minotaurs, vrykolakas, jotnar, dokkalfr, to name a few.Survive being in the middle of wars between civilizations and races. Suffer the arrogance and stupidity of gods and men alike. Cross paths with beings who don’t like you. Thor, Ares, and the Incan death god Supay, to name three.Be burdened with a quest to save yourself and your humanity in the brutal and primordial world of Adar.A world where scientific pursuit will get you a lightning bolt or two. Probably five. All at the same time.


Book Nine - THE DRAGON HOUSES
His beloved Eira rescued, the rogue Titans have been defeated, and Tartarus sealed. Yet as the rising Archmage tries to escape the Forbidden Isle, events have been set in motion that would embroil him once again in the tides of war engulfing Adar. Escaped Titans, a rising power in the South, vengeful adherents of the Elder Gods, and more have him in mind. Least of all, a far from defeated Loki.
New players have come to the fore, each with their own purpose in mind. The lustful drive for power, the search for a release of one's soul, and the companions' storied pasts all come to drive the world deeper and further into chaos. Add a powerful demon determined to open a portal to its own dimension.
It's enough to drive a mortal man mad.

(Cover image used under license)


Book Eight - WHERE TITANS WALK
Now in the land of the damned below the underworld domain of Hades, Eira awaits the company and battle portends. But first, they have to find the fortress of the Titans. Above them, Loki's war is going well as the internecine war among the pantheons continues.
An old foe rises in the south, more powerful than ever. Astrid finds herself the subject of a wife's rage and the murky past of the companions now comes back to haunt them. Yet amidst it all, a dying Elder won't wait as plots and new players bedevil Havard Ulriksson, formerly Tyler West of Earth, now the Archmage of his adopted world.

Cover Image used under license from shutterstock.com. Alterations by the writer.

 
Book Seven - DRAGONS AND DEMONS
https://www.royalroad.com/amazon/B08122Y739

An urgent rescue and the path to vengeance are not easy in a magical, myth-filled world. Nasty roadblocks and unexpected complications have a way of rearing their wicked heads along Tyler's route across the dwarven lands and into the infernal realm of Tartarus. More myths and legends cross the First Mage's path as Loki's war and Asag's emergence stir up mortal lands and magical domains.
Cover Image used under license from shutterstock.com. Alterations by the writer.

 
Book Six - TARTARUS BECKONS
Gifts, curses, and problems.
The unfolding of Loki's mad and complicated scheme results in a war between and among pantheons, empires, and kingdoms. From Ymir's Domain down to the far south, conflict engulfs Tyler's world and the magical gate to Tartarus is starting to break open, threatening to add mad Titans and other powerful beings to the chaotic mix. And on the forbidden isle of Banna, a dying enemy awaits.
 
(Note: NOW PUBLISHED ON AMAZON)
 

 
Book Five - LOKI'S GAMBIT
With the promise of the First Mage not to act against him, Loki now accelerates his plans. A plot millennia in the making, spanning the length and breadth of Adar. Like a spider spinning its web, the trickster god now puts the finishing touches on an audacious scheme. A revolution to change the balance of godly and mortal power in the world.
 

 
Book Four - VOID LANDS
The Void Lands. A place where gods fear to tread. Where strange creatures and hostile beings emerge. A nexus of dimensions, the origins of which are lost in the mists of time.
To stop the Aztecha Empire’s march to power and domination of the eastern lands, Tyler West, now a High Mage, must confront and defeat the empire’s mysterious patrons. Beings of incredible might and magical knowledge. An imperative path which leads him right to the Void Lands. Though a few detours are required, each dangerous yet crucial.
The only problem is that the Void Lands are on the other side of the continent. And to get there, he may have to ask a favor from the Trickster God himself, the Norse deity known as Loki.
 

 
Book Three - BLOOD WARS
Continuing our lost mage's epic journey through the magical and extremely dangerous world of Adar.
Escaping the convoluted schemes of the Greek pantheon, Tyler finds himself with an old acquaintance, the Incan deity Viracocha.  His son, the sun god Inti, is dead. With the Aztecah Empire and its powerful pantheon of deities on the bloody road to more conquests, the deity asks for his help. A request he could easily refuse.
Except Viracocha is not alone is asking for his aid. Two other pantheons have made their presence known to the young mage. And the Egyptian deities are watching how he will decide the matter. To add to his burdened conscience, the rise and dominance of the Aztecah pantheon would mean a million or more new human sacrifices. Resulting in extremely overpowered bloodthirsty deities.
What's a newly minted Elder apprentice mage to do? Involve himself in a blood war?
 

 
Book Two - GIFTS OF THE GREEKS
Tyler's journey continues. New land, misadventures, friends, foes, skills, and knowledge. Confused encounters of the female kind.
More deities become aware of Tyler as he continues his quest to survive, reach his potential, and carry out his burden.
Amid convoluted plans designed by divine acquaintances of old and newly met gods, what's an ordinary guy from Earth to do?The god of wine wants to be his friend. Ares and his sons are coming to say hello.
 

 
Book One - RAGNAROK RISING
What if you fell through a crack in reality? Like those people disappearing in plain sight you've read about.
What if you find yourself in a strangely familiar world? A world full of Earth’s mythological beings, lost civilizations, and people from its primitive and brutal past? Where magical energy still exists. Where gods play games among themselves, with the fate of mortal men as pawns. A land where a sword is deadlier than a five-inch thick contract drawn by a hotshot lawyer. Would you survive?
That's Tyler West. Alone, lost and bewildered, the three moons in the sky made it clear he wasn’t on Earth anymore. It’s not a game. It’s real. And there's no coffee, pizza, fries, or his favorite show on HBO.
 
***

Title: Extra Lucky
Synopsis: A God bored of his job decides to spice things up a bit and sends a blessing to the world.

Title: Outrider
Synopsis:
I won't waste your time so I'll let you know what this story won't be. It's not a LitRPG, not a Wuxia or Xianxia, not an attempt at writing a Japanese light novel type story. Now onto what it won't have. There will be no hero transported or reborn in another world, no status screens of any kind, no overpowered MC, no rushed plot to get straight to the action, no extreme sexualization of underage girls, the MC won't recieve a harem, and no guarantees of a happy ending.
Now that 95% of the readers on this site are no longer interested in this story here's the synopsis:
This will be a low fantasy coming of age story about a young boy that learns about life, loss, love, regret, success, and defeat. These experiences will shape him into a man who brings about change to the world around him both great and small.

Title: Ascended Angels
Synopsis:
Disclaimer
THIS STORY IS ON HIATUS UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE. A LOT OF WORK NEEDS TO BE DONE.
Please note that this is my first story I have posted online. It's still a work in progress and I may go back and edit some earlier from time to time. I'll be sticking to about two - three chapters a month right now. I like to have it to be somewhat in decent shape read by a few friends (hopefully!) before I put it up. Feedback is welcome!
Summary
Angels mysteriously arrived into the world of Topear decades ago and the world has been turned upside down. They say they are protecting the humans from demons. A few humans are selected to be transformed into angels and some are chosen to be trained in magic. Most humans though are now considered second-class citizens. Is this truly a better world and are the humans really being protected? This is the story of the journey of three people, two humans and an angel, as they seek to uncover the truths of what they have been told.

Title: Boring life X Exciting death
Synopsis:
Minowa Katsuragi a 26 year old office worker, bored of his life and dead end job decides to leave this world for good, only to be transported to another one, but this world is far different than ours.

Title: I Stole Zeus's Computer!
Synopsis:
After Tartarus was destroyed, Zeus creates a computer that could grant an infinite amount of wishes. But Hera snatches his computer and accidentally drops it into the human world. The computer ends up in Jinpachi's hands. Instead of ruling the world or taking over Zeus's throne, he uses it to spur all kinds of drama at his school and home.

Synopsis: A young boy's life ruined by a woman named Amanda Walters.

Title: God's System
Synopsis:
Hey guys Perdere666 here! m(-_-)m
Anyway, this is a new story from me. This idea came about when I was reading IRAS, Omni-Genius, hacker, Urban Legend and other similar genre. And I thought, wow, I like to write something like that and so here it is...

Daniel Flores died and was almost virtually revived by his lover/fiancee who turned out to be an evil mad scientist from a huge terrorist group.
