Title: Colour comes from white
Synopsis: She cries, the sky cries tears of rain with,She smiles, the sun smiles back,She hates, the storm lashes out,She fights, lightning strikes for her,She hides, the mist provides the cover,She dreams, the cloud brings her back.This girl cries, smiled, hates, fights, hides, and dreams in this story.from the blue of rain, yellow of sun, red of storm, the green of lightning, the purple of mist, the pink of cloud, these colours all come from her, Cielo Sawada sister of Tsunayoshi Sawada, the vongola's tenth, or is he?

Title: Our World Was Saved by a MMORPG
Synopsis:
The Earth was invaded by extraterrestrials called Gaim. They use the technologies that far more advanced that the mankind but thanked to a MMORPG, the world was saved because the Gaim wanted to create the world just like that game.
A hundred years after that incident, the world is now in piece.
Yukizome Shiori, the protagonist, is a normal high school girl who has to live through this life. One day she took an exam revealed that she is actually a descendant of famous person. Now she must attend the course of specialty. What awaits her there?

Title: Treasury of the gods in a different world
Synopsis:
Spoiler: Spoiler


 Tatsumaki Yuto died twice, only to be reincarnated into a fantasy world. But in order to survive, he must first unlock the trasures of the gods. What will become of our hero as he struggles to defeat one goblin?

Title: A Whisper Among the Stars (Revised)
Synopsis:
The Sol bloodline spent years evading the watchful eye of The Confederacies hunters. They fought a losing war from backwater planets and obscure star systems for as long as Hadrian could remember, but no longer. The adamantine serpent returned to the galaxy after millions of years roaming the reaches of deep space. The time had finally come to gather the ancient families and wage war. December 12, 2197, the day the mystical art of cultivation was banned, replaced by The Confederacies own artificial abomination. The day the Sol family name went from the most powerful on earth, possibly the most powerful in the solar system, to being no more than a whisper. Sol became a name revered as legendary, but spoken in secret. A whisper among the stars. Any known affiliate was marked for death, but only after being tortured by the most twisted men among The Confederacies ranks. The Alchemists.
*** Aliviana Drogo was a renegade hunter of the highest rank, regarded as a legend among some of the most fearsome warriors to ever live. Born in the bowls of Valdaria itself. The atrocities she witnessed there went on to change her fate forever. Be it a coincidence or perhaps destiny itself. Aliviana’s fate became entwined with that of Hadrian Sol, the phantom. *** A renegade with no family, no friends and no direction. A drifter, with no home and a family scattered among the stars. 
They share one singular goal. Destroy The Confederacy. When one dynasty falls another must rise.  This is their story, their legacy.A whisper among the stars.

Title: Five Squared
Synopsis:
There exists an ancient organisation that changes leaders every few years. In our day and age, a pair of brothers find themeslves suddenly thrown into an unfamiliar responsibility as they are chosen to protect alien species and preserve interplanetary harmony amidst interspecific politics, superhuman abilities and some severe culture shock. Alongside three other leaders and the diverse members of the organisation, they will come to realise that the peace they keep is one full of underlying flaws and conspiracies. 
Join them in their struggle as they fight to protect the lives of others whilst fending for themselves. As they uncover deep, dark secrets that are better off left unknown, they shall be haunted by an inescapable past that threatens to bring the present to its knees.
=====
Please review, favourite and follow if you like what you see! I update the story once every few days but it mostly depends on how much time I manage to put into writing and self-editing.

Title: Deviant
Synopsis: The world has become a shell of what it once was. Civilization is a thing of the past. Humans are scarce now. Deviants, people who can control elements, are far and few between. Now, the Earth is plagued with Wraiths and Cryptids, but in this post-apocalyptic world, is there truly no hope?

Title: Cripple's Swordplay
Synopsis:
In an ancient kingdom of El Gladio, all young men and women are given a chance to rise up in the world; from a farmer's field to the king's bodyguard, all through one mean; a sword.
 A sword is what favors them; it is what unites them. Any who knew swordplay are fit to take up duties of a soldier. Any who mastered swordplay have their name spread far and wide, unsheathing their blade for the nobles, or even the royals. And any who- through a path of hardship and dedication- completely dominates the realm of swordplay, reaches the apex of legends.
 But not all are equal... or at least that's what the world had decided for a certain young man, whose dream and ambition surpassed many others- yet are forced to wield those hopes with only a single arm.

Title: Last Ritualist
Synopsis: A necromancer can sumon the undead. A summoner can bring forth demons. A druid can creat creatures of nature. But all these things are only temperary and will soon disapear once there contract is voided. But the same creatures can be brought forth by a ritualist. Fallow Septimus Kelin the last ritualist as he tries to survive with a hungry grimmour

Title: Alice The Roaming Dungeon (Relaunch in progress.)
Synopsis:
Please note this story is being edited and rewritten. The only new chapters that will be uploaded here will be progress updates. A link to the new fiction page will be posted when the relaunch has started.

The Earth is dying. First came the mana, then the dungeons, and finally the monsters. Conventional weapons proved useless, and slowly, humanity was pushed to the edge of extinction. But humanity quickly realized the power mana held and strived to master it.
As the situation stabilized, humans looked for new ways to reclaim their lost territory. Out of this drive Alice, a homunculus was born from the power of the Dungeon Cores. Being the first of her kind, she was subjected to experiments and training that left her beaten and broken. But the gods may have a use for a broken tool of humanity.
Warning- This is not a pure dungeon story. It is mostly a side piece, and most of the story takes place outside the dungeon. That being said there is still dungeon building mixed in.
 

Hi everyone this my first story and hope you all in enjoy.
All credit for the cover goes to the original creator here's the link http://bytebeat.net/va-medical-clinic-peoria-il/

Title: World Creation: The Lazy God
Synopsis:
Jackson Fritzgerald is lazy 17 year old. Barely passing his classes, his parents are dissatisfied with him. The only thing he seems to care about are gaming.
Though, one day his lazy life comes to an end when an earthquake destroys his entire world.
From there, it just gets weirder.

Title: A tale of nonchalance and tomfoolery...
Synopsis:
In a realm far far away. On a desert planet populated with the four major races: Human, Dungeon dweller, Demons and Divine Beasts. we find our hero Jazza in a sticky situation with all his "friends" he must survive the onslaught of terrible Jokes [self-inflicted], Traitors and all manner of challenging life problems. Can He Do It!? can he find a girlfr... "ahem" Can he overcome this perilous journey, The answers lay in this Book right here Click and read if you dare? Also some romance, There is no harem attached to our MC and there won't be. 
Also some romance, There is no harem attached to our MC and there won't be. Comedy is a necessity and I do hope this book will catch you. Has serious times as well.

This is a re-rendition of an old book I started and never finished, called My First Summoning.  I wasn't really happy with it so I'm going to try and revamp it. The first 18 or so chapters are edited from the old one. Anything after that is new. Don't skip the first chapters though If you've already read them, I'm completely revamping them.

Title: Another world
Synopsis:
this fanfiction speak of a guy who is reincarnated by a bored god in the world of one piece 

Spoiler: Spoiler


Hi, I'm sorry if there are grammatical errors or pronunciation the fact is that I am Italian and do not know how to speak or write well in English, I'm writing is fanfiction to have fun and to spend some time if you have any advice tell me by by

Title: Cursed Anti-Hero Against the Gods
Synopsis: I died... that's easy to understand. I am going to be reincarnated based on what that registration lady said, that's also easy to understand. Apparently a Hero is going to be reincarnated into the new world, it's not me so I don't care. BUT WHY DID I GET CURSED BY ALL THE GODS BEFORE REINCARNATING!

Title: Taijitu
Synopsis:
Dilapidation wrought and almost unrecognisable for everyone but the supremely knowledgeable. A gym on its last legs and two teenagers on similarly flimsy foundation form a new duo under the age-old name.
Juggling hobbies, jobs, intergalactic arena, all whilst maintaining an active and uncompromising school life.
What could go wrong...?

Title: The Representative in a New World
Welcome to 'Real' Life?
Synopsis:
"Welcome to 'Real' Life?" Is a story about Akio Yokohama, a teenage boy living in the world of Kwizimi. Akio is living the life of a bounty hunter, in the world of Kwizimi. But when Akio discovers a new area, that is not marked on any map, his life changes forever.
Akio Yokohama, the teenage bounty hunter from Melgard, Kwizimi.... Is no longer in Kwizimi but a new place, called Japan.

Title: The Fata Morgana
Synopsis: Humanity has taken over the entirety of the Milky Way galaxy in its quest to expand far outside of its own arm of the galaxy, and in doing so have also joined hands with many of the alien species living within the massive galaxy. Sadly, as humanity expanded to the stars so too did their desire for power, and with the coming increases in alien species joining the new Galatic union, new religions start to appear, which would later see to humanity forming the Ascendancy; a religious based government that had started with the best intentions to bring religious unity to the Milky Way. However, power corrupts and humanity quickly started to warp the ideals of the new government and instead formed a belief where humanity was the top, and all other races were subservient -with some circles even going so far as to call the aliens slaves- which would lead to the Ascendancy of Humanity becoming the dominant empire, but as all evil, it doesn't last as now, the outer core worlds including a few mid-core worlds began to rebel in defense of their alien friends and allies, and before long a full-scale war was waged between the Ascendancy of Humanity and the Galactic Confederation of Worlds. And this is the tale of two people who were drawn into the civil war, each for a different reason, and each with their own motivations for fighting. One an alien woman fighting for a potential future, and the other a human man seeking to honour his family and homeworld.

Title: The Odd Poems
Synopsis: Howdy,

Title: The One Who Didn't Make It
Synopsis: Some people in this world are natural born outsiders. Outsiders are the ones who change the world. Those that don't fit inside the mix are forced to follow their own path. Some don't make it long enough to make a difference. This is the story of an outsider who didn't make it. These are the events leading to an outsiders demise.

Title: Domain of Man
Synopsis:
Isolation is terrible. To feel isolated with your fellow man around you is worse.
What if you were dumped in some backwards cave somewhere, completely nude, maybe with your family, or even completely alone?
The age of pioneers, heroes, generals, and geniuses is long gone. Humankind has become numb to the world around it because of how paltry everything else is compared to the glory of its history, the sheer volume of their accomplishments, and the sum of its innovations. You can interact with people across the world, travel miles in mere hours, and never prepare your own food or shelter, and it's all accessible to even the normalest of individuals. Artificial intelligence is within arms reach in devices and computers and even houses, and neural interfaces aren't exclusive to the rich and powerful at this point.
Someone far in the distance took notice of Earth, saw the multitude of hairless apes swarming its surface. That one went down the checklist to see if humanity had, in fact, beaten the 'game' of Life. Sure enough, they had gone above and beyond the requirements, but nobody had been watching. 'Why might that be?', that one wondered. Protocol was protocol, though, no matter how strange the situation was. They pulled the lever, they flipped the switch.
It's time for New Game +.
???
Don't be afraid to leave critique or share your support! I really appreciate any feedback you can give. In any case, I sincerely hope you enjoy the story! It's going to be a wild ride.
 HQ/Kindle-Grade cover art. Book Cover 2.0: "Heiroglyphs"

Title: Loch
Synopsis: Loch former war magican, has been teaching at the Copenhagen Magical Institute the last few years at the promting of his friend. Teaching has been a way for Loch to re-enter the world after a period of seclusion after the war. Discover who loch really is and what part he really plays at the school.

Title: Beelzebub - The Devil of Gluttony
Synopsis:
Beelzebub. Tales recount his deeds as a Devil Prince, people fear him, some worhip him, some simply don't give a fuck.
However, what is the truth behind this hellish demon? Perhaps he isn't as bad as stories say? Or perhaps he is much worst?
This is a story about the daily life of the original sin of gluttony.
~Author's Synopsis~
Hah~, being a devil is soooo~ hard. I need to do sooo much work, like having to make some idiots to give up their souls, make deals with people, keep several man-eating beasts at bay for when daddy says 'kill em all' n' stuff. Truly a hard life.
I want a vacation...

Title: dropped
Synopsis: dropped

Title: How to Kick Ass
Synopsis:
SPLOT! Erald lands facefirst in the mud, hears some spooooky voices, and suddenly finds himself skydiving. Soon he will be hit in the face -- perhaps literally -- by an untamed and infinite world.
Levels? Riddles? Strategy? Magic? Yup, it's all here. If Erald surives long enough to master it.

Title: Born among  Stars
Synopsis:
This story is inspired by TTT144's Reborn into Star Wars! Summoned into fantasy and Forcer by Maskdragon.
I do not own Star Wars or its affiliates as they are the property of Disney and their associates.
I've decided to go back and change the intro to the story, in addition to this I've come to discover I'm not the best at putting my thoughts to paper so if you find him not portraying something right or I'm telling the scene like a toddler point it out and I might change it when I have time... which won't be often. in addition to that if anyone would like to be the co-author and collaborate that would help immensely.

The wold was hard, harder than it had any right to be and it persisted all the way until the end so why would it stop after the end.  Was it because of fate or dictated by choice of the individual, either way, a life ended yet it continued.

Title: Fēng shén tōngjī (God's Wanted List)
Synopsis: “Just as the rise of countries must involve some degree of luck, the fall of countries must involve a degree of black magic” – Fengshen YanyiHistory and Legend has written the story of a Tyrannical Emperor, a person who once rule with great virtue turns corrupted, He became the example of immorality and corruption for Kings. History and Legend too, writes a story of a Woman, a Woman whose beauty match the gods, The one who lead The King to downfall and take pleasure in suffering of Human. A poem turn into a decree, a mission turn into vengeance, wise god turn childish, and hatred turn into loveStory that history does not document, and no legend has ever writtenThe Story of King Zhou of Shang and concubine Da JiAnd it's all started, before the Xia dynasty was established.......*Note: Many reference from Chinese mythology and history

Title: Night days
Synopsis: The underworld, a name not only for hell but for those who live away from the world. The denizins range from the junkies on the street who under the influence grasp blindly at the unseen and powerfull to the great beasts that hide in uncomftorbly plain sight. Join Ander as the the underworld and upper world reunits in spectacular fashion, and the other worlds that take notice.

Title: Deathwatch Team Fluff: A Warhammer 40k Story
Synopsis:
The 41st Millennium, a time of darkness and war.
The Imperium of Man stands alone against a tide of enemies, not all of them human.To combat these alien threats an organisation was formed, made of the best Space Marines known to humankind.
This organisation is known as the Deathwatch.
This is the story of one Space Marine in particular and the squad he led into battle.

Title: Fork This Life!
Synopsis:
Now we've all heard stories about people who died and were born again with their memories intact. The form of the reincarnator changes from story to story: human, elf, orc, slime, vampire, goblin; you name it, someone wrote it. But what if you were reborn in the most common of houshold objects?
What would happen if someone reincarnated as a fork?
Involves: merciless fork jokes, monsters, magic n' all that stuff, some profanity, maybe some gore (i'll keep it light), fork philosophy, and if you got advice on where to go next with the novel, comment, coz I only got a hazy outline. Read my other novel here: http://royalroadl.com/fiction/13058/odyssey-of-the-unrivalled

Title: Sekai Saikyou na Shoujo
Synopsis:
[R18] For sexual content and full of yuri sex.
Tatsuma Kousuke, a 20-year-old businessman who always fared badly from birth, when there was a terrorist attack that attacked his office, he died but it was not due to accidentally but the deliberation of the Gods.      After talking, God gave him an offer for a second chance and for him to live again, but in another world by becoming a beautiful woman!

Title: Blind Punch
Synopsis: Year 2197.Earth is suffering from the consequences of an environmental catastrophe. Cities the size of continents are drowning in a toxic industrial fog.Max Bourne is a typical teenager. Like billions of other people, he is forced to live in the protective shell of the individual life support module. His habitat is the virtual Layer. But one day, circumstances force the young man to leave the in-mode. He has no idea that fate will lead him through unimaginable hardships, bring him face to face with military AIs, and teach him to survive in the distant Outlands. He will come to understand that the sum of all technologies, possessed by the four leading corporations of Earth, can either open the way to the stars or destroy human civilization.

Title: Ruler Of All
Synopsis:
He awakens in an unfamiliar forest, in an unfamiliar country, in an unfamiliar world.
 
He knows nothing but feels something, something dwelling inside of him, calling out to him. The desire of freedom, the desire of revenge, the desire for blood.
 
He only knows of the Status in front of him, and that is his only source of information. But, he does not fret, because he does not have a reason to.
 
Why is he here? What is his purpose? Why does he remember nothing?
 
He knows nothing but feels something.
 
He is Dante Anguis, the Ruler of All, but the Ruler of None.
_________________________________
This story mainly focuses on Cultivation/Magic, It's my first novel so I hope you can help me out as I continue to write, thanks.
Artwork is by Scott Shi, only for image

Title: Mass Effect and Kara (Completed)
Synopsis:
Many years passed since Dexter reincarnated into the body of Naruto. And these years brought changes. What didn't change was his love to Kurama and his penance to chicken, as well as his tendency to change into a woman and have fun by messing with people.
But who would have thought that the Naruto universe was the same as the Mass Effect one? Read how our chicken fanatic will influence the world of Mass Effect.
Plays during Mass Effect 2.
 
 
Link to the Cover, I do not own it, as well as any content from Mass Effect and Naruto.
http://photobucket.com/gallery/user/Kushinada-Hime/media/cGF0aDpVenUgbm8gTXVzdW1lL05hcnV0b1V6dW1ha2lfenBzMzU0MzRjOTUuanBn/?ref=

Title: Relics
Synopsis:
Hundreds of years after the extinction of most life on Earth, an artificial intelligence known only by the designation '13' finally awakes after piecing together the remains of its corrupted code...
 
Author's Note:
I have never written anything before, and this is more of an experiment to see if I enjoy writing than an attempt to create a full story, so don't be too offended by the atrocities against the english language you may be witness to.
This story (If I decide to go through with making it) will follow the Artificial Intelligence '13' as it explores the ruins of humanity and discovers the truth of the events that lead to the extinction of nearly all biological life on Earth.

Title: The Creator
Synopsis:
Waking up to two moons, Allen's current obsession with lucid dreaming leads to him being the first user of MaGI, the Magical Game Interface. Granted the right to create his own skill, he tries to outwitt the system only to end up with the basic ability of mankind.
 This is my second attempt at writing this story, please enjoy!

Title: Changed Soul
Synopsis: Beaten and soaked, Shen Yun laid in a lonely cell. When he offended the wrong person, he was beaten and charged with crimes he didn't commit. As he began losing consciousness he gained memories he had never experienced before, memories from another world that wasn't his!

Title: Gone!
Synopsis:
As a being of power he had always felt bored making the same things over and over. He needed to feel the excitement of something new.
As he thought of this he realized the impossibility behind it. He however couldn't get it from his head, the idea consumed his consciousness at every waking moment. His friends had long since grown distant with him, and so with no one to prevent his growing insanity, no one was prepared for his radical experiment to reinvent the laws of the universe.
 
I added the couple of mature content warnings just in case I change the way I'm doing it... If I like how this goes then I'll make side stories (completely separate) with more dark, less important info, etc...
For those of you who know me from my last novel Vanahiemr: Creator of all I have not abandoned it nor will I stop it's writtings, I have simply become less enthusiastic about it. I shall probably rewrite it to better suit my ideas for it. That however is weeks in the future.
Also gone!

Title: The Quest: Last Gods Book 1
Synopsis:
Jason is one of the top players in an MMORPG called Last Gods. As such he is awarded the honor of being one of the few first closed beta testers for the new immersive VR version of Last Gods.
When he boots up the system and logs in for the first time he quickly realizes that he is no longer playing the game he was so familiar with. 
Join Jason on his quest for freedom and survival.
 
-UPDATE 8/17/2017-
It has been brought to my attention that my math on the character stats is wrong. So here is the plan, I am going to continue posting chapters as there are only a few left, then go back and fix the stats. 
 
Happy Reading!

Title: Armament Runner
Synopsis: 17-year-old Arata Yoshida lives with his father in Kyoto, Japan. His father is away on business frequently, leaving him alone most of the year barring holidays. One day, a mysterious girl transfers into his school and attacks him later in the same day. His encounter with her pulls him into a world he never imagined as he seeks the truth about his father.

Title: Mad Sci Soc
Synopsis: Aaron was reluctant to get involve in the University Mad Scientist Society. But perhaps it was just what he needed to win back his girlfriend and perhaps also stop the hijacking of the whole of the space-time fabric.

Title: Hell: Dawn of War
Synopsis: A young Warlord set off to bring his Empire back to its glory days through cunning, alliances and war fare with brutal efficiency, he will get what he want or he will die trying.

Title: Spectra
Synopsis: Rey wakes up in the middle of a field without any of his memories. A few meters away from him he finds a girl named Miria who's also lost her memories. They both seem to have a strange pattern on their wrists. Who are these two strangers who appear to share a connection? How did they even end up here?

Title: Weakling Is Me But I'm Proud To Be
Synopsis: I am weak, i admit it! but no one says that weak can't become strong, and with a little gift from god I will become strong!

Title: Planetouched
Synopsis:
Markus is your typical good guy. It was his first unsupervised mission outside of the "Spectre Academy". It is where they "take" psionically inclined children are molded as covert operatives.
It was meant to be an easy one.
Like other similar stories he was reincarnated to a husk body of a Genasi. Lost in an extraplanar plane is where his adventure begins.
Let us see where his wry humour takes him.
_____....______
The story is an amalgamation of DND psionic class, Starcraft Ghost and a liberal splash of xianxia.
There will be a bit of 4th wall as well.
Please be nice. My first foray to writing. Let me know how I can improve it.

Title: Silver Death (Re)
Synopsis:
On a first sight, Yuri is a quiet, cute girl. Today is the day of her execution. Why? That’s because she’s a murderer. While being tortured to death, she suddenly gets summoned to another world.
What happens when someone like this is transferred to the world with no laws?
(Rewrite)

Title: World Game
Synopsis:
One day the world became dark for a few moments.
Afterwards life for Sam Williams and other humans should become a constant struggle for food,water and survival.the world changed drastically because of the arrival of Monsters!!!!
Zombies,Skeletons,orcs and many more brutal and vicious creatures started to roam the world and kill their Former inhabitants.
Sam Williams,the protagonist of this Story,a 25 year Old guy who worked in a factory until DAY 0 just wanted to Go to work when the world turned dark and a red information window like in RPG's appeared out of thin air in Front of his eyes.
It was like a Dream came true for Sam After he read the First sentence of Black letters in the red window...."choose your class!"
 
 
Author Notes:
English is not my native language and outside from English classes here in Germany I learnt the most from reading novels here on RRL^^
 
I am open for any opinion and advices even though I hope you won't completely destroy this novel of mine:D
 
I am planning to include a guild system and some strategy parts in the future too.

Title: Torn World
Synopsis:
Nathan Jones is an 18-year-old who has just recently been accepted into his favorite college. To celebrate, he invites his friends to a vacation on an island in the Bahamas that was just recently made tourist-friendly. Little did they know that the island was a magic portal into a different world like in the Light Novels that Nathan read in his spare time. In this world, there are demons roaming about and destroying kingdom after kingdom after escaping the Great Abyss made by the first hero of the land Liathys. Being 4 Legendary classes, it is up to these 4 friends to use their godly powers to restore peace to the world, all of them doing it in their own way.
The original title was "In A Torn World Where Cheat Specs Save Our Lives", but I thought it was too long so I changed it to simply "Torn World".

Title: OverGod of Yggdrasil
Synopsis:
A different take on Overlord. This story like overlord takes place in Yggdrasil and then diverge from that point forth as the mic characto will not be teleported to the New World.

Now watch as the legendary tale begins.

Title: Douluo Dalu - Hammer God Douluo
Synopsis:
A clash between continents.
An anbush between two parties.
A dead Title Douluo.
And a reborn one.
Now the heavens shall shake in his wake!
-
 
This is a fanfiction of Douluo Dalu. The synopsis and Prologue takes place in the first war against the Sun-Moon continent, while the main story will be set in Douluo 2.

Title: Tundra Heart
Synopsis:
Free at Last! No more shame. No more fear. 
Maya chooses her new world, yet has to contend with the good and the bad. Will she become indifferent to the plights of others? Or will she thaw her tundra heart?

Title: Beyond the Limits
Synopsis:
2362 AD, a small PSR trade shuttle is making its way through the vast swathes of space between Sol system and Zephlon VII, carrying a valuable cargo of metallic hydrogen, to be used as a fuel source and materials for the newly formed colony. 
A small crew of ten has been placed on the shuttle to maintain the ship during its 6-month long journey.
Little do they know, there's something different about this trip...
Inspired by Becky Thomas's Abantey

Title: Pomegranate Seeds
Synopsis: A retelling of Persephone's journey to the underworld.

Title: Supreme Sorcerer
Synopsis:
A great sorcerer and also the forefather of magic that after being betrayed by the humanity he so once loved, forsaken his own world.
Now in a world much similar to his own and also much different, he will create his own place where he will only allow those who he deems worth.
 
*just a story to relieve my boredom. Not my original language

Title: Legends of Tarthirious 4
Synopsis:
After surviving an attempted bombing and watching her informant, Bishop, get murdered on live television, Kylia feels like she's got a target on her back, a target that she thinks even the MPs can't shake off of her.
Things aren't all bad for Kylia though, and as things progress well with her boyfriend, Gerald, she starts to see that maybe there's hope for her in the fast and ever-changing world she's stuck in.
In this, the second last part of the saga, Kylia's life starts to get back on track despite the veritable plethora of curveballs that have been thrown her way.

Title: Dungeon of the Divine Goddess
Synopsis:
More than a thousand years ago, in a world where magic was commonplace and peace was everlasting, a meteorite fell from the sky, creating a massive crater within the ground. No one knows where it came from, and it has been believed for years to be the wrath of the goddess. Over the years, monsters had started appearing within the crater, now known as the "Dungeon of the Divine Goddess". Centuries had passed, and humanity created a large city surrounding the dungeon, in order to prevent calamity, with only the most talented people around the world able to enter. However, only a mere fragment of the dungeon had been discovered, and humanity has only begun to discover the truth which lies within. 
In this vast world known as Vitaeria, how will Faul go on his journey to be known as a legendary existence? Oh wait, he's... sleeping?

Title: Female mage, a Baker, and a kingdom
Synopsis: Erik Reid was killed by a speeding driver after saving an old woman. He met God and was offered many options, but he chose to be reborn in a different world as a female human. Follow him on his adventures through Rayliv as he makes friends and enemies.

Title: Runic Artisan
Synopsis:
The year is 2018, and the world has ended. Or, atleast that's the way it feels for Scott. After the introduction of the 'System', Scott's world is turned upside down. Many various creatures out of legend are transported to Earth, as his Universe merges with 'Universe T-209'. Scott must find his place in the new world. Taking advantage of his class and knowledge, will he thrive in this strange new world?

2-3 Chapters per week.

Title: UltRea; Anthykera in a Whole New World.
Synopsis: The fun times adventuring for the Anthykera guild members went to a whole new level as a thunder strike turn everything real, including themselves as their avatar in a whole new ---- unknown world. With mostly every part of the game has turn realistic, things doesn’t go as well as they ever thought. As more and more unexpected event occurred, will they survived in this new world with the power they wield or will it eventually destroy them…?

Title: Beyond life
Synopsis:
mike and his friend are sitting around watching tv after a long gaming marathon when they find an add about quad-gaming companies newest game. beyond life, its the worlds first VRMMO game on the market that is said to be the start of it all.
mike and his friends goes through trails and turbulations forming a guild and dealing with those so called unstoppable guild. they will and come across all kinds or quests and raids. 
this is the start of the legendary guild: diginified
hey, so this is my first story iv ever done. i would love feed back and recommendations on the story. im sorry if the grammar is bad or spelling. if there are mistakes please leave your comments on them and ill fix them as soon as possible. thank you!!

Title: Trinity
Synopsis:
It's been 200 years since The humans of Earth experienced the descent of the Trinity. 
The Arête was the first thing to arrive, bringing with it what many believed to be superpowers for all. 
Then the Corporis, the ideal dream for all those who dreamed of cultivation. 
Lastly came the Tree of Infinite possibilities the System of Yggdrasil, and its ability to provide a path of improvement for the Arête and Corporis.
At first, while the human race was still adjusting they didn't realize the arrival of the Trinity was a gift to all beings. During the next 50 years, Humans were brought to the brink of extinction by those very creature's they use to keep locked up in cages. It was only thanks to humanity's adaptive nature that after 20 more years they were finally able to rise back up, and with 100 more years take back control of about 80% of the world. (At a slow rate) Read as Jp/CN web novel. 
Warning: I'm an amateur writer who simply has a large imagination and wishes to put it into words.

Title: The One and Only
Synopsis: Harima has confessed his love to the ones that he thought were "the one and only" so many times that he lost the count, one day all those who rejected Harima, all those who Harima felt love for at some point, come back to his life and he will have to go through several trials in order to decide which one is the One and Only

Title: Our Shattered Realms
Synopsis:
*This is a learning experience for me so please keep in mind that I am attempting to work on some of the issues brought to my attention early on. However I haven't yet gone back to redo the early chapters.*
Less than two days ago every piece of electronics in the world stopped working for more than two hours. The death toll was immense. Hospital equipment failed, cars stopped in the middle of the street, planes fell from the sky, and homework was lost at the worst possible moment. We found out that it was just the flicker and hum of The System warming up. Now we see the true cost of our new world.
A Dark comedy that focuses on a few of the many people who aren't stuck in a high level dungeon when our world is translated and joined to Our Shattered Realms.
 

 
This is my first story that I have published. I welcome any criticism that you have for me. Thank you for reading and I hope you enjoy!

Title: SINFONIA: Oneshots
Synopsis:
A collection of short stories following Claude, Jet, Leon, Walter and Rick and their life in the Victorian-esque all-male boarding school they attend. Although all of them are very different from each other, they all have something in common: adventures and trouble seem to follow each of them wherever they go. Most of these stories detail the pasts of the characters, notably that of Claude's as he ambitiously makes his way from the new junior student to the equally feared and adored idol of the all-boys school. 
These characters will be featured in an upcoming visual novel, but the stories mostly happen before the events of the actual game, and as such no further context is necessarily needed to read these stories (in fact, these are more like preparation for the VN)! More info of the VN itself here http://kuuras.weebly.com/sinfonia.html 

"Are you going to sing to us?" the boy continued and laughed, now directing his attention entirely to Claude instead of the group of juniors as whole. "Or will you give me a kiss? You're so pretty that you wouldn't need to sing or dance if you did that."
He laughed again, but this time Claude interrupted him:
"Just one kiss? Is that all?" he asked, as if he had taken seriously the other boy's obviously joking suggestion.
"Yeah, just one kiss," the other replied and laughed again at the junior student's naivety. Of course he had not been serious - even if he did admit the younger boy looked cute, like a girl, so it probably wouldn't be all that bad.  
"Fine, then," Claude nodded and took a confident step towards the senior. "Just one kiss."

Title: Apocalypse The Fantasy
Synopsis:
The world was suddenly shocked by the apocalypse of the aberrants. It first started with black fogs and many people started acting weird then was sent to the hospital. A few days later, those people became a monster who fed on human flesh and had the eyes of a dead fish.
All the survivor gained power over elements. But, aberrant get stronger as they eat more. As they lived, the found out few things. Being infected by the aberrant would turn them into aberrants but they did not die. Then, whether live as human or aberrant, being killed by a human would cause them to reincarnate at the first time they activated their power.
Who pulled the string behind the scene? Why would they do it?
"That was none of my business."
The woman said as she on her journey of her third life to find her treasured people. 
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=Do not talk about logic here. Because, not all logic will work inside this story. For example if everything must be logical, the world would be destroyed after a few years by the nuclear power plant that was not being taken care of. The story couldn't go on if it was like that. So, don't go tattle on me.
Notice: I made that cover.
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=Other tag: Romance. Drama

Title: Tailed Beast
Synopsis:
Ares had already reached the pinnacle of strength in his last life, unable progress any further due to hitting the max level.
Reincarnated into the Tailed Fox clan, Ares has no recollection of his previous life. The only thing remaining from his previous life is his Status Screen, but he doesn’t even understand what that is. No longer constrained by the max level, just what level will he reach?

This my first work so please bear with me.
The novel does contain LitRPG aspects, however I hope to not make that the center of the story. I've read to many fictions where the plot of a story is carried by the LitRPG aspects. My goal is to have a plot and character driven novel which also contains LitRPG aspects in the background.
No definite releasing schedule, however a few chapters weekly should be normal.

Title: Blood Feud
Synopsis:
Humans, demi-humans and demons all of them fight for it, all of them fight for the bloodlines
in the middle of them all can a blind person survive

Title: The Twin Chronicles
Synopsis:
Two strangers connected by fate to become twins, one to be good one to be evil. 
A story of betrayal, death and war.
Over a world that it not real! But to them it is home. 
Choose a side good or evil! And who decided what is good and what is evil.

Title: World Revisit
Synopsis:
Having no collection of her past, a confused young girl ends up in world unknown to her. A world with the nature as their source of life and magic, but at the same time also the cause of their despair and sorrow. The world seems to be facing a dangerous calamity.
Being treated as an intruder, she will have to gain the trust of the people around her and find a way to live through this mess. With not much hope left, what can be done to prevent it? Nobody knows for sure, but a battle of life and death is bound to come.


NOTE:
Consider this story as the first version. I want to keep working on it so that the story can actually finish at one point for future development. I want to eventually make it a webtoon comic, but the story still needs to be written and the art still needs be improved. So I'll keep writing for now, but expect the final result to be much better than the story now. Until then, I hope we can have a great time together with this writing experiment. Thanks!

Title: Villainous
Synopsis:
“Want to know the meaning of life? Want to live… a real life?”
When a popup based on Terror Infinity showed up in Matthew Forester's browser, he did what any sane person would do and clicked NO. Unfortunately the Lord God had evidently been taking lessons from advertisers and NO just opened a different offer.
Now he's stuck playing the deadliest game on the wrong end of the field. Luckily he's read the Evil Overlord List...

Title: A Knight's Duty
Synopsis:
Henry Keiss, a knight of House Toris, is viewed only as a failure and a burden by his peers. With more losses than victories under his belt and a string of rumors that he is a "cursed" existence, Henry was the only surviving officer of the Battle at Blue Hill which took Lord Toris away from the world. Henry himself did not leave unscathed. 
 
The new Lord Toris views Henry as a stain, but values the integrity of an honest knight. He allows Henry to keep his position but essentially robs him of any titles and status he once had by relegating him to an unofficial babysitting duty and "acquiring" his land for the purposes of recovery. Henry is left as the protector of the black sheep of Toris, it's one-eyed son.
 
A bitter and weak noble child and the cynical failure of a knight that he blames for the death of his father. A combination that seems unlikely to cause anything but grief. The realm could not guess that these two would go on to do more than just lead the Toris into a new age. They would go on to change the realm itself. 
 
This is the story of a Knight's Duty.

Title: Traveling
Synopsis: Traveling. There are many synonyms for this word: leaving behind family, leaving behind responsibility, impregnating/getting impregnated by foreign people, and the best of all, adventure! Can you name anything that beats traveling? I think not, but neither can Matthew, a young man with a hunger for lands left unexplored, women who have not known men, and a deep desire for adventure. No, not really. (Hey Kids! You may not know this, but what I'm gonna tell you is definitely going to shock you to the core! This novel cotains... PROFANITY!!!!!!!!!  If any of you here are a "Special snowflake", you gotta save yourself! RUN! And don't look back at this novel! Run for your precious snowflake liveeees!! REEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!/!!!1!!!)

Title: Genesis Online: Rise of a Pyro
Synopsis:
A young man with no wants but yet with a troubled life. Making a deal with his father after playing games for only 2 years and never with others. Yet gets the newest mmo (massive multiplayer online) game on the market. What his father does not know is this young man, Wade, is a fire lover, a pyromaniac or pyrophillac in todays terms. The real question is what will a pyromaniac with life troubles to do in a world where killing is not only allowed but actually smiled upon? Will he show his true self or take it slow?
 
romance I'm on the edge about, but plenty of dysfunctional action...hopefully.

Title: Give me a second chance
Synopsis:
A lazy young man regrets all his life decisions at his mere age of 21 instead of working on his flaws, all he does is day dream all day...
"What if I was the Avatar? Damn wouldn't it be cool to have Sharingan? Ah If Terrorists came to school I would for real beat the up...
Oh well my next life would face those problems... not me in this life...
*breathes deeply*
Hey next-life me..
suppose you don't have any talent and is trash...
if you were born in the most peasant of households...
or become disabled maybe disfigured and is the ugliest being ever to grace life, boy I do hope we at least would look average heh...
promise me one thing...
We will always work hard, harder than anyone smarter than anyone, never go down because...
I had been handsome, I was born in a wealthy household, and was perfectly healthy throughout my 21 years...
yet I am still pitiful, so pitiful that instead on working on my dreams I chose this..."
sitting on a branch of Acacia firmly standing near the edge of a cliff, the young man gazes on the sun dipping its light on the sea, whilst the sea breeze gently blows on his scar ridden face he caresses a gun staring at it while making a sour face...
He then smiles and looks forward the vast blue sky tinged with orange, purple, and red.
"I'm going now, at least promise me to become a decent man...
hahahahahaha but I know, and you know..
I break my promises all the time..."
The young man points the gun in his mouth while tears uncontrollably drip from his eyes.
The sky goes dark as the sun sets, the stars twinkle on the vast night sky.
The waves crash on the cliff, with a bit of red. The sea takes  the corpse, slowly it drifts, quietly sinking, the young man is no more.

Spoiler: Spoiler

Title: Meanings, meanings, meaning!
Synopsis:
The Forest was calm, or perhaps it was just me imagining it. All that happened thirty minutes ago was like it had never existed: I ran for my life, thinking that it might be the end of this one, but here I was, in a place that had undoubtedly forgotten my existence or never took any interest in it from the beginning. For how long did I walk, I did not know. My head was turning, my sense dulled: my arms were numb, my legs heavy. I leaned my body against a tree and rested my head on the rough bark. My eyes managed to catch some of the rays of light penetrating through the leaves and bathed in their warmth. The scent of the pines was beyond any sweetness in the world. It filled my head with various emotions, memories that I had once rejected and thrown into the deepest pit in my brain. I had tried to suppress them, but they, once in a while, surged out of my body like water surging out of a broken dam. I closed my eyes.  
Extract from the first chapter of "Meanings, meanings, meaning"

Title: The Irregulars
Synopsis: A poor young man finds himself looking at the body of his only friend, beaten, bloody and dying in front of him. This story is one of revenge, finding power and understanding that power.

Title: AE 31 Snarky Captain Garalund
Synopsis:
It's 31 AE, a full 31,000 years since the First Space C-Ship left Earth.  
Noster Space.  The colonized stars.  Edict and the Ministry vie for power and control.  Edict does it through military power.  The Ministry is for the faithful.
Refugee Colonies are those outside of the control of Edict for whatever reason.  Either they are not strategic, or they were unlawful colonizers or they were declared heretic by the Ministry.  
A fleet of Edict ships disappeared in the Terrence Sector recently and the Inquisition Wing is here to investigate.  What will they find?  
In this hotbed of mystery and intrigue, near the furthest reach of Noster Space, is the Terrence Sector which hugs the Divide.
Captain Garalund and his crew navigate the Arkana to supply Ref Colonies with needed medicine, and to study space botany, and whatever other hobbies Captain Garalund has an interest in.

Title: Runk Academy
Synopsis: Rend's father vanished along with a battalion of soldiers in the mysterious ruins in the south. Rend, determined to find his father decides to join the Runk army Acadamy in order to investigate the dissapearance. Along with his best friend Lok , follow their adventure in the Academy full of scary teachers, big breasted woman, lolis and secrets.

Title: Chaos Destiny
Synopsis:
The strongest human alive brought back to his past to prevent the death of his companion.
An assassin brought to another world to find his lover.
A professor reborn as a prince wanting to save as many discriminated as possible.
A story about three individual and their struggles towards their respective goals in the world of swords and magic.
Note: This story is inspired by many novels that I have previously read. You will find similarities to many novels at many places in the story. I wanted to put in 'Kingdom Building' tag but there was no such tag available. I guess I will put here?
Update 21/01/2020:
Author here. It's been a while since I've last been to this site. I have not given up on this story yet. Truth be told, I've actually accumulated over 300 chapters of this story.
However, as I progressed with the story, I've realised the plot holes that came up here and there as a result of my inexperience in writing. This, in turn, took me alot of re-writing and editing to resolve. Can't be helped since this is my first story.
This is the reason why I stopped posting additional chapters as I do not want to change those that has already been posted. Can't expect readers to re-read the chapter again after I made a change in it right?
So, after coming so far, I then found out that the story i've written is full of flaws. Thus, I've decided to overhaul the whole story and write a new one similar to the this but with a new title, this time, with proper planning.
Therefore, please look forward to it and support me when the time comes.

Title: Dark blood
Synopsis:
A young man oblivious to the blinding lights until the end, presented with a choice, makes a decision that will influence his life. 
In a far away land, a woman births a stillborn, the homes of thousands are in danger, and a world that is filled with all kinds of dangers, magical energies, and untold treasures is about to enter an age of turmoil and conflict. An age of death, destruction, and slaughtering of the innocent.
In such a world, a cry of anguish can lead to a small hope, a cry of desperation can lead to a warm and loving embrace , and a cry of helplessness can lead to freedom.
Will one man rise above all, or will he fail to stand up from the dirt from whence he came?
We can only find out in the future, can't we?
 
PS: This is my first fiction, so I would really appreciate some feedback, since I don't know if it is any good at all. Also, the creator of the cover is winRoot. If you want a good cover or something illustrated, he is a very good artist and will take commisions. I highly recommend him.

Title: A Promise
Synopsis: This is the story of Pluto and Aria, Pluto is handicapped and Aria takes care of him. Follow them through depressed, agitated and crazy situations. Both made a promise, because of that promise, they are going on and doing their best. They won't stop, because they have to fulfil the promise. They both promised the same thing, but neither of them knows they have done so. But, what was the promise they promised? It's a fairly simple promise, anyone could say it at any time, but not anyone could keep it.

Title: Blue Seed - Path of a Mage King
Synopsis:
It is said to be magical. Mystical, even. A book containing such extreme power that simply obtaining it could grant you all the wealth and land you've ever desired. The problem is using it. It's a problem the protagonist, Wulfram Azalea, intends to solve even if it kills him. Or at least the people around him. 
 
Dwelling in the heart of the Glorious Empire, Wulfram is one of the fabled Seven Sorcerers. Black Mages of immense dark power and almost no real desire to play by the rules other mages live by. Who care not for the suffering they put their bodies through, all in the name of obtaining unlimited power. 
 
As Wulfram struggles to obtain the secrets of the Blue Seed, the realm begins to reshape in many ways. Wulfram will find few allies both inside and outside of the Glorious Empire's walls, and will find himself confronting his past, present and future. To appease the Blue Seed, it seems, one must understand life, as it's wielder once did.
 
The man known as the Mage King.

Title: Knight & Condemned
Synopsis:
The Kingdom of Altria has the finest cities and the finest academy for Knights and Mages that prepares them to battle the monsters that lurks the overworld. With the Overlord of the Northern Continent craving for expansion, the Kingdom of Altria and the other Kingdom's has to defend themselves.
This is the Tale of Arden the Lowly Commoner,And Sena Saclea of the Noble House of Saclea.

Title: Loners' Aimeless Journey
Synopsis:
I woke up in the middle of a grassland. I walked around and encountered monsters ... It seems I somehow got transported to another world huh ?
Like in those isekai web novels. Though I start with no absurd cheats skills and status ... Damn it ... I started as one of the lowest rank adventurers.
Anyway how will I live my life here ? I could become a merchant and become rich with my otherworldly knowledge ... Forget it, I am actually a loner. Guess I will be an adventurer for the time being and slowly grind my skills.
Novel protagonists would aim to be a hero in my situation ... Though I don't particularly want to be a hero and gather attention. More like I would rather avoid gathering attention.
Another goal would be to get a harem ... No I won't do that ! Not that I am not interested, but ... It's real life and I don't think I would be able to love multiple women. And it would feel bad to put my hands on women without actually loving them ... I am a loner though, so it won't happen anyway ...
Oh well, time to grind skills and levels since I don't have anything else to do.

Title: Warhammer : Cold-blooded Fury
Synopsis:
Within the deepest depth of a young dungeon, a pond beside the dungeon core bubbled. The young, primal and very stupid core grew wary of the bubbling, had it ordered the spawn of a monster?
What emerged from the pond was a tall reptilan creature, it's blue scaly hide lined with patches of bronze. It had a magnificent crest adorned with two large potruding horns, gleaming with the color of bronze. The Dungeon core was excited, a emotion it had never felt before. A strong monster had been spawned in the Dungeon! With great excitement it ordered it to protect it.
The scaly reptilian creature looked around itself in confusion, before it's eye's landed on the core. The core felt fear, a fear unlike never before. Before it could call for help, the lizard had already taken the Dungeon core towards it's mouth. With a terrifying chomp, the Dungeon core shattered within the mouth of the Lizard.
The sound of crunching and muching resounded within the dark cave, the illumination of the dungeon core growing dimmer. Soon, the cave was shrouded in darkness and with it an eerie silence. With the sound of water splashing out in a violent manner, roars of beasts echoed, breaking the silence.
With it, the panicked roar of another echoed,
"RAAAAAAAAAAAAAGH??!!!" (WHAT THE HELL IS GOING ON?!!)
The Saurus emerge.

Title: warhammer 40k : the kraken
Synopsis: Trained from a young age and taken from his world to be more than he was hill could believe he'd be one of the god emperors finest a space marine of the chapter the sons of war.                                                           Where this life take him ?

Title: Love Lies in London
Synopsis:
[Gay / yaoi romance!]
World wide music and movie star Hideki Sano has had enough. His relationship is over and the tabloids and magazines are eating up his ex-boyfriend's glib lies. To make matters worse, he's been forced out of the closet by the whole debacle!
His best friend and manager Lucile has his back. With her help, he tries to move on from the whole thing by following his heart and taking a role in a new movie; a gay romance where he plays the love interest of the main character played by dreamy heartthrob Seth Cooper. Filming in London means leaving everything behind for a few months while he lives and works there.
But Hideki has a plan to get his life back. He's tired of feeling like everyone in the world is lying to him just to get something out of him, so once he gets to London, he sets off in disguise to experience life like any normal guy. Posing as a university student, he makes his way out on the town. That's where he meets Oliver.
Those deep blue eyes captivate him from the moment he steps into the bar. He realizes that night that a single decison can change an entire life. He keeps seeing Oliver, again and again, falling for him even more every single day. But guilt begins to gnaw at his gut as he realizes that every single day is a lie.
Will Hideki ever be able to tell Oliver the truth about his identity, or will the truth tear them apart?
 
Author's Note: Reviews will help me improve as a writer! Comments and criticism are welcome. I am sharing this story with the public as I write it because I want to learn and grow.

Title: GameFrame Online: The Completionist Chronicles   Book One: Never Look Back
Synopsis:
Would you become uploaded data in a private beta test for the chance to win $100,000,000?
Would it matter if your body might not even make it while you were out of it?
Rafael Fuller, known as Never in the gaming world, would. The world would also be happy to be rid of him while he competes. As one of the premiere Achievement hunters in the world, Never has the reputation of being anti-social, abrasive, and forming alliances only for his own benefit.
When Alchemy Studios announced a full immersion MMO, he jumped at the chance not because of the money or recognition, though.
He did it because their parent company, AGI, has the medical resources he desparately needs.
Never is dying, and spending his last months fighting in an artificial world is better to him than spending them in hospitals.
However, as he seeks out every challenge, there is a looming threat on the horizon. The King of The Void, the Final Boss of Aerlhiz Eternia, is acting out of its programming matrix, and it's too late to pull the participants out.
What sort of hero would be willing to rise to such a challenge?
Never say Never, because he could care less about your problems.
That is until it becomes obvious that The King of the Void is seeking a body to inhabit, and according to all known data, the body with the most connectivity to the system once belonged to Rafael Fuller.

Title: The Rift
Synopsis:
Lance thought he had seen it all. Especially with his past, and ESPECIALLY with their current dilemma. Akron, a demonic insane deity, who craved for power like a madman on steroids. However, never thought he'd be sent some other world with only a few of his gear. And the rest of his friends and weapon are out in god knows where. He didn't read enough science fiction for this!
 
EBF3 + RWBY CROSSOVER

Title: Metrodome: Tyran
Synopsis: In a distant, bleak future, the inhospitable wasteland of Old Terra is pocked with colossal, self-enclosed cities: the Metrodomes. These megastructures form the pillar of the Solar Federation's power on the planet; Tyran is the oldest and, perhaps, most rotten of them.  Ambra Feenix is a twelve-year-old Psyion; a human mutant with the ability to see into minds. She has learned to hide her secret well from the unforgiving world around her. But it seemed as though it was only a matter of time before she found herself in the Arena: a legal bloodsport for the cold-blooded disposal of undesirables by combat.  Her chance encounter with Tryllan, a reluctant Hunter in the Arena, may be Ambra's last chance of survival and escape.

Title: City of Champions Online
Synopsis:
Having found the tragic truth that an art degree is worth less than the paper it is printed on, Jacquelyn Jones is frustrated with her dead end work as a graphic designer for a marketing firm, finding new ways to try and convince people that this week's 50 cent off sale is actually worth driving to the store. She's tried other VRMMORPGs, but they've all been fantasy-based, with a couple sci-fi games thrown in. But she wants something more, something Super.
 
Superhero VRMMOs have had a... subpar reception in the past, in part due to the fact that the nature of most MMOs makes for fairly unheroic tales. After the couple hundredth time blasting the same group of mooks from the same faction on the same street corner of the same city, using the same powerset as everyone else because you only have a few options, it is hard to think of yourself as a hero anymore.
 
But then she heard about City of Champions Online. For the first time, a developer partnered with a tabletop RPG maker to use their system to create a VRMMORPG, and it was one of the systems designed to be used with superhero games! And despite the name, there was no getting stuck in the same city as all the other players. The game world was a detailed replica of the real world, down to having some of the same shops and restaurants in town. She could be whoever she wanted, whatever she wanted.
 
Now, she just has to find a way to become the heroine she's always wanted to be.

Title: Blacksmith
Synopsis: A classroom full of students are transported to a diffrent world. The classmates are asked to be heroes for this new world to help with feuds, save those  in distress, and go on adventures. To boost many of the students have exceptionaly high stats as well as a powerfull job that puts them above many of the commoners. For many, this was an amazing oppurtunity to explore and enjoy a fantastical world only found in the pages of novels, however, the same could not be said about Erwin Schmeid his stats are particularly average for the people of this world while his class makes him nothing more than a blacksmith.

Title: Demonology For Morons
Synopsis: Day in an day out i had dark impulses that i kept in firm control so that my next life, if there was a next life, would be better or perhaps just more interesting. After all this worl d is really boring. I mean if it wernt for books i would probably have snapped years ago. However if i had known then what i know now, i would have thought that i should have commited every sin possible and then died in a shootout that somehow ended with me getting hit by a truck. After all i got my wish and reincarnated as a demon! But no evil karma equals my new life that starts out as the weakest little lesser imp. Well fuck.

Title: Conquest Online
Synopsis: Do you believe unhackable games exist? Even with the advanced technology humans have developed, no games are truly "Hacker-Proof". A teenager named Diegox who specializes in hacking has challenged himself to hack a game which claims to be unhackable. Little did the gamers know, their whole lives is about to change...

Title: Skillmaster : Haven
Synopsis:
Skillmaster : Haven
Thrust into  a position not of his choosing, the cloned intelligence of James Carter must travel through the virtual reality world of Haven,  following a quest given to him  by the prime god and creator of this new world.. The quest ? To gain access to a virtual log off button which will allow him to log off to his virtual real life
  
Skillmaster : Haven now to be renamed as Skillhaven Alpha

Title: Your Love Is Like Music To Me
Synopsis:

Title: The Warring Teacher
Synopsis:
An idealist high-school teacher finds death when saving a student. Most of the time he had regretted not having the power to change the world, but at the very end, his last actions saved that student’s world.
In Tellus begins the rise of two particular boys.
The first one, Kancil, has lived a life full of suffering and betrayal, leading him to throw his life into a quest for revenge. But he has a special talent. Teaching people comes like a second nature to him and he acquired an ability to make that talent something that could change the world.
The second one, Brencis, was a commoner boy who rose to the upper echelons of society after finding out he was a superbly talented person. Thus, the naive boy is thrown into the unknown and complicated world of nobility’s intrigue and deception. His only advantage over the double-faced nobles is a special knowledge of groundbreaking technologies that constantly pours into his head during his sleep.
Upon death, the high-school teacher was promised rebirth and the two boys display the traits of the teacher when he lived, but only one of them can be the reincarnation of the teacher.
———————
My tags?: A reincarnation litrpg xianxia with base building.
At least my plan is blending all those genres with a lil' bit of a 'realistic' twist.

Title: Last Hope
Synopsis:
Twenty years after the Great War, humans sheltered inside domes. These domes are refuges that allow mankind to once again rise from its ashes but at the same time they are its prison.Games of all kinds flourish and drive the economy leading to a constant evolution of gaming.  In fact a brand new game will be released soon with new features unseen so far. 
In order to fullfill his dreams and escape the sad reality a young man will challenge this new world but little did he know the impact his actions would have.

Title: Returning to a world yet explored (One Shot)
Synopsis:
In one man’s mind, a theory was once created: If this timeline exists, why can’t other timelines that may or may not have similarities also exist simultaneously?
A man, A dream, and his original world. What shenanigans will this man go through? Who knows, who cares? Actually, there are a lot of people who care about what this man does, shall we begin?

Title: Luck Lockyer
Synopsis:
Luck Lockyer was the type of man to smirk in the dark, the expression not for anyone but himself. One of perpetual amusement. The bright side of things were hard to find in the shade yet his amber eyes were always searching. The smirk was his default, he knew it, his friends knew it, his family knew it. It was his most natural state.
But the death of everyone close to you can affect a downwards curve on the mouths of even the most stoic people.
Without purpose, without anyone to do the job for, Luck Lockyer found himself inside an empty forgotten church. The perpetual smirk on his face had slipped to a thin line, his scar more noticeable now than ever before. His amber eyes, the windows to his soul, dull and lifeless. To anyone who knew him, it was the clothing that gave away his mental state, denim pants and a plain black t-shirt. If that wasn't enough, the tears running down his face certainly would, the echoing sobs of a broken man rang across the rundown church.
It was on a whim, but Luck Lockyer prayed, he prayed for many things, for death, revenge, friends, but the one prayer dominating his thoughts, a second chance for his family.
That was all he wanted. Simple.
It was then, on the outskirts of a polluted city, in an abondoned lot, in a forgotten church that Luck Lockyer, the Devil of the Cards, the Bloodless Hand, the Amber Demon, the Broken, was answered by a being from another world and one from his.
*found the picture online

Title: The Gaia Project: The World of Terra
Synopsis:
The year is 2317 and humanity seems to be hurling towards complete annihilation. If significant actions aren’t taken then civilization as we know it might not exist anymore.
The final remnants of humanity have holed themselves up in an underground facility known as the Last Hope and they await the inevitable as they slowly watch their limited resources dwindle bit by bit.
 
However, things might not be as grim as they seem because Hektor and his Gaia Program are determined to end humanity’s wrong doings and teach them the valuable lesson of displaying love for their planet.
Follow Hektor as he embarks on a daunting yet epic adventure to give mankind hope once again.
Will he survive the ups and downs and twist and turns of life in the new world of Terra or will the dangers consume him?
 
Will he make his dream a reality or will the world of Terra be a second coming of earth?

Title: Silver Amelia
Synopsis:
Amelia used to be a positive, brimming girl loved by those around her. Once tragedy had befallen, her view of the world has changed. Her sight was no longer filled with blooming flowers. Her eyes bore those of an actor. Her body knew what true pain was. Lastly, her heart was filled with the resolve to continue her Grandfather's legacy. The dream of a world that accepted diversity.
However, in a series of events, Amelia was jolted with another realization. The ancestors of her family, Laurel's Royalty, descended from a being far from what humans could call a relative. Now, her ancestral blood forcefully awakened by a grand scheme, Amelia found herself unsure of her own identity and purpose.
Would she live as a human and only lay the foundations for diversity? Would she accept her newfound identity and become immortal?
Even so, no matter what option she chose, she needed to prepare on how to accommodate the Heroes summoned from another kingdom.
_____________________________________

Title: A Nerd's Wuxia Tales
Synopsis: Scheduled Chapters on Tuesdays and Saturdays, 5 AMIf we have more than 3 chapters done, we will post them on the site. These won't replace the scheduled chapters. American professional gamer, number 1 on multiple leaderboards of the most played Japanese MMORPGs, Mark stands at the peak of the gaming world when it comes to MMORPGs. One night, Mark's body is removed from the world, leaving only his soul. When Mark finds out that he has been reborn in a fantasy world. Title: The Man Who Will Become God
Synopsis:
A young man about to propose to the love of his life was abducted to another world by a vengeful, fallen God. Reality has been organized into a system with classic RPG elements. For the price of his name the protagonist has been given the "Zero-Variable", an ability that gives him growing power over the world's system for a painful price. 
The protagonist is torn between happiness at the fulfilment of his boyhood dreams and the heartache of not being together with his loved one. But to return to his world, he is given an almost impossible mission: to steal the world system from the being that stole the fallen god's power, kill that god, and become a god himself. Only with that can he achieve the power to return to his world and his loved one. 
The protagonist must overcome the many dangers and wonders of this new world. From roaming bandits to hungry monsters who seek to kill him. From greedy merchants to arrogant nobles who wish to enslave him. From demon warlords to powerful mages hungry for his abilities and its untapped potential. From elven lords, fairies, kings and lesser gods who wish to use him for their own purposes. From a ruthless and nigh-powerful god who is no stranger to overthrowing and killing other god overseers like the fallen god. Finally, the protagonist is also in danger from himself. Will he succumb to his power or will he give it all up for the woman he loves?
additional tags: Another World, Game Elements, Drama, Romance

Title: Seyran
Synopsis:
Seyran. This was the name of the greatest witch that lived in Unzu; a world dominated by power. She was feared by many and respected by even more. Yet that outstanding person died, in the arms of her three beloved sisters for who knew what reasons.
Now she found herself reincarnated in the body of the frail princess of Yande, a country in another world entirely. And in this world of matriarchal system, she had to strive for her life more fiercely than before for her strength was lacking. Besides, she found that maybe; just maybe it wasn’t treason that bought her to this world…

Title: Mundane Magic Magus
Synopsis:
Whilst the kingdoms of swords and magic warred against the vile monsters, the kings of all sentient races decided to come together and call upon a group of heroes from another world.
However, one of their heroes was soon kidnapped by an incredibly powerful entity for unknown reasons. The kings tried to find the hero, but to no avail.
1000 years later, the hero reappeared.
[Contains sex, gore, swears, torture and chocolate. Lots and lots of chocolate.]

Title: Silver Nightmare
Synopsis: Michael Andrews and his brother Jake were Wizards that kept the natural and supernatural worlds seperate. As a detective Michael was able to do just that as he was aware of the crimes being commited by both sides of the worlds. This case however bridges those worlds. A murder with a man cut in half was what brought him into the situation and now he just couldn't stop before he learned why this was happening and who was doing it.

Title: A Snake's Life
Synopsis:
The Afterlife isn't always what you think…
The loving father of three children, Alfred lived a life of few regrets. He served his country far from home. He outlived his soulmate. He died alone.
However, Albert's intentions about a peaceful eternity, reunited with his wife, are thrown out the window when a meddling god digs his fingers into Albert’s afterlife.
The positive? He has a chance to make things right—to live the life that was so cruelly taken from him the first time. Reincarnating into a world full of magical evolutions, monstrous deer, and sassy ten-year-old elves, Albert worries he doesn't have a chance of surviving the three-hundred-years the god promised it would take to reunite him with his beloved.
But if life has taught Albert anything it’s this: If something is worth having, it's worth fighting for. And he intends to fight.

Title: Rain, Tempest, And Thunder: A History of the Grail Wars
Synopsis:
In the myriad of worlds, there exists worlds of godlike beings in the form of man. To avoid the conflict these beings create, the greatest of them intervened with a proposition. Take from another an idea. As existing in their archive of fictional worlds, there exists one in which man summoned beings of legend to fight for the coveted 'Holy grail'. This was known as the Holy Grail War according to this piece of fiction. Liking this idea, the people of this world consented but found themselves at a loss. Who would be their 'servants'? Thus the figure thought up a solution. For a fictitious war, why not use fictitious people. That became the bases to this world's grail wars.
Seven classes. Seven classes of servants and masters. One side the people of fiction while another the side of reality. One great war. Among this conflict is one respectable family: the Pavillions. When the war started, they stood to the side and did nothing. But as time moves on, they make their decision. What mark will they leave behind after the wars have run their course?
This is a piece of fiction using information provided by other pieces of fiction. As such, this is both a fanfiction and a parody. I do not own any character or work existing in another form. Support any work existing in this fiction if possible.

Title: Ghost Girl, Ghost Girl. She Gonna Take Your Soul!
Synopsis:
Ghost Girl had no name or she didn’t want to use it, for she… is dead. Ghosts like her appeared due to lingering attachments to the physical world or unfinished business. Her unfinished business were her horrible parents!
She will haunt them. Or kill them! 
Thus, the haunting (killing) adventures of Ghost Girl.
 
Image drawn by Lizalot. I thought this image was a great fit as a cover.

Title: Battlesquire Book I  -  First Blood
Synopsis:
There was nothing Jess craved more than the rush of battle, having trained for endless hours in mastering all the weapons of war. She would do anything to prove herself worthy, anything to be granted the rights and privileges of every knight who fought for the Crown.
Anything not to be relegated to the status of simpering handmaiden, a wallflower at court whose only purpose was to be meek and demure for the pleasure of arrogant men she despised.
When a certain professor of etiquette makes it clear that she would see Jess broken and humbled, forced to submit to a lady's proper role, Jess will do whatever she must to escape that fate.
Even if it means blackening her dagger for king and country, learning what it truly means to be a Squire of War.
 
(Warning: Though it starts off gently -  sex, graphic violence, heroism, and betrayal are all part of the story.)

Title: World of Eliya
Synopsis: Julien and Andre are best friends, playing and training together since they were young they were insepertable. On a fateful day, Andre had hit Julien on the head and cause him into a coma for three days. After waking up he had seem different however he was still the same best friend that Andre had knew. Andre is strong willed and is not worried to be vocal about his opinions while Julien was steady and myesterious, revealing his ideas only when he feels nesscary. On the path to become the strongest and seek the truth of the world, they must become the strongest magnus`s this world has ever seen, after all... Strong rules the weak.Follow these two`s journey to become the strongest`s magnus in a world filled with mysterious wonders. Author`s Note: Thanks for reading. I will do my best to keep these "arcs" decently sized. again Thanks for reading please comment and give me any feed back. Postive and negative is fine with by. ALso please Rate my story if possible! Thanks !

Title: [HIATUS] PLAYER: LEVEL 0
Synopsis:
Virtual Reality does not even exist in this period of time, how come Ling Ru is able to play a game, that feels so real?
Upset about his family undermining his gaming habits, again and again, Ling Ru's mental fire begins to rage as he rushes out into the night on a rainy day. He likes MMORPGs and RPGs, why does he have to study hard? For his second time, he failed his University Exams, which means he would have to repeat another year.
While fuming and bitching to himself, he seeks out a new comrade, a rather cute one. Actually, he found a cute cat standing on the road while walking on the sidewalk, maybe not a real comrade, but at least something living he could bitch about his family with, or rather to.
Surprisingly this cat stood on the road and obediently listened to everything he said, it carried on for quite a few minutes before he noticed something weird. The cat was stone, or rather it had not moved for quite a long time. He tried making sounds and scaring it, nothing works.
He decides to check why it is acting so weird, as he approaches the cat, it does not even fret, it's still. When he comes in near proximity to the cat, something weird happens. A blinding light and a loud honking noise.
Written by Matt / Xazin from Team YunekThis is a personal story of mine, but if you like my work you can find more of Team Yunek by looking at our other story 'A Nerd's Wuxia Tales' There is a huge genre difference, but it's worth reading!
