Title: Trickster's Way
Synopsis: In a world where at the age of 10, children are taken to Power Hall to be tested on whether they have Mana.There are 15 known powers:Strength, Speed, Stealth (Darkness), Combat, Marksman, Weapons, Alchemists (Nature), Fire, Earth, Water, Air, Light, Time, Space, Death.But there is the Forgotten Power, The one rarely seen, Chaos, they who possess this power are known as the Tricksters.Thought to be a myth, it was rumoured that they were either the strongest or the weakest of all powers. The tricksters were feared and loved as they are erratic by nature.They could be kind one minute and cruel the next.It was said that they have the power to either save the world or destroy it.This is the story of a young boy growing from the slums of Golden City to the high heavens and beyond.That boy was named Lux Tenebra.Created 31/12/2015 - XX/XX/XXXXPlease vote if you like the Chapters.

Title: Infinity Arcana
Synopsis:
Nijima Asuha doesn't quite understand herself not that is her biggest concern. After all what she knows she likes being spoiled by her husband and doing things for him as he warmly looks at her. She especially likes his warm touch on where scars 'used' to be. Aside from fighting and killing and cooking and super enhanced brain her social skills and common sense is very much distorted, hence she's easily gullible. One of her friends who likes to see the world burn decided in a term of chaotic good decided to tell her a hidden secret that all her friends know. Her husband has a lot of fan-girls who love him inside the VR-Game by the name [Infinity Arcana]. Surprisingly due to her husband valiant and roguish and gentle personality a lot of young girls love him after knowing stories of his heroic adventures.
So she decides to enter the game to accompany her husband in order to ensure that no lioness approaches him. She enters the game where Arcanas are defined by players personalities and emotions and experiences. Interesting no? In a game where strength is mostly defined through Arcanas what ought she to do? Awaken dem Arcanas. In what way? In the most conspicuous way possible.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Author: Hello this is Phan. This story is inspired by Persona 5 and [Infinite Dendrogram]. English is not my native so do kindly advise me on my errors. Also this story going to mention a lot of names that I've yet to decide. So help me pick out few good names from ancient to foreign to whatever you find rings well. And for those who are thinking something along the lines of [2 of swords] and [ace of wands] and such it is not like that. Indeed it is a card and Arcana to boot but the game works much like embryo from [Infinite Dendrogram] where you can awaken powers that suits you but in a different form for example early spoiler the husband has the [Storm] Arcana due to his personality that faces everything head on and experiencing a total storm some time ago in the game. So pretty much Arcanas can be considered words. And how each work is up to the player to find out.

Title: Lia and Lara will seek the One Piece
Synopsis:
Now it's already the third round for the strange chicken loving being that was called Clair, Dexter and Kara. What will it do if it has the chance to roam the world of One Piece? And will it be able to hold on to its love of Kurama? Will the Straw Hats be their enemy, their ally or is there maybe no connection to them at all?
Follow it and see how it builds its own crew and sails the Grand Line, leaving chaos and doing questionable things on her road to the One Piece. But remember, only one thing is sure, there will be chicken! 
 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Yeah, my third story, if you exclude the one shot^^. Hope I won't struggle with a good end, as I have with the others.... But be warned, there is a high chance that I will have to place it on Hiatus for some time. But that won't happen until I reach the current One Piece storyline. And maybe I will kill them off somewhere along the line, remember the Grand Line is dangerous^^.
 
The cover is made by NBadonK, and remade by OnLin3. The size was not matching RR's standards....

Title: Unshackled
Synopsis:
Humanity had always been an arrogant species. They pushed into the reaches of space with confidence and authority because  they assumed that any sentient life they met would be rational, scientific species much like themselves. They were wrong...
Instead, they were exposed to a world of magic, gods, and entities that could not be explained or quantified by Einstein, Newton, or Darwin...
...Earth has long since been destroyed and humanity has been turned into slaves or servants by the advanced species of the universe. They are treated worse than animals because they do not possess the Spark. An untouchable, uknowable characteristic of all sentient species that allow them to use magic. Ket, the victim of violent and painful magical experimentation, acquires the Spark and begins his journey to free his people and reclaim a home. On his journey, he is besieged by a society that does not consider him worthy of self-determination, an obscure magical cult that believes he is the key to Ascension, a world-spanning empire that wants to see humanity eradicated, and a multitude of god-like beings who see mortals as nothing more than a means of entertainment.

Title: Absolution
Synopsis:
When using the last of his will and power, he had removed the creator of all from existence. Along with the creator, the creation itself has disappeared and he was left alone in the endless abyss.
Using what little strength he has left, he begins to reconstruct what he can slowly..
__________________
 
I might have messed up creating the first chapters since it is my first time writing, but improvements are made with every new chapter so do not be afraid to read even if it's painful

Title: The Lost Crest
Synopsis:
It started in the research building when a black hole appeared and devoured everyone in it. Finn, a wealthy boy, was one such person. He finds himself in the middle of a desert, naked with only his friend by his side. 
He soon has to realize that he is in a completely different world when people force him into slavery. His missing sister only adds to his troubles, and his cowardly best friend, packed with a group of delusional slaves don't help him either.
But it won't take long for him to realize that nothing is as it seems, loyalties are put into question and add in a few conspiracies and you've got your back against the wall doubting those you trust most.
Will he escape the hopeless grasp of darkness, or will he succumb to the brutality of this harsh reality? Can he find his sister? Follow his tale, as he digs deeper into the unknown of the Continent of Kies.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------Any and all criticism is welcome.
Will release 5 chapters a week, Monday-Friday.
My Patreon has the most up to date chapters free, but are unedited.
You can also follow my story on my website at thyfilthynoob.wordpress.com
Any and all criticism is welcome, thanks for reading my story.
The cover is mine an original creation all copywrites reserved.

Title: Path of the Glutton
Synopsis:
Life on Earth has changed. Gone is the simple life of cat videos and snacks and now we have magic, monsters, dungeons and classes to worry about. All I want to do is live an easy life and enjoy tasty things! Guess I need to get stronger so I can enjoy all the tasty things I can!
I mean how can I enjoy the tasty things of this life if I die? Yup, let's get stronger and then enjoy all the snacks this world has to offer!

Title: The Kind Devil
Synopsis:
Five veteran players of the old-fashioned but outdated VRMMO game, Orge's Bone, meet in the game for one last time before leaving forever. As real life friends, they were torn apart by certain matters, and now decided to say goodbye in the way they know best; a free for all battle royale. However, little do they know that fate has a twist to spin. As they fight it out in a folorn map, they stumble upon a secret teleport gate. Out of curioisity, they all enter it. They find a world more graphicly advanced than the current number one game, and NPCs that really don't act like they should. The game settings are similar to Orge's Bone; there are no levels, only physical strenght gains, which is gained by killing monsters and completing quests. They treat the hidden world as their greenhouse– a place to retreat when the real world treats them unfairly. But after a while, they discover no everything is as it seems– that the hidden world is far more dangerous.
 
 
 
 
 
 
Michael is a cultivator whose goal in life is to change the tragic martial world, where killing is like breathing, into a land of peace. It will center a lot around how he'll change the perspectives of those around him, and how he tries to draft more cultivators to his cause, starting with the toughest nut to crack, the ruthless, bloodthirsty and easily-triggered Rector. Last but not least, with how he is met by the greatest tragedy and is forced to make the hardest choice.

Title: Spooky ☆ Scary
Synopsis: Ojo Rodomowo is your average, run-of-the-mill, self-loathing Japanese highschool student who's just moved into the city, until he finds out he's the chosen king of the undead. With this new-found informations comes a great deal of new-found power, and an even greater deal of enemies who would want to take that power from him. In order to fulfil his destiny he's got to fight all that stands in his way, stop the skeleton war, and learn the meaning of friendship, or something gay like that. Will he be able to do it? I don't know, let's read and find out.

Title: Dungeon Sect
Synopsis:
On  hiatus. Just have too much that happen in succession to have regular  updates. will keep writing just wont be posting chapters for a while
 
Jade was once a human on earth, many eons ago. He died and went to a cultivation universe. Sadly he was never heaven's choosen with heaven breaking luck. He was average and bland. When his brother was shining light he was the stabling post supporting him. Many sought to take down the light, but knew they were nothing to light so they tried to take down the post.
Jade died in the cultivation universe, not without learning more than most in their billion year life times. He was not a genius by any means he was just well learned. Now he is a dungeon, with mana instead of Qi. Still he can cultivate and learn again. Who will he teach and help become a shining light
Warning I am not the best writer, and it will take awhile to build to more of an action adventure story with dungeon building as a side as the story will shift from Jade the dungeon to his choosen students
I use Cultivating Dungeon, and The bound dungeon as systems to build off of, but the story is all mine

Title: Record Of The Immortal Teacher
Synopsis:
What happens when your master abandons you, you who has no family left behind....
What path is left for you, you who has been chased by every firmament...
What choice will you follow, you who has already gained immortality...
Find out the everyday life of a young immortal who starts cultivating and teaching in a small sect.

Title: Teolteco
Synopsis:
Great walls separates the modern metropolis from the post apocalyptic wastelands where the time stopped at the end of the war. But surely the war is over? What is the Council of the Great Five? What is the secret of General Yanagawa?
But when world is facing interal conflict danger is coming from the outside...
But... is it the truth? 
 
Teolteco is an open, post apocaliptic world driven by community in Poland. I plan to translate one chapter per week at the start.

Title: Wrath of the chosen (DROPPED)
Synopsis:
Wrath of the chosen follows Jon sizlash, a forensic pathologist that is brutally murdered by some hired guns. However instead of going to whatever awaits you after death, his soul is summoned by Rignath the god of entertainment, for the purpose of saving another world while bringing joy to the gods of the multiverse. Unsurprisingly Jon gets pissed and promises two things to Rignath; 1 that he will save the world, but he will do so using his methods and 2 that when he is done Rignath owes him any one favor.
DROPPED

Title: Crimson
Synopsis: A lonely god dies reincarnates 1000 year later , the wheels of fated start moving he will face many obstacles, He will meet new friend,foes,and loved ones.

Title: One Piece's Messenger of the Sea
Synopsis:
When Adam Bailley gets recommended to read One Piece by one of his customers, he enjoyed it's absurdity more than he thought he would. Unfortunately God seems to have played a prank on him as before he could finish it he woke up in the body of a young fishman in East Blue. What's a guy to do in this situation?
OC + Strawhat fic. No devil fruit or plans for shipping with Nami or Robin, sorry. I want to keep the spirit of the original.

Title: Big Bird In Sky Go Boom
Synopsis: A big boss returns to the world after a long time and finds out shit happened. So the big boss has to do some stuff and like achieve some goals that the boss has in order to like make it all better. In short this is a story about a badass doing stupid things.

Title: Super Novice ©
Synopsis:
In the Union once their youths come of age, and determined to have a above-average level of strength they’re conscripted into the Union's army. 
But before they’re shipped off to the front lines as cannon fodder, they first must go through a year long training camp at Newbie Town, where they will be given the Novice class to hone their abilities and given a chance to gain a more powerful class before the year is over, or else they will be ship off to the front lines with the second weakest class of soldier. But unfortunately most of them will only become corpse lining the battlefield as they lack the talent or ability to survive the front lines. 
Now enter Atlas Mule, freshly freed from his father choose to go to Newbie Town of his own volition. But what will Atlas do with the time limit of a year to find a class, will he find a class or merely become cannon fodder? And what about the teens around him who have been granted superhuman powers and strength, and zero restrictions on using them? Well what do you  think he’s going to do?! Well read and find out!

P.s. He’s going to fight and make friends. That is what Altas will do. Incase you're curious. 
Author's note: This is my first story so there will be mistakes aplenty, please help me find them.
The Update schedule will be whenever I feel like it, but I do intend to finish the story and I do have a vague plotline. Plus this story is my first attempt at writing, plus all and all just a rough draft, that I likely will heavily rewrite at some point.

Title: The Void reader
Synopsis:
I do not own the rights to the cover.
This is not the tale of the Harem king.....
This is not the tale of the man who killed God.....
This is the tale of a Man who just wanted to live.

Title: The Roving Dungeon
Synopsis:
A first date goes disastrously wrong: a new unwanted room-mate, an unplanned pregnancy, and trouble with the authorities.

Author's note: I'd suggest not committing to this story until you see at least ten chapters up. At that point I'll feel like the story is up and running and I will be taking The Pledge.I have a really good line editor, but she won't be taking a look until I'm a few chapters in, so the grammar might be rough until then.

Title: The Light Knight
Synopsis:
A man reincarnates. He is born in a new world, one filled with monsters and magic.
Pyromancers decimate jungles, Cryomancers walk over frozen oceans, Electromancers kill behemoths in seconds, Geomancers build castles in hours, Aeromancers soar through the skies, Sciomancers blacken the sun, and Biomancers grow fields of crops in mere days.
However, this man can't use any of these magical elements; he can only use the weakest of the magical elements: Photomancy - light.

Title: I Bought Some Guy's Soul On eBay
Synopsis:
Emma Green is an antique collector, buying and selling items on the Internet in hopes of making a profit or finding something interesting to add to her extensive collection. On the other side of the U.S., a man puts a listing on eBay. "Certificate of Ownership for your very own Human Male Soul. I don't believe in any sort of God, nor that what we call a 'soul' actually exists. To the highest bidder."
If you've read the title, you already know what happens. Two hours after purchasing it, Emma dies in a freak accident. Turns out God is not okay with that, and gives her a choice. Stay in Purgatory, or do a little job for him in a certain fantasy world. Which will she choose? 
This is my first fic, so please forgive any errors I make with wording or with those troublesome tables. Give it a read!

Title: RE: MOEMON
Synopsis: A story of a death and rebirth into a fun new world.

Title: The Black Hearted
Synopsis: War is the ballad of the brave, the hunger in the night, the power of the mad. The galaxy remains shattered with power struggles clashing within clusters of stars. Here, heroes are born, villains made, nightmares unleashed, cults playing the next messiah, alien intruders conquer, and mankind stands alone.

Title: the new god of reapers
Synopsis: The story is in modern japan in the city of Tokyo, the story centers on a 16-year-old boy named Kazuto Takamoto and all the people around him, in this work of fiction, magic exists but it’s different of what we thought, there are 6 types of magic, human(common) beast (power) angel and demon(morality), reaper(deadly) and god(almighty) our protagonist "Kazuto" is a half mix between reaper and an unclassified soul that no one except him and some few people know. In this work, we will see most of fights and how he tries to find redemption for everyone around him.

Title: The Hanged Man
Synopsis: Alphonse Graves was but a simple salaryman, trying to live his days peacefully. When tragedy struck, he lost everything, including the purpose of his life. Now a man without anything to lose, Alphonse swore to take down upon the injustices of society. Follow Alphonse in his quest as he dives into the pit of insanity!

Title: I love Shounen
Synopsis: Senichi Kato is the victim of school bullying at the hands of everyone (girls mostly), and has given up on ever trying to find joy his life. Well that all changes when his class gets a new student. Endo Yutaka is the new pretty face boy that all the girls love and some of the guy want to be around. Everyone tries to get his attention, everyone except Kato. Yutaka quickly takes an interest in Kato making the boy feel a little uneasy. Why Kato, and for what reason? (LGBTQ)

Title: Beast Tamer Kayne
Synopsis:
Hi, im Kayne. Im an Evolutionist, Beast Tamer, Alchemist, Explorer and all round great guy.
If you wanna watch me tame crazy dangerous beasts, fight people, Experiment and explore, then you need to start reading

Title: Beastmastery - A LitRPG Novel
Synopsis:
When Anika's son tells her that he has joined an e-sports team and will be playing full-time in a popular VRMMORPG, she starts to panic. There are reports of players leaving the game in very poor health, needing months of physical and mental rehabilitation.
Her attempts at contacting him from outside the virtual world are unsuccessful, so she is left with only one option if she intends to find him and talk some sense into him. She will have to sign up for an account and enter the game herself.
The question remains if she will be able to find her son before it is too late...

Title: Citadel World: The URANUS code
Synopsis: Rick was born and raised in the Omicron Commune, protected from the monsters and darkness of the Expanse outside with thick walls. A place with barely enough light to see by, constantly gripped by the cold. The death of the Commune is only a question of time. Meeting visitors from the Expanse turns Rick's view of the world upside down. It turns out that there are other humans that live outside and fight to survive, while the Commune is but one of many sectors of Expanse. Rick's new goal becomes saving the commune from destruction. Worried about the future of his sister, he puts his trust in the outsiders, escaping the Commune to find and restart the mysterious thermal generators, find the key and solve the riddle of the gigantic Thermopolis—a high-tech citadel created by the ancestors.He is now a rebel and a heretic and there's no turning back!

Title: Into The Void
Synopsis:
Theo, a boy with disfigured memories, finds himself awoken in a world of demons and immortals.
With death seemingly at every turn, will the young Theo recover his memories and reclaim his birthright, or fall to a hidden false amity along the way?

Please take note that it's my first time ever creating such a large piece of writing, thoughts on chapters are always appreciated! c:

Title: Great War of Cheater! Another World Strategic Warfare
Synopsis:
Story : Linker
Illustrator : RFTaurus
                                                 ***
   Renardi Putra, 25 years old, find himself inside of pure white space like room. didn't know what happen to him, he try to find a way out from there but suddenly he hear a voice--
   “Welcome to all of our candidate… Now, I’ll explain the rule of this Great War for all of you!”
   --that will be the sign of the deadly game between 16th Reincarnated Cheater in another world!

Title: The Mimic's Eyes
Synopsis:
This is my first web fiction, please support it.
I can't think of a good summary to put here so I'll leave it for later.
This story is a a reincarnated dark elf girl with the power to copy actions she sees performed. She was previously an orphaned boy who died in his sleep and now in her current life has lost her village to bandits. Now she will master abilty, learn its limits and exact revenge on the people who destroyed her village. In a world where the dark elves are hated she will carve a legend for herself.

Title: Celestial Fox
Synopsis:
One day, the world of Asela was attacked by ferocious beasts, covering the people in chaos and despair. Hunted down by a common enemy, the races united and together, they found a method to gain power to fight back against the beasts. In the present, the races once again fought against each other, trying to reign over one another and reach the top of the world. But only a miniscule amount know the entrance of someone who will change the world together with the fate of many others.

There is no real schedule, but I will try one chapter a week. If you wish to read the latest chapters directly as it comes, go to https://celestialfox.club.I will also update some parts without notice. But if I make a major change, I will be posting a notice.

Title: A month of Love and a Day of Suffering
Synopsis: Shiro is a high school student who's just minding his own business, until Riko comes into his life and changes it, for better or worse.

Title: Bored Hero
Synopsis:
Being immortal sounds fun...for the first a hundred, maybe two hundred years.
Than you get to a thousand...and then two thousand and luckily I haven't reached three thousand years of utter bloody boredom yet but it is right around the corner.
...If boredom was a pleasure, I would be in an eternal orgasm...

Title: God in Deep
Synopsis: Story of a mass murderer seeking redemption, the birth of a society, and the speculations of a man in the middle of nowhere and the center of everything.

Title: Fall from Paradise
Synopsis: Atticus Gale is a lot smarter than he leads people to believe, he's brilliant, young, and right where he wants to be. When a highschooler from Compton is forced into a new world filled with magic and mosters how will he cope? Will Atticus be able to survive using what he knows from his world or will he be extinguished like so many other unfortunate souls.

Title: Law of Divine Gates
Synopsis: What is transcendence? There are those on countless planets who believe creation ended with them. The notion that they are God's chosen people, and nothing else existed beyond them became a firmly rooted ideal. An arrogant assertion you say? Well there you have it, ignorance is something mortals never have a lack of. This is not transcendence, to transcend is to explore the limits of existence, to constantly grow, and lay claim to all the universe has to offer. Transcendence is to not be constrained by ideals, or the planet of your birth, to transcend is to leave behind your Mortal shell, to challenge heaven's law, and formulate your own. Heaven would see mortals bowed in servitude until the end of their days, to reincarnate, and begin another lifetime of worship, giving praise to the gods. A young demon accidentally stepped through the gateway of endless possibilities, will he succumb to heaven's authority?

Title: Orc Lord
Synopsis:
A young woman just starting out in life is killed tragically in a car accident. However, she soon regains consciousness as a baby in a fantasy world. But... she's an Orc?!
It would be good if she could just enjoy her new life quietly, but she seems destined for war and carnage. How will she fare as a monster in a fantasy world?
________________ 
This story will have a total of three arcs:
Arc 1, The Birth of Babylon: 571 pages (complete)
Arc 2, The Baphomet War: 420 pages (complete)
Arc 3, The Mad Queen of Carnage: (in progress)
________________
Ultimately, I'm writing this for enjoyment. If you enjoy it too, fantastic!
Gore: Extremely infrequent, but moderately intense.
Profanity: There are a few swear words here and there, as well as some more creative insults.
Traumatizing Content: While I'm at it, there are some questionable morals displayed (mostly after chapter 77). So far we can check off slavery, brainwashing, war, and genocide. 
This story starts off very Light Novel-ish because I was reading a lot of them at the time. The writing style gradually matures as it goes. Sorry, but I don't have the stamina to go back and fix everything, even if I know it gets pretty roughshod at times.
New readers, please keep in mind, I make use of "unreliable narrators" at times.
My story accepts donations, but it is free to read and I've only uploaded it here. 
Lastly, Orc Lord is a member of the WriTEr's Pledge, which means I have sworn to see it through to a satisfying ending. One of my long breaks triggered a dishonor, but I'll redeem it someday when it's actually finished. I'm the ultimate necromancer author. ;P

Title: Neutron
Synopsis: Neutron is about a group of 4, that work's on a mining vessel named USS Neutron. and travel's around the universe seeking mining belts, and make some bad decisions.

Title: The Far Edge of Fate
Synopsis:
Silver wasn't supposed to have survived. Abandoned as a babe and saved on a whim by the ruthless ruler of crime in Lesand, Rath, every day has been a struggle for survival, so far as she can remember. Rath made it clear that, while he saved her life and would train her, he would not help her if it meant sacrificing himself. Nor would he expect her to lay down her life for him.
While living in the slums is not easy, it is peaceful overall. The criminals and residents of the slums are a genial bunch as long as business interests don’t conflict. And everyone is united by one thing: pure, unadulterated hatred for the corrupt who see fit to exploit the slums. Without any mages to protect them, any inherently gifted stolen away before they can walk, the slums are at the mercy of the nobles. This life, those in her town, her slums...these things are worth protecting in Silver’s mind. And so she does, until one day her protection pushes too far, revealing more than she ever cared to and casting her onto the far edge of fate.

Title: AGE: Survivors of the Black Sun
Synopsis:
This was the day no one had expected. Everything that was once considered "normal" had ended in a snap of ones fingers. An orb had opend up in the sky.... black like a single spot on a white shirt. This was the dubed "Black Sun Event". Out of the "Black Sun" Demons of all shapes and sizes, ranging from humanoid to pure demonic began to feast in a frenzy of human blood. In a mater of months the entire West coast of the U.S was nothing more then decayed bodys and lakes filled with blood.
   We tried fighting back... Luckly we got some where. But Im getting ahead of myself. Lets start from the begining... My name... is Alex... Alexander Grand. Oh and be perpared... for an Epic tale of Godly perportions.

Title: Tale about fire
Synopsis:
This tale starts like many others, with a slave boy that escaped and now seeks the power to never suffer in the hands of another again, with an unbalanced and cruel world where the strong rule and the weak serve, filled with natural dangers and opportunities to the ones that call themselves practitioners, the ones who seek the power of the Four.
It follows as the disgusted by the world boy, resolved to change it by fire and destruction if needed find his way into the practitioners’ world in a search for true strength. Little the boy knew that his fate, or chains if you would, bounded him to so much more than just that.
-
 I apologize in advance for any grammatical mistakes, part of why I’m writing this tale is to get better in the language. It’s also my first story so constructive criticism is appreciated.

Title: Fantasy Circle Of Life
Synopsis:
we follow the journey of a soul that goes throught the circle of life more than once and each time they get a free skill and keeps there memory's, if there random bouts of amnesia doesn't affect them and hthere status.
 
going to say this beforehand, i got very bad anexianty enoth that it causes my memory to fail me sometimes, my aim is to do atleast one chapter a week or more but if i forget please send me a message to remind me.

Title: Calamity's Chosen: Howling at the Moon (DROPPED)
Synopsis:
"It's not like I really want to be the best and beat everyone else or anything. I just want to become the strongest that I can be."
Those are Suri Rain's thoughts when she first starts playing Calamity's Chosen, the new VRMMO that's got gamers everywhere frenzied with excitement. With the tagline of "Make your choice," one of its most boasted about features is the immense amount of races and playstyles to choose from.
So Suri chooses- a wolf.

Title: One Contract to Divinity
Synopsis:
The Brightlight Empire has reigned supreme on the Malthus Continent for centuries since its origin nearly a millennium ago. Under Imperial might, the various nations that used to coexist with the Brightlight Empire are now vassals, absorbed, or in ruins. The will of the Divine Emperor stretches from the Western Ocean to the Eastern Ocean, and from the Northern Desert to the Southern Wastes. Hailing from a long line of Emperors and Empresses, the Divine Emperor rules with the blind devotion of his subjects. Endowed with enough magical power to live as a God, the Divine Emperor is also able to bestow some of the Imperial Divinity to his subjects. 
 
Nearing the thousandth year since the Empire was founded, the Divine Emperor has declared that the celebrations will last for a year when the New Year starts. Only with the massive resources and wealth of a hegemon could such a thing even be thought possible. However, not all is well in the Empire of the Divine Sun. 
 
Court intrigue has neared an all time high. Rumors float from the Capital to the countryside that the Divine Emperor will declare his successor sometime during the celebrations. The Empire’s armies have grown complacent without a rival to challenge them. Revolts in the vassal nations have always been crushed nearly as fast as they happened, but the Imperial Oracles have seen disturbing portents. 
 
Old powers independent of the Imperial Divinity are rumored to have returned. Ambassadors to the vassal states have reported border skirmishes between many of the subsidiary kingdoms and nations. Whispers and plots seem to be as commonplace as light during the day. Will the Brightlight Empire be able to maintain its status as sole hegemon of the Malthus Continent? Only time will tell.

Title: Out Foxed
Synopsis:
A spoiled rich boy, Jason had never had to really worry about anything. Everything, including friends, could be bought.
'Rage of the Gods' from Second Heaven Entertainment seemed an easy target. A new VRMMORPG that was an easy target to buy into. The life he was avoiding having to work for in the real world, was waiting for him just around a Virtual corner.
 
Not truly Xianxia, but influenced by the genre.
Caveat; only roughly edited so far.

Title: Scientist Vs Magic
Synopsis:
Anna George Lucas is a scientific genius who has scientific breakthroughs many times before and she is known through history as mother of science. But something unexpected happened and now she found herself in another world!
Being unfamiliar on another world is a bit difficult but, with her knowledge as a genius, she split  her time between developing new projects like freezing plasma pistols and atomic plant while find the way home.
This is the story of a woman with nothing but genius brain, tried her best to survive in this world, where magic exists.

Title: Orange Days
Synopsis:
It wasn't supposed to be like this.
"Don't c-cast, just wait!"  the woman said with a quivering voice.  One of the boys was conjuring a snowball.  Lin turned back and forced a grin.
"Don't worry, I got this," she said and made a gesture.  The woman screamed as the fireball went odd.
-
Lin Harper was summoned to another world and hailed as a hero.  They asked her about her class and then everything went wrong.

Title: E. Clipse(Slow Releases For Now)
Synopsis:
A story I posted on wattpad but decided to post it here too.
Ethan Clipson is a young man that never liked the way the world felt. One day his father whom was never home got him the new True Dive system. Ethan figures that maybe, he can find the life, he wants so desperately, in this new game. But is it really just a game?
Also posted on my other account Otaku_Rexceed on wattpad.com

Title: Blood Throne
Synopsis:
What is defined normal?
Being quiet?
Being loud?
Finn was thought to be normal by every one of in classmates and often bullied because of his quiet and uncaring attitude. Little did they know about the monster inside of him being suppressed. It was never supposed to be awakened for eternity, but disasters happen... and that disaster was the Throne.
Welcome to the new age of Throne.
 
This is my first novel so pls don't be too rough with the criticism.

Title: I want to restart my world but still have my knowledge and a few cheats
Synopsis: I HAVE REACH BOUNDLESS INFINITY AS A GOOD FOR NOTHING. NOW I WANT TO RESTART IN ANOTHER WORLD BEING THE ULTIMATE GENIUS alternate story. Still another OP story. Same cutivation stuff from the other story.

Title: Squire of War 2.0
Synopsis:
Eager to live life on her own terms, Jess has made a name for herself Highrock Academy, where the most dedicated students are forged into elite warriors for the battles to come. Jess embraces her new life with fierce joy, valued for her skills alone.Until she makes a fateful choice that costs her everything, all prestige and honor stripped away, mocked and shamed by the entire school.It is only then that her enemies strike, determined to see her fall. But her fall alone is not enough.A vicious trap is sprung, endangering Highrock and everyone within. Jessica's bitter exile then becomes a desperate mission to rescue her friends from hideous creatures of darkest shadow. Yet to save them she'll have to risk her very soul, embracing powers dark and terrible as she confronts the horrors of living dream, determined to give her foes a nightmare they'll never forget.
Please note, this story is more in the vein of classic fantasy! There is definitely power progression, but there's no character sheets or leveling per se! - Only the first 5 chapters are up. But if you like what you see, you can read the entire series on Kindle Unlimited for free!
If you're in the mood for a post apocalyptic litrpg about a band of rogues determined to steal a fortune in gold (and power up like mad) underneath the noses of everyone trying to kill them, then check out my Battleforged series, also on Royal Road!
If leveling up in a world filled with cultivating titans is more your thing, then check out my Silver Fox & The Western Hero series!

Title: pokemon new age
Synopsis:
Dylan, a Culivator from the dragonic clan dies and is reincarnated in the body of a 8 year old boy in the world of Pokemon. No longer bound by the responsibilities of a clan or its rules, Watch as Dylan embarks on a journey to see this whole new world and lives this new life by his own rules. Some of his new goals in this life: See the world and become a pokemon master!
Some things to know about this novel:
Ash will most likely not appear in this story. (never cared for the character)
There will be romance in this novel; possibly a harem but that will NOT be the main focus. 
The main character will not stay 10 years old either. 
Unlike most novels, The main character will not know have the unfair advantage of knowing the story line or know what pokemon are. He will learn as he goes just like any reincarnator. 
Although he will possess the ability to cultivate, The MC will not be OP right away. That is going to take time. years in fact and there will not be many time skips either so you will watchas he will be like any other trainer starting out his journey.
Updates will be once a week for now until I finish my state exam in september then it will be two to three.

Title: The Genius Manipulator
Synopsis:
A high schooler, Kastille, who deems himself as a genius manipulator, is planning on creating his own kingdom. By manipulating the students to his will, he has nearly taken control of the entire school. Through his own skills and talents, he blackmails, coerces, extorts, and uses anyone and anything in order to get his goal in life: to be able to live without hardship after he graduates by receiving the fruit of the labor from the people under his control. 
 Will he triumph and live a life of luxury or will he see his empire burn to ashes?

Title: The Last Wraith
Synopsis:
Wraiths, entities that can destroy the balance of the world with their very existence, yet history only remembers them as myth, legends, or fairytales. Five centuries have passed since the Great War of the Five Kingdoms, and only vague records and events remain of such a war. Yet, the rumored Last Wraith brought the calm for five hundreds years suddenly dissappears after the war. Perhaps the stories were just a a means to pass time? Or could it be that truth becomes blurred when the victors decide it?
The daughter of Duke Gerence von Wolfram, Lunavay von Wolfram, refuses to acknowledge that the rumor is just a story dedicates her life to finding the truth. What will she find in her journey to discover the truth about the Last Wraith? Or will she only be met with disappointments, treachery, and deceit? 
Five centuries shall unfold itself as Lunavay dives deeper into the past to learn of the events that brought about the calm, yet why does the Exiled Prince of the Kingdom of Raultivon play such an important role in the Great War?

Title: Full-time Magus
Synopsis: One magic researcher who had no ability to use magic himself had reached the peak of magic comprehension. Unsatisfied even with that, he tried to create an elemental suited only for himself so that his childhood dream of becoming a magus could be accomplished , however...

Title: Treasure
Synopsis: In Winterford ciry, a serial killer is murdering girls. After the death of someone important to her, Stella hired the Private Detective Agency to capture the killer.

Title: The Exalted King
Synopsis:
I was an ordinary boy on Earth,an orphan trying to make it big. Things don't go as planned though and I ended up being transmigrated to another universe.
Apparently I am now a Exalted one. A person chosen by an ancient artifact called the Omni Cube to explore and complete missions along with my team in new and mysterious worlds.
I don't have a heaven defying artifact nor a monstrous cultivation.Armed with nothing but the future, I will surpass all.

Title: The Keys to the Blankspace
Synopsis:
Ives was a normal college student who luckily found interdimensional keys that let him transport through time and space via interdimensional doors.
Unluckily, he uses it one too many times and gets trapped in an alternate realm known as the blank space.
This series does not contain much sci-fi, more psy-fi, and maybe a ko-fi ad. (Maybe not).

Title: Child God
Synopsis:
Do you ever wish to be reborn?
Do you think life is unfair?
A life with magic and swordplay in a fantasy world, is that your fantasy?
Do you want to start anew where you will be above everyone, and do as you wish?
Follow Hazake through his travels in an unknown world.

Title: Gunbreaker
Synopsis: The world is ruled by arms dealers, causing war and poverty to ravage the lesser developed countries. A lonely teenager comes into contact with some hacktivists, looking to start a revolution. Years later, while waiting for the subway to arrive, our Main Character Mark Paxton finds himself in a violent gunfight. The guy meets a girl, she drags him throughout a hot pursuit across the underground-tunnels until she murders two of her hunters in cold blood. Facing even greater danger, Mark finds himself dragged into a world of violence and death, while something inside him awakens. The goal, the fantasy ruling his teenage years: to end all armed conflict and break every gun on this planet.

Title: The Wayward Bard
Synopsis:
Apologies - I've had to remove the book due to it being available in KU

Daniel's Guide to Early Retirement:
1: Intercept illegal money transfer from mafia boss.2: Hide out in super exclusive Full Immersion Virtual Reality game until the heat is off.3: Roll a bard. Max out charisma. Live it up. 4: Profit.
With all the pesky planning out of the way Daniel set out to realize his ultimate dream: gaining enough money to buy a tropical island and spend his days playing the violin and RPGs. What could possibly go wrong?

As he grows, the world trembles; as he speaks, the world listens; what he wills, the world provides; common sense overturned by his power. 
A man is reborn from a previous life into a human, the weakest race on the planet. Along with him, a girl whom he saved in his last moments.
With the memories of Kai’s past and present life, can he conquer everything and truly be a Monarch?
Together with the residents of the new world, watch as they pierce through the boundaries and break through the chains of fate!
[Updated description]
Summary:
Kai dies trying to save a girl and is reborn as a human in another world, the being who reincarnated him and the girl he saved gave him the task of becoming a monarch which he made his goal along with meeting the girl he saved once more.

Title: Searching for meaning
Synopsis: Searching for meaning. Searching for meaning.Searching for meaning.Searching for meaning.Searching for meaning.Searching for meaning.Searching for meaning.

Title: I am an UnDead high school student and a Vampire's Butler. -UnDead Butler-
Synopsis: This is a story about a dead high school student and his ancient vampire classmate/master. And their everyday adventurers.

Title: Beyond the Path : Planet Velaria
Synopsis: War and conflict have plagued Velaria for ages, across multiple elven generations, because of this conflict, Eldrin had been left an orphan. Together with his friend Respen, Eldrin has trained at the prestigious Nemus Academy for some years, with the purpose of gaining the strength and knowledge to fight for their queen and kin. After a great discovery, Eldrin and Respen have acquired technology infused with innovative ways of bending their mana into new forms of magic. An upper hand in the war for elven supremacy against the dwarves and the meddling velarians.

Title: Alluring Smile (Yāoráo De Wéixiào)
Synopsis:
Have you ever loved someone?
            Ever miss someone -
                   Go through four seasons without him?
                           Feels like 10 Years.
                                 But when you finally see him -
                                            You hurt him…
 
A tale of how a woman tries to find her Master who sacrificed his soul for her.
But what would she do if to find him, she must lie, hurt, reject and leave her fiancé that sacrificed his everything for her.
And what would the fiancé do to get her back and start loving him again?
Follow the story of a loving ex-couple who brings shock and awe to the JiangHu World, as they play their roles in Ancient China, where they and their friends are entangled in a life of ancient tradition and culture.

Title: The Heroic Lines
Synopsis:
All people are born with talent, in someway, lurking beneath the skin, and for good or ill they will put it use.
  The world changes, in the blink of an eye it is turned on its head, fantasy and reality blurring lines as chaos descends. The world we know colliding with another strange new reality and humanity is pit against a foe it had long saught to discard; the unknwon. The choices made now would resonate through humanities' future as everything that had been built begins to crumble. And at the center of it all amidst the storm of chaos a man will stand, to climb the waves and match the wind, a story to ring through history.
  The world will change, and once more, there will be need for heroes...

Title: Only the Strong can Survive!
Synopsis: Zachary Collin's monotonous life takes a turn for the worst. Humanity is being forced to abandon earth and colonize an alien planet! Luckily, the mysterious power facilitating humanity's migration is willing to provide survival-training. Though his future is unclear, Zachary knows one thing for sure... Only the Strong can Survive!

Title: Mr Moonie's Marvelous Magic Show!
Synopsis:
In a world where death is reversed with a simple trip to the respawn temple, how can you make a death defying act entertaining?
Mickey is a stunt man. Business has slowed ever since computer graphics blew up in sophistication, with many in the film industry choosing to shoot entirely in virtual reality.
However, he see's this as an opportunity. Signing up for an account, he begins his journey into the virtual world. Join Mickey as he reconnects with his childhood dreams and proves the worth of a good stunt.

Title: a slave girl and a rat
Synopsis:
Vanessa's a slave in the kingdom of Aquebis, along with her companion, Arthur the rat, also a fellow slave. trying to struggle her way to freedom, it seems the world is just that much more than she expected, other than freedom, what else shall she long for? to have fun, have fun, have fun or have fun?
Arthur:"aren't those the same?"
Vanessa:"shut up"
Arthur:"..."
just writing for fun, say anything, enjoy.

Title: World of Rialacha
Synopsis:
My first, what will be probably unimpressive, work of fiction.
 
Luke is transported into a different world overnight. He has no idea how he got there, but its world that is like one out of the many LITRPG books he has read. Game mechanics, stats, classes(to an extent) self aware NPC's, quests, epic item's. Its got it all. He's stuck in that world with two people he has never met before and neither know the first thing about MMO's!

Title: Fury of the Wild [On Hold]
Synopsis:
Laman Rhynds, a young man and hunter by trade, tracks a deer deep into the forest near which he lives. But when he finally reaches his target, his life takes a strange turn. Monsters from other planes of existence have started manifesting all around the world, and Laman finds himself at the very center of the conflict.
 
Join Laman as he battles alongside Man, Beast and other mystical creatures in an attempt to save their very world from destruction.

Title: The Immortal Demon
Synopsis:
After losing all that was precious to him he walked the path of ruin and darkness in order to recover what he had lost only to fall into an even greater despair.
...
...
...
Sitting on his black throne, the last remaining demon, Lucifer, opened his eyes once again.

Title: The Cursed Throne
Synopsis:
After the 3rd Great World War also known as the 'Great Nuclear War', 60% of the Earth's population was wiped out. But because of the raditions the remaining 40 % was evolved.
500 years after the great world war, world changed completely. Somewhere in a dark alley, a boy covered in blood was rescued by a policeman during his patrol. Who is this boy? Why is he injured so seriously?

Title: Ogre's Bone
Synopsis: Five veteran players of the old-fashioned but outdated VRMMO game, Orge's Bone, meet in the game for one last time before leaving forever. As real life friends, they were torn apart by certain matters, and now decided to say goodbye in the way they know best; a free for all Battle Royale. However, little do they know that fate has a twist to spin. As they fight it out in a forlorn place of the map, they stumble upon a secret teleport gate. Out of curiosity, they all enter it, and find a world more graphically advanced than the current number one game, and NPCs that really don't act like they should. They think the game settings are similar to Orge's Bone at first; that there are no levels, only physical strength gains, which is gained by killing monsters and completing quests. They treat the hidden world as their greenhouse– a place to retreat when the real world treats them unfairly. But after a while, they discover that not everything is as it seems– that the hidden world is far more dangerous, and far more real than they initially thought.

Title: The Juggernaut
Synopsis:
It's always hard when you are at the receiving end of someone's anger or just plain outlet for violence and it always pain you as you cannot do anything to fight back. That is the everyday life of John and watch how it will change with the speed of light.
 
 
(New here critics are always welcome)

Title: Supreme Weapon Spirit: Legend of Maha [Temporary Hiatus]
Synopsis:
Long ago, the Furial was a land blessed by gods. There was Flaurn, Satier, and Dwargni. Flaurn was the god of fire and life. Satire was the god of resources and nature. Dwargni was the god of the forge. What happens when these three powers decide to go to heaven and leave their world behind?
Maha, the creation of Dwargni before he left to right the mistakes he made, travels the world in search of his creator and purpose in life, and as a result became the Supreme Weapon Spirit

Title: Doctor of Rebirth
Synopsis:
After retiring from being a doctor, John decides to take a long vacation by traveling the world to explore. What he didn’t expect is that one day while walking in the Sahara Desert the world changed and became a game. Will he survive? Or will he die?

Title: Zombie
Synopsis: The tale talks about a man who due to an twist of fate discovers being immortal or better to say a zombie so he attempts to find out what the fuck is going on in his life

Title: Mirrorworld
Synopsis:
The past, present and future. Some dwell onto the past and some must accept the future but we all live in the present. No matter from whatever universe you live in or whatever rock you hide underneath. The past will not change; the future will always be different for every single person and its how you live in the present that makes you feel alive. 
But lets say you could see the future, where everything is wrong and at the same time everything is right. What do you do at in the end? When the whole world you picture always seems so twisted and wrong and that there are people called 'Suits' flying around the world fighting VIllians? 

Author Note: This is my first web serial. Long time reader and ready to with this world that I created. I am still working on the jarring points in my writing and the characterization of my characters but hopefully, they seem atleast normal for you guys. 
I do not know how frequently I will update and I do not know If I will give you guys a schedule. 
Critism of my writing are wanted. I need more information so I can improve!

Title: Avoiding the Heroine and Capture Targets!

The students and instructors in Julienne Academy is expecting that Ashe Steinhart will be a muscleman because of being a training maniac since he's a kid. But what with this sudden revelation?! Ashe Steinhart is now a woman?!
Is he gay?
No, she's a genuine woman!
Ashe Steinhart as student works hard in her trainings and studies with the aim of being an unnoticeable person!
Yet, will that be possible with this crowd of high-spec men and women flocking at her?

Title: CHAOS
Synopsis:

One day, after a deep sleep he finds himself in a different place with a lovely face in front him. '
Let's find how the form of chaos faces his life,love and war ? Furthermore will he be able to go out of his loneliness.???

Title: Virtue of GODS
Synopsis:
After the 4th world war, the land was in turmoil. The world of Dharati achieved a lot in the field of science, but it came at the cost of entire countries wiped out from the face of the world. 
5years later, during the year 3015 4th April of Juvias calender, a twin brother and sister entered the country renowned psychic institute on the consent of their father, what does their fate carry, and what will become of their lives after this huge change?
This is the era of the 11th generation psychics after their seal was released, how will they affect the world? Will they make it burn into ashes or blossom it into a heavenly paradise?

Title: Necromancer and Co.
Synopsis:
In a time before the existence of the present, the gods decided to create a plane of existence where all their creations could exist in the same place. In it, all would be fair, and all gaps between races and technological advancements could be crossed with a single system that the gods had created. Every year, the gods would choose a new race to put in their land, and in this new group of beautifully unlucky people, Alen, his friends, and a few people from Earth have finally met their turn to be tossed into the playground of the gods.
Unfortunately though, Alen was thrust into a forest of corpse-eating bears and horribly smelly undead on his first day, one of the many danger-zones of the continent the gods had chosen to throw them in. It would be easy to say that he simply died within the first day, or that he'd starved to death or whatever, but let's be honest...
That story would be no fun to tell, yes?
(Re-write of my first fiction with the same name.)

Title: MANUS DEI: Harbinger (Book One of the Khamsa Chronicles)
Synopsis:
Finished story removed due to Amazon KDP Guidelines as the book is now published.
AMAZON LINK:
MANUS DEI: Harbinger (Book One of the Khamsa Chronicles) 
 
An angelic science fiction and demonic dark fantasy romp through present-day Earth.
With assault rifles. Sniper rifles. A tank or two. Grenades. Drones. Pulse beam machine guns. Longswords. Bastard swords. Axes. Weirdly named gear. Transport thingies. And don't forget the creepy-crawlies.
---------
A conflict as old as time. Fought in this world. With the weapons and science of humanity.The time of the Apocalypse is near. While Heaven waits, the minions of Hell have started infesting the world. Corrupting humanity and stealing the heavenly spark that connects mankind to God. Unless stopped, when the end comes, most of the divine power that exists in every person will belong to the Great Enemy.It falls to the shoulders of a few good men and women at the side of diminished angels to delay Armageddon. A retrograde action against the forces of darkness.One of them is Keith A. North, SEAL E-6 on detached service, left for dead in the sandbox. Recruited by the secretive Khamsa, an organization almost as old as recorded history, he learns how to fight against nightmares made real. Limited by rules as ancient as the struggle against Hell.
IMPORTANT NOTICE
No disrespect is meant to any religion, military unit, government or officially not-a-government agency, black ops group, corporation, sinister cabal, or any other person or entity, whether known or still secret. This is but a work of literary fiction and imagination.

Title: Starvation March : Voidborn
Synopsis:
Born from the void, a being is finally given the greatest gift possible: Life.
It's very core composed of endless slaughter and an even more neverending hunger, how will this being cope with the rest of the universe?
Shunned due to it's past, hated because of it's powers and it's loved ones in peril, how far will this being go in order to continue living happily?
Embracing it's nature, carrying slaughters and unspeakable horrors, these are mere trivialities for the being. After all, it's not known as the Slaughterer for nothing.
[In case you don't know, this is a redo of Starvation March. The synopsis is kinda shit, but still. I tried.]

Title: Terror Infinity Etras Revival
Synopsis:
“Want to know the meaning of life? Want to live… a real life?” The world changes when you click YES. In God’s dimension, you have to keep getting stronger, keep evolving to survive one horror movie after another. Do you kill everyone in your way to reach the end as a lone king? Or fight along with your comrades and survive through the support of friends? Everything was just for staying alive. Until you find the secret of God’s dimension. Who is the real enemy?
Etras Revival story of man descendant of Aristocratic Vampiric Clan Dantalian Ishmael Etras when selected YES
When he went to the system he learned that he was in eyes of system rare abnormality
His ancestors cleared movies created their bloodline and returned to real world.

Title: God of all system
Synopsis: What will you do if you got the strongest system? The power to stand above everyone.The power to get whatever you desire?Thats the story of the guywho enjoy his life in all kind of ways with the power of the strongest god.

Title: Dungeon of Night
Synopsis:
Eden is at peace. The kingdoms and races will have the odd skirmish, and occasionally there will be an outbreak of a particularly dangerous monster that hunters would have to face, but largely Eden was in a time of tranquility. On the surface.
In reality the kingdoms were each looking for something to give them the winning edge over their neighbors, many secretive groups hatched plots and schemes in search of power, and the number of deadly monsters grew with every year.
In this time of false peace a strange dungeon is born, one that could potentially change Eden forever. But more importantly the birth of this new dungeon could shatter the façade of peace that has held sway over Eden for the past three hundred years.

On Hold
Random Releases

Title: Fantasy Annihilation
Synopsis:
When Wilhelm was about to log out from the sci-fi VRMMORPG he was playing, a strange survey appeared. After answering questions, he finds himself in another world, within a body of his game character. Seeing his spaceship damaged he sets out to explore the world hoping to find a way home.
Basically, a generic story about a generic op character transported to a generic fantasy game world as his generic game character.
Disclaimer: MC will be op from the beginning, but won't stomp everyone from the beginning.
Don't expect regular releases.
I write it mostly because I want to hone my English (which is not my native language), so I'm not going to reach into a far future as to how the story should progress. Although I'm going to avoid making plot holes as much as possible.
Have Fun.

Title: Reincarnated, let's be a pirate.
Synopsis:
Oh, does it sound familiar? That's not really a surprise.
After my death, God, bored by watching the worlds, choose to send me to a new world. I wonder does he know this is an over-used trope? Oh well, I will be alright. For now, let's find my first event. I'm sure it's around here somewhere.
"It's like a trope wrapped in a cliché."
"It's great and despite the ''over-used trope'' actually original."
"Refreshing, dare I say pretty original too."
"One hell of a plot twist."
 
MAY CONTAIN BLATANT FANSERVICE. 15+ Suggested.

Title: Snow
Synopsis: This short story takes place during winter in a public park. A tragedy is occuring and the main character is standing in the middle of  the entire thing. Will she make it out alive? or will an act of reveng be needed?

Title: Which way is my home
Synopsis:
This is the story of Cyan, your average guy that while he was sleeping in his bed down with sickness, being force to stay home and rest by his mother, he missed his first day of school, that same day he was summoned to another world of sword and magic, dragged without any previous notice, he will have to learn to fend for himself if he want to survive and go back home.
Without the special lecture from a cute angel and only the cheat’s (wishes) granted by the gods of both worlds (that he don't know he have), loss, he will begin a journey to find a way home.

Title: The HOPE Engine
Synopsis:
When a game has the power to bring peace to the planet, you're damn right everyone plays. Every person on the planet can choose if they want to live their life in the physical world or the digital, and Quentin has been waiting for his chance to go all digital.
Once in the game, he chooses a powerful caster, but quickly finds out just how fragile he is. His advisor is a little girl, the village he builds is filled with raving lunatics, and the only edible food for miles around is poisonous to humans. But hey, his friends seem nice.
High level players are fleeing from their towns, beaten by a great force in the East. Will Quentin rise to the challenge and fight these evil forces? Will he pledge his allegiance to them instead? Will he find a meal that doesn't make him sick?
Find out in The HOPE Engine!

Title: The tale of the blind paladin
Synopsis: Year 1294 a war unlike any other wars seen in the history of mankind has appeared. The birth of the mysterious species known as demons have begun to invade the lands of humanity. The demons showed powers that surpasses the abilities of humans and one by one the countries of the humans were conquered by the demon army. Thanks to a forgotten magic humanity managed to defeat the demon army for the first time. A hundred years has passed since the first holy war and in the small country of lasfortia a blind young girl was born. She possessed powers that's equal or stronger than a dragon itself and she was also considered a genius at magic. She was taught the secret arts of a forgotten magic known as dragon's soul. And she wish to protect the people of her country. Will she be able to protect her country or will it suffer the same fate as the other countries of humanity.

Title: Frankenstien's Game
Synopsis:
Jack Frankenstein a 16 year old boy, Descendent of Victor Frankenstein live in modern Earth as it's thrown into a litrpg apocalypse.
I'm 14 and have zero experience in writing, but I'm giving it a try so help is needed. Please give suggestions thank you.
I plan on releasing a chapter every week.
The cover art is mine from a while ago, so I plan on making one that better relates to this book. Check out my IG for more art and I'll do cover art commisions for free just DM me @etaylia_art

Title: Coasten rise
Synopsis:
This is my first time trying to write a book so I hope you will be lenient on me. O great readers.
A tale of many things.
Including a lot of people dying and the author struggling to tell a story. (The same author who has no idea on how to write descriptions at that!)
I hope it will interest your kin. O great readers.

Title: The Arbiters
Synopsis:
Terra Aetheria is a place where light is dominant. Angels have descended from the heavens and have started ruling over mankind. Since they have come down, humanity has flourished. Diseases are easily cured and death can be prevented. On first glance, this seems like the perfect utopia. But is it really? Angels demand the lives of demons in order to grant people with divine energy. Are demons actually as they depict them – wicked, bloodthirsty beings?
The story follows a determined and hardworking young human and his family, a mysterious but noble demon, an adventurous angel with a pure heart and a witty and playful woodland nymph.
Is it justified for humanity and angelic beings to flourish at the cost of demon blood? Fate has brought this seemingly bizarre group together, so that they can find out the true intentions behind the unlimited generosity of the angel aristocracy.

Title: Once Human
Synopsis:
Kidnapped, infused with an unknown substance and given an orientation on survival statistics and adaptive evolution from a disembodied voice isn't the best way to wake up after a night of drinking. Finding out your dangling in a metal box above, what appears to be, an alien planet that is to be your new home only makes things worse.
With no answers, a plethora of mental health issues, that might just give him an edge if they don't get him killed first, and a strong aversion to being told what to do, a hapless human is deposited onto the Planet Evo with a single mission. Survive.  
Fiction will contain strong language, gore, sexual content and scenes/concepts that may be traumatising. Read at your own risk.

Title: My Grudge is not ending!
Synopsis:
A new world. A new life. Learning magic, making new friends and living out my dream(s).
All the while listening to a random God telling me to "forgive, forget and move on"
I seemed to be a vengeful spirit reincarnated into another world, but I think I'm peaceful enough. 
So why is it that God keeps telling to me move on, and my friends keep begging me to never get angry at them?

Title: Freedom Online (unfinished)
Synopsis:
(DO NOT EXPECT A GOOD STORY, OR ANYTHING LIKE THAT SINCE THIS IS SIMPLY MADE WITH MY FREE TIME WHEN I HAVE NOTHING ELSE TO DO!)
 
Freedom Online the new biggest hit in VRMMO gaming!
Follow Jhonny as he starts his new life in freedom Online.
An adventure full of Fun and Random stuff!

Title: My guild was transported to another world, but I'm just the Illusionist Enchanter
Synopsis:
Skyforge, the virtual reality game of the 22nd century. The NPCs were mostly boring cookie cutter characters, but at least the political and military aspects were amazing. A great guild could build their base any way they wished, take over territories by converting the landstones and lead great armies in massive wars - or wager everything in the great arena.
Well, but I'm just an enchanter with a secondary illusion skill tree. In other words, I'm totally dependent on my guild. But since thanks to this guild I could play the way I wish I don't mind.
After we were all sent to another world I kind of regretted not being able to play god with the others.

Title: Between War and Magic
Synopsis: In this world of magic and war, death is common place, the only ones who can safely survive are those who command and understand magic. Rayen is an orphan kid of humble origins whose goal is to become a great mage. To achieve this he must adventure around the mysterious world and meet a lot of interesting people and places. But unprecedented changes are about to occur. Changes that will shake the world and bring dangers by which not even the best mages will be safe anymore. And he will be in the center of it all. Will he be able to survive? Will he become a great mage?

Title: Learn to Crawl
Synopsis: Unit S0B was programmed for one thing and one thing only. To run.

Title: The tragic life of a reincarnated goblin named Malthus
Synopsis:
One day an average 23 year old named Malthus died. Now while that's usually nothing special, he however had been a lazy bum all his life and had somehow managed to anger the goddess of Fate
So when he died he was reborn not as a human as one ought to but as a goblin as Fate had cursed him to.
 
Give me until chapter 20 to get a feel for how things are going to go so things are subject to change 
 
This is a work of fiction. Names, characters, businesses, places, events and incidents are either the products of the author’s imagination or used in a fictitious manner. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.

Title: Arcane Transmogrification (Book Two of the Pentacle Series)
Synopsis:
Book Two of the Pentacle Series
Danny can only hope that his most recent efforts have saved the caravan he was traveling with, but was the price he paid too great?
[Please consider this is an alternate/abridged and free version of book 2. The newly published Amazon version is over twice as long. Title: World Dungeon
Synopsis:
Hans Stein was a young man hospitalized since his late childhood by an unknown disease. A disease that took everything from him.
...
Or so he thought...
...
On the day he died, his soul - heavily mutated and modified by the "disease", ripped itself to pieces, only to reform somewhere else entirely.
A world of magic, monsters, adventurers, and places only the mind could imagine.
...
Places Hans couldn't go...
...
Because he could reincarnate into one thing and one thing only.
...
A Dungeon Core.
 
 
 
 
 
=============================================
Reworking.....

Title: Blade of shattered reality
Synopsis:
Kyouko Akaza is an ordinary high school student until a fateful encounter that changed her life forever.
She was transfered to a place called the realm of eternals and there she met a man Shirou who asked her if she wishes to abandon everything from her previous world and live in another world.
After agreeing to be sent to another world Shirou told her. "In that world you must defeat the demon king."
And afterwards she was transported to a new world filled with magic and liveliness.
In this world humanity faced a threat that called the demon race. A force that humanity can't possibly on their own.
Despite being the largest in numbers amongst all the other races. Humanity will soon face extinction due to the war.
When the demon king declared a full-scale war against humanity. One by one the countries ruled by the humans fell and became part of the demon king's territory and as his land grew larger and larger humanity was being force into a corner and Shirou sent Kyouko there to help humanity deal with the situation.
Can Kyouko defeat the demon king or will humanity fall into ruin and chaos?

Title: The Decendants of Heaven and Hell
Synopsis:
When Cassandra Carter's memories of chilhood returned, her life has never been the same. being the last blood of the acient winged angels who were sent down to earth as punishment for dis-obeying God and their mission to protect humanity from the seductions of demons. 
but Cassandra does not know this, but more importantly she does not know that her faith has already been set. Her destiny lies with a cruel demon. a man of pure Evil. She only have one choice to make but if she makes the wrong choice....The world will die. 
 
"I did not choose this, It was God's wish"
--Voice of an Angel

Title: Paladin
Synopsis:
When the first derelict alien spacecraft fell to Earth, humanity took what was found in it and propelled themselves to new heights. In their new Golden Age, humanity developed technology that they had only dreamed about. The following years saw hundreds more ships crash into the planet, spurring even greater technological leaps.
An unassuming spacecraft, one of the dozens that fell yearly, descended on Siberia in 2021. The world took no particular notice of it. However, this one contained something beyond the miraculous technology that had made humans so prosperous.
Three years later, in a top-secret underground facility in eastern Colorado, the automated construction of an army of Paladin Mobile Infantry Suits was underway. With this new, state-of-the-art weaponry, the military would turn the tide against the alien incursion that was consuming the planet. Humanity fell before that could happen. Sam was an engineer responsible for overseeing the facility. Now alone, he lives in utter boredom and near insanity, his only company the base’s pseudo AI and an army of empty Paladins. With the world gone to hell around him, and the things that caused it still living above, he decides that he is much better off staying exactly where he is. Unfortunately for him, that is no longer an option.

This is the first novel I've written. The first fifteen or so chapters are going to be a little slower. I want there to be time to get to know the characters before they start blowing stuff up. Also, though the MC will be strong relative to the world, he won't be OP, and won't win every fight. Not every fight will be physical either.
Currently, I'm aiming for something like 5 fairly short chapters a week, after the introduction part is done, but we'll see how that goes. Thanks for reading, and please let me know if I've made mistakes!

Title: The New Buggy Pirates
Synopsis:
As a fan of One Piece, I've never liked the way they handled Buggy. He's a great character and all, don't get me wrong, but he should be on the same level as Shanks. Instead, they turned him into the worthless character he is, and that never sat right with me. In this story, he becomes something more than just comic relief. AU. Strong!Buggy Intelligent!Buggy
This story is also on fanfiction.net written by me under the same username: Tallictr. Credit for anything original that I added to the One Piece story goes to me. Credit for everything (characters, settings, etc.) goes to Eiichiro Oda. (He created One Piece)

Title: BATTLE CITY: RISE OF THE BLUE SPARK
Synopsis:
The World Falls apart as a company called "Code Red" created a radio active chemical called Sycomium. a chemical which gives a mutated ability to a human being, giving them different abilities. but unfortunately the chemical cause great war between all humans, hungry for power. the Government of different nation's  establish a red alert towards their country and securing the innocent people in it. while the other people who gained abilities are left out. but later they found out that not only the sycomium gives mutated abilities it also affects the animals and plants making the world more dangerous. It lead them to one choice to create a powerful mutant that will wipe out the effects of sycomium, none other than "Cody Arclight" the grandson of the CEO of Code read. he soon gains an extraordinary ability that can electrify and pulverized anything, called "Arc Lightning". but he has been awaken in a wrong story and will take revenge on "code red" for his misery and lost of memories..... 
will the world be saved? or will humanity will seize to exist.

Title: The God King
Synopsis:
Summoned to another world to fight for a random God, will our protagonist, Caesar, be able to live up to the past and fullfil his lifelong desires, fail under the crushing pressure his past has put on him, or will he surpass all expectations again and achieve his ultimate goal.
Author's Notes:
First story pretty much ever, I'm pretty sure I'm a shit writer, but I'm writing this for myself. Expect a hopefully increase in writing quality as this goes on if I get suggestions from the readers.

Title: Murphy's Law
Synopsis:
****Story has been dropped for being too dark****

"Anything that can go wrong, will."
But what if you know what goes wrong in advance? 

On Earth, monsters come in human form. 
Some are ostracized or locked up, but others walk amongst us. They’re more common than one would think and they grow in number the higher in the hierarchy you go.
With 1 in 100 people preying on the other 99, eventually, a world trying to summon a hero might end up with a monster that doesn't feel like playing along.
 _____________________________

Criticism and critique are more than welcome:)
A chapter every Tuesday.*I do not own the cover image, it's taken from google.

Title: Croenas story of creation
Synopsis:
A being that exists before time and space and the story of how they created the universe.
The story will then move onto the creation of a fantasy universe and the magic and races in it. 
After that will be some sci-fi things and then stories of things Creona sees and does in these 2 universes.

Title: The Wanderer
Synopsis:
The world is soon to face a crisis like no other. A human from another world is reincarnated as a Demon Princess. The person she thought of as a friend is the child of an entity hated by many people human or not, they have a title that proves that they are powerful they are The Wanderer.
