I am a beginner writer so I can't promise a good story but I will write still. I am also looking for a cover image still Even though there is one. The current cover image is from google I don't own it.

Title: The Drowning Donkey Tavern: A Collection of Misery and Monsters in the Krakey Forest
Synopsis:
Taverns, a place any weary traveller can drink their troubles away and their minds swept in an endless current of gossip and stories of local drunks.
Lark Crom, a gunslinger of Kell, stumbles across a lonely town in the middle of Krakey Forest after weeks of enduring restless nights and hungry days. Here he finds his oasis in the midst of a nightmare, The Drowning Donkey Tavern. As Lark barges in and sits himself at the bar, he listens in on the stories of local Grelchmen. With an ale in one hand and downing shots of whiskey with his other, he loses himmself amongst stories very few men live to tell.
(The Drowning Donkey Tavern is an anthology of stories that our "mc" listens in on as he finds a bar in a small dwarven town in the middle of a cursed forest. As well as Lark's own sub-plot that goes on between stories.)

Title: Arduous New World
Synopsis: Alright, so I'm using this as a whetstone to practice my fiction writing. I have dyslexia, so bear with me if I have any mistakes, if you point them out I'll try and correct them. The story is LitRPG, I'll try and avoid some of the tropes, see FAQ. What happens is that the world turns out to be a simulation coming to an end, and beginning on its new simulation, in this process the system of the universe declares that the new simulation will be rpg-based. The protagonist however is thrust into an empty space before the simulation comes to an end, he escapes and finds that the world as he knew it is gone.Chapters will come sporadically as I'm quite busy IRL. FAQ1: There will be no Harem. 2: If any sexual content, it will be be below the screen, example sentence [they made love - or - they had sex]3: I'll try to keep character motivations steady instead of having characters who says and does one thing in one chapter, only to change their mind in the next one. 3: Villains or "bad guys" won't be charicatures. Of course, as in real life, you can meet these people, but as far as big bads or antagonists goes, they will have some modicum of intelligence. 4: The MC does not have an encyclopedia of random knowledge. 5: OP'ness won't happen overnight, and it is something that I'm wary of in terms of adding it, of course eventually the MC will grow more powerful, but there won't be any cheats, except hard work; and the luck factor will be more or less similar to the rest of the population. 6: He won't be opposing the universe, no matter how powerful he grows, he is too insignificant7: he won't become friends with god/the ghost in the shell etc, no matter how powerful he grows, he is too insignificant, and an ancient simulation ai has no interest anyway, why would it ? Okay that's that for now.

Title: The Mistress and Lover
Synopsis: Cathryn Infortunatus is a secretary at Golden World Business Center. She was promoted to work under her friend, Angel, whom she had loved since the days they worked as receptionists together. This is a oneshot, so read the rest to know the rest of the story. (It's not yuri, dont worry)

Title: The School For Necromancers
Synopsis: A world, where magic exists's and monsters, are real. a school where many students will gather and learn to harness their magic but one specific teenager sticks out his name is Zavier Alston there is a hidden power within that he hasnt known about till now how will this adventure start?

Title: Rise of Toki
Synopsis:
From a common worm to human to a dragon, they have a gem embedded in their bodies since birth. These gems contained the skills of that specimen for it to grow and mature. The more skills one obtains, the stronger they become, the more evolutionary options they open. Then their powers would be passed down to their children to unlock.
This is a story about a little tortoise rising up against ... the world! Maybe not.
It all started out when this little tortoise sought out to find her little sister in a big world.
 
My attempt to draw the main characters.

Title: Vemödalen: From The Other Side
Synopsis:
War is coming - And when it comes - And where it comes - And whence it comes - The living shall envy the dead
One to carry their sword in the name of their goddess and lady, to protect their land and people against the threat of the wicked. They know their path to be the righteous one.
One to roam the land, hunting for all apparitions, and be scorned by man and beast alike. They know their path to be an arduous one.
One to wander the realm in search of power, to protect themselves and what they believe in. They know their path to be the only one.
 
Writers note:
The first chapter will set the standard in terms of mood for the remainder of the story. It also comes to no surprise to me that half the people who read the first part stop reading any further. It has quite a bit of the good ‘ol ‘ultra-violence’ mixed with a great deal of realism. As much as I could fit into it from my own knowledge and experience in the elite forces.
The first few chapters will be slow, after, but starting from ‘Restless Destroyer’ the remainder of the world will start to open up, and when we hit ‘Adronitis’ the prologue is largely finished.
The novel is well thought out and filled with hidden lore, culture, history. So even if my word choice appears random – it’s not. There is a reason why these chapters take as long as they do.
Vermodalen is fantasy adventure, with magic and heroics in an as realistic setting as I could fit. Things are rarely what they seem, and the ugly nature of people bleed through the letters at the turn of every page.
I hope you can give this story a fair chance, even if it isn’t immediately to your taste.
 
Lastly, english isn't my first language. It isn't my second one either. So, if you find errors in grammer and spelling, wordplay and sentance building, do let me know, and you will be rewarded by a surge of dopamine that will be released inside your brain for helping someone whom you haven't even seen or heard.

Title: Seventh of April
Synopsis:
Say, today was rather pointless. We spent our day leisurely, wasting our time away while the fated clock ticked away. When it finally rings what will we do then? What was the meaning of it all?
Mankind and many others do not understand Life while treading life.
 
And yet they all, at the end reach enlightenment. When our fated ring echoes He will greet us.

Title: The Cult
Synopsis:
The world our heroes live in is one ruled by a religious but corrupt empire. One peasant farmer must band together a sect of humanity to unite against the oppression. This is the tale of his endeavours.
(sorry my artwork is awful, I decided to try uploading a cover image in an attempt to maybe draw some more attention to the story because the stats I'm getting seem a little weak.)

Title: Unrivaled Divinity
Synopsis:
This story takes elements of Western Fantasy (Wizards, Knights, Dwarves, Elves, etc.) and blends it with elements of Eastern Fantasy (Cultivating to divine realms, Martial arts, Qi = Mana, Clans, etc.)
A wizard exiled from his clan, who chose to become a recluse out in the wilderness, continued the research which ostracized him from society.
He spent most of his life as a recluse, until finally achieving his ambitions, becoming a vessel of limitless Mana. 
But power comes with a cost....
Now, after hundreds of years, he awakens to a world completely changed from the one he knew. 
More Xuanhuan than Xianxia, but there is no tag for that!
Cover Art is just a temporary image I found on the internet, I do not own it!
ON TEMPORARY HIATUS WHILE I FOCUS ON WRITING FAYDE OF THE VOID BUT WILL EVENTUALLY WRITE MORE CHAPTERS

Title: The Predator
Synopsis:
Two eyes could be seen under the darkness.
It meows to get your attention, to show her beauty.
Chirps at the sight of close prey.
Chatters when all she knew goes out of sight.
Wails to call her loving, lonely with all out of sight.
Hisses of surprise of not understanding.
Shrieks of all existing pain, fear of the unknown, and aggression to all who threatens.
For what she feels, all will be expressed with voice, to express her very existence.

Title: Knights under a Green Sky.
Synopsis:
The Flying Fortress of Torrent was coursing the blue skies, doing its annual training voyage like it did every year. The Grey Knight-Captain Jun changes the itinerary, she decided to move the Fortress towards the tropical south, a dream world of sunny beaches and drinks with tiny umbrellas in them.
The next day a group of unidentified flying airships appears in their sensors ready to attack. The commander of the Fortress is missing and she has to take control! Jun's life will never be the same.
Discover a world of advanced magiteck, adventures for survival and mysteries.

Title: Angelborn
Synopsis: Angels, one of the misteries of the world. Follow this newly born, clumsy angel as she tries to uphold the expectations of the Creator and learn about the secrets of the world and her own powers. All this in a post-apocaliptic setting with a lot of weird stuff behind the scenes.Has LitRPG elements but it is not a complete LitRPG world.Will have morally questionable content, violence and weird stuff in it. Advised adult only, but heavy chapters will be marked.Self genre: Adventure, Psychological, Satire, Fantasy, Sci-fi, LitRPG and a hint of dark ComedyImportance in story declining from left to right.Picture does not belong to me, it's just a placeholder from an unknow source. I will draw my own if I get that far.

Title: Fairy Tale System's Tyrant
Synopsis: The world as we know it is nothing but a facade, Magical beings walk among us, Mana and Qi are not just found in fiction, as our main character soon finds out after receiving a unique power known as "The Fairy Tale System" he is able to arm himself with powers from the Fairy tales he so fondly heard as a child. Will he be able to use these newfound powers to reach the pinnacle of the world or fail trying?

Title: Reincarnation: I am the Villainess and Love Target?!
Synopsis:
Reborn into the magical world of Gaea, our main character suddenly remembers her past life.

As a bright light enveloped my sight, memories of another life -a previous life- flashed before my eyes. So much information poured into my little six year old brain that it sent me reeling, almost like a bolt of lightning through my head. I'm not sure how long it took me to process all of that, but judging by the slow and loud ticking sound, what felt like hours was most likely only a few seconds.
 
Blinking whilst trying to keep my footing, I fought off a wave of nausea.
 
I, Velloa Imitheos, child of Ahkua and Hakoda Imitheos, am in the world of Gaea. Therefore, if my so called 'memories' are true, this is the setting of the otome game "Hera: Captured Hearts" and I am the villainess of the game. However, judging by what I was just told by my Father, it looks like I will also be taking on the role of one of the love interests.

Title: Seekers of The Mad World
Synopsis:
Warning This Is Going To Be A Slow Updating Novel As I Will Update With No Schedule It Could Be Tomorrow Or Next Month Or Some Random Day Or Night
What you think you know about the world is not what it really seems. If you just take one moment to look out of your daily lives you'll see the world is more than you think it is as you're all slaves to your minds. The government conceals all supernatural activities as they want to try to keep the numbers of supernatural cases down but its only rising. My group no my family that consist of superhumans, ghosts, demons, and more different kinds beings than you can ever imagine is here to unravel the secrets this world possess we are the Seekers of this mad world. Beware of the dangers because if you want to join this crazy family of mine you need to prepare to see dangers in every turn and step you take. Our work mostly consist of case solving of anything supernatural so basically we are detectives but we're also scientist/alchemist, ruin adventurers, engineers, etc... We do experiments to seek answers but of course we need money so that's why we're detectives we solve cases for the government. Now shall I welcome you to this mad world of mine and on the way maybe you'll learn how I got caught into this mess let's just say my father was one of the greatest detectives living but he was too great...

Title: Infinite: Monster
Synopsis:
Stripped of his human form and dignity, Matthew Forester has been given the ignominious goal of killing the other 'players' in a game arranged by a being that claims to be God. It's either be the villain or die trying, and the odds definitely aren't in his favor.
Tip: This is take 2 of Villainous that I plan to write on occasion between my One Piece fic.

Title: Dharmic Scripture
Synopsis:
The monk has awoken from his meditation in his secret chamber used to evacuate the important monks from his sect. However, unbeknownst to him, the world has experienced an ending, befitting of its selfish greed and lust.
Can the monk resurrect his sect from its demise? 
Or will the mana upheaval and its chaos bring to him the destiny he so hates?

Title: Whispers from the dark
Synopsis:
During the dark times, the humans and elves decided to work together to defeat the Fiend. A high king among the humans was chosen, together with his archmage he defeated the Fiend. A few years of peace, until the high king lost it. He was convinced that the mages would steal the crown and take over his world. Scared as he was, he decided to hunt down everyone with magical abilities. Elves retreated to the safety of their forests and mountains, forever remaining a mystery to the humans. Many non-magical humans agreed to this plan of their lord, for they were also afraid that the mages would take advantage of their weaknesses.
The mages tried to survive. The archmage, who was the former counsellor of the last king and protector of the royal family, protested. He wanted to solve this problem through politics. But nothing helped, and the archmage fled.
The king got two sons, one was born a mage, and the other human. The king despised his mage son and banished him. His younger brother became the heir of the throne. Anger grew in the mage prince. He thought war was the only solution to this problem. Consumed by the will to gain power, he searched for followers who would fight the humans in order to stop the hunt on mages. The archmage tried to stop this evil plan of the prince.
But the mages split in two groups. The necromancers, followers of the evil prince, who studied the crafts of the dark magic to terrorise their enemies and gain back the throne.
And the sorcerers, followers of the archmage, who tried to peacefully restore the trust between humans and mages. But nobody knew the danger that was gaining back his power in the underground world. The archmage disappeared and a darkness swept over the world. Human, elves, mages, every creature awaited in fear the day the darkness would take back his control.
Faelwen, a young woman, was put in the middle of this chaos. Even though her only priority was to survive. Hunted down by humans and evil beasts, who can she trust? And what whispers from the dark will reveal the secrets from the archmage?

Title: Modern Day Avatar
Synopsis:
What if everyone in the world was capable of more than normal human feats...what if they were capable of summoning forces far beyond human imagination. 
What if this power belonged to every single person on earth?
The year is 2020 and marks the first millennia since the awakening of the first Avatar.
Avatar the power to take on the form of your innermost self.
This year is also the beginning of the legend known as Ryley Sturner the Skeleton King
This story is inspired partially by The God of Highschool, The Gamer and many other awesome webtoons and novels so if you know the greatness that is the two masterpieces I just mentioned you may like this book too.
Please note that while it says romance in the genre it will be a bit more realistic and a bit later on in the story than usual.
*sporadic releases*

Title: Overturning of Empires
Synopsis:
The Fall of Valoria left General Arwyn Kriger devistated. During the final battle he was encased in a molten rock which hardend as soon as he was encased. Trapped for ages Arwyn went comatose and during his coma he experienced outer worldly visions.
Deep within the Death Zones beings stur as they feel the Ancient One's call. They would scour the world for the coming of Achlys.
The Order of Aion once again send the call for the coming Extinction Wars

Title: The Infinity Islands
Synopsis:
I was just supposed to be a normal guy! I was about to graduate from my normal university with my normal English degree, about to begin my first foray out into the real world.
But somehow, I had ended up worlds away instead. Far, far away from home, in a world that should have been just like mine, running and fighting for my life in a war I didn't understand. None of us knew why or how we were there or what we were ultimately supposed to accomplish. But that didn't really matter, did it?
In my new world, there was only one rule: survive!
---
Hey all, I'm Ken, and this is my first time sharing a story online. This story is heavily inspired by Terror Infinity, if it wasn't obvious from the title. I've been interested in making a Terror Infinity story for a while now, but I have a lot of problems with its system and mechanics, so I decided to just make my own system instead of trying to adapt to that one. If you find any mistakes, typos, or awkward phrasing please let me know in the comments so I can fix it! I hope everyone can enjoy this story but, even if you don't, please let me know why and what you think I can do to improve.
Thank you.
 
 (The original picture for the cover can be found here)

Title: Balls Are Life
Synopsis:
In the year 2042, full-immersion gaming technology is no longer a dream. The big gaming companies, though, have yet to make a video game that catches many people's attention. Until, that is, Nintendo releases their biggest game yet- Pokémon Rainbow. An MMO featuring the first five regions of Kanto, Johto, Hoenn, Sinnoh, and Unova, the game draws a massive crowd of players both old and young, longtime fans and complete newbies. The game gets tens of millions of players during its first few days of release.
Our hero, a sixteen-year-old named Allie Dover, is the daughter of two 90's kids who grew up playing the original games who had insisted that she and his brother grow up with the old Game Boy Color games as well. Allie's whole family buys copies for each of them, and they plan to meet up inside.
However, when players log in, they soon discover that the game is not what they think it is. It is much, much more than they ever imagined. To the point that they can't stop playing.
Follow Allie in her quest to defeat the Pokémon League, and to keep her precious Pokémon from fainting. 
****DISCLAIMER**** I do not own Pokémon, nor do I have any affiliation with Nintendo. I do not claim to own any of their intellectual property.

Title: The Chronicles of Hydea
Synopsis:
While burying a time capsule, two kids from Earth uncover magic crystals. Now their bodies are dying, and it all goes downhill from there. 
Catherine "Cat" Taylor and Darrion Comis have resigned themselves to dying when they are thrust headlong into an interplanetary war, complete with space battles, a quirky team, a nefarious villain and the occasional romance. 
Book One in the series.

Title: The Multiverse Game
Synopsis:
Zach is placed in one of the most secure prisons on Earth, destined to live out his days in endless isolation.  But when the world transforms around him, he finds himself stuck in a dungeon, the guards probably dead.
Will he be able to get out alive?  Probably.  He's the main character, after all.

Title: The legend of the son of the legendary hero.
Synopsis:
The war against the demon lord forced humanity to use the arcaic magic arts to summon a hero from an alternative world. That hero turned out to be Kurohara Ichika, a teenager from modern day Japan.
The hero defeated the demon lord and decided to live a quiet life growing papayas in the countryside with his wife and his son, Kurohara Noah.
The legend was supposed to be over. However, one day young Noah gets run over by a carriage going at full speed, and turns out he will now be sent to the "real" world, the one where his father had come from, in an important mission with the fate of both worlds resting on his shoulders.
Noah clearly doesn't like the idea, but knowing the basics of japanese common sense thanks to his dad, he thinks he won't have too much trouble finding his way in this parallel world.
Or so it was supposed to be...
"Wait, is this really Japan!?"

Title: King of Another World
Synopsis:
18-year-old James Young has always been a rich, pampered child. He was the failure of his family, a shut-in feeding off of his parent's wealth. However, something very unexpected happens to him while traveling to Japan to buy anime figurines: his plane crashes in an unfortunate accident. The next thing James knew, he was sitting in front of a Goddess and he was given three choices: Going to Heaven, reincarnating on Earth, or reincarnating in another world. Believing this situation to be
Believing this situation to be a parallel to the light novels James read while alive, he chooses to be reincarnated in another world believing he will become a handsome, overpowered hero. Unfortunately for him, James reincarnates as a lowly, disgusting orc: nothing but cannon fodder. Fortunately for him, he retains his memories from his past life, but things aren't looking good for James, now an orc known as Larek.
Looking back, James thought his life was dreary and boring, so he decides to take his future life in his own hands as he has been granted a second chance at life. This time, as Larek, he plans to take over the world and rule it as he pleases.

Title: Straying Reflection

Everything seems to be connected yet completely isolated from each other. Follow Elinor's story and her quest to make sense of the meaning of the world and perhaps her own straying self...

Title: The Gray
Synopsis:
From out of nowhere, a mysterious company called Seis Pillars announced the world's first deeply immersive VMMORPG. Unprecedented amounts of freedom and choices had people eagerly awaiting for its release. Yet a select few where chosen to take part in an early beta.
And Larson Reed was one of them. 
After a near death accident left him broken and unable to move, he was more than willing to become a beta tester.  The promise of a new life, albeit a virtual one, was like something out of a dream.
In a land where the only limit seems to be your imagination and a temperamental system decides your status, a man desperate for a fresh start gets thrown head first into an epic adventure. 
Welcome to the world of Waylim.
 
Commission of a casual Larson by Jake

Title: Chosen by a three headed god

Title: Rise (A superhero serial)
Synopsis:
“Rise” follows the story of Jethro Kaine, A young man of seventeen who much to his own dismay has recently developed powers beyond human reckoning. It is the year 2017, and as of 45 years ago superpowers started to randomly appear.
Jethro had always seen these people and admired them from afar but now that he has been thrust into their world and forced to fend for himself. Will he survive, will he die? Or will he rise to the top.
(Author Note)
1 chapter a day, and each chapter is about 300 – 500 words. Maybe bonuses but we’ll see.

Title: Evolution of a Cultivation Beast
Synopsis:
A place where no humanoids exist.
A place where Beasts are king.
A place where the first and last judgment is instinct.
A place where death thrives.
A place where only the strong survive.
A place where nothing stays the same.
A place where the elements can be harnessed and used.
Welcome to Origin.

Title: The Eveningtide
Synopsis: The story follows Lear Ephistre, a novice adventurer who embarks to achieve his dream of greatness. He decides to join a guild to help with his endeavors but is rejected, destroying his morale. But his actions cause him to come across a man recruiting members for his own guild. Their meeting marks the beginning of their, soon to be grand, adventures.

Title: The fallen (?) hero and Aži Dahāka's soul fragment
Synopsis:
I have to apologize.A certain real life problem that I thought I got rid of has caught up to me once again.I tried to continue writing, but my mind was not in the right track to do so and thus, as some people had said, the quality of the latest 2 chapters had turned from the usual "bad" to "worst".
So, I reluctantly have to say that I will be away until I can sort things out.I can't say when, but I do intend to return to writing.
I might lurk around to read other people's works though.
I will be turning my attention to stories with "tragedy" and "despair".
 
The five of us were summoned to this world from our clubroom two years ago to be made as heroes.Shouldn't forceful summoning like that be counted as kidnapping?Well, we chose to go with the heroes route.After harsh training and battles, not to mention all the killings, we finally defeated the demon lord.However, all those achievements literally became nothing, it wasn't just forgotten, it was erased to be totally nothing as even the written records were somehow being disposed of.
I was too naive. Who would have thought that the side we have been fighting alongside with, the side we were fighting for, was the one to bring our demise?After I had to see everyone else turn into nothingness, somehow... I alone survived.
Note: I will attempt to fix the grammar problem with the help of lieutenant colonel fletterman. This may delay the release of future chapter. 
Chapter 1 is fixed.
Chapter 2 is fixed.

Title: Falling Star
Synopsis:
After a family from a powerful clan known as the ‘Ras Clan’, crashes on planet Dunia, a planet on the other side of the universes, they find themselves stranded.
Their coming was foretold thousand of years ago along with its implications. For it was said that their presence shall bring death and destruction, as well as the possibility for life. Which have left Dunians with varying different opinion of these people known as, the Renzu.
With no way to make contact with, or return their homeworld, those uninjured have no choice but to try and integrate into a new society, establish a branch of the Ras Clan on Dunia, and rectify their mistake. As they themselves know that if they are unable to rectify the mistake they have made, then death and destruction is not just a real possibility, but an inevitability.
Will the young members of the Ras Clan be able to accomplish their goals on a planet filled with Qi Masters, powerful clans, terrifying beasts, and untold difficulties?
Author’s Note: This is my first story, so I'm looking forward to your feedback, as it will be much appreciated.

Title: WHO SHE WAS
Synopsis:
She was all that was left after her old life came to a screeching halt, she did the only thing she could at the time to save herself, she ran.
But after a year of being away from her home land she decides to take a leap and return, as a completely different person.
Will fate be kind to her and allow her to live out her new life in peace or will her past be able to destroy what little remains?

Title: Immortal Necromancer
Synopsis: In the year 2065,the virtual reality game,Strongworld,changed the world. Many people wished to change their life through it but failed to do so. In order to monopolize the entirety of Strongworld numerous guild were formed,numerous players arose but one player stood above them all,named as the "Immortal Necromancer".

I went to my backyard to find a cute cat eared girl changing her clothes who then attacked me with random things that were just lying around, hitting me in the face. Long story short, I ended up using spirit magic to make breads and then I saved the world

The story is about normal boy who suddenly came to another world via his house's backdoor and found quite a spectacle.Uhh, the full title already mentioned all that need to be said.

In a single blink, Zombies appeared and mutated monsters began to rampage all throughout the world. Now it was the human species turn to fight for survival and planetary dominance. Society crumbles human life becomes cheaper than a bottle of water. In the midst of turmoil, one man smiles calmly.

Title: My life as a human knight has begun
Synopsis:
The battle against the Demon Lord has been done for several thousand years and yet human never win even a single battle...let alone see the face of the Demon Lord. Thus, an experienced elite foot soldier for Demon Lord has become fed up with those futile efforts for as he gains nothing but a boredom
Sheron Hunr is the name, with reason...has gone to the human side which is to learn about their reason for their defeat. While on his mission, he learns many things about the human that he doesn't know for entire his life. what will happen to Sheron after he lives at human side....?
 
Autor notes. It's my first time writing a novel and also posting online. I'd appreciate any feedback and comments. The updates will be random. For the beginning, I'm sorry for my bad grammar and I hope you all can spend your time to read my story.

Title: Change's
Synopsis: Third son of a king, attending an elite school, top of his class, respected and loved by his peers and teacher's, Kiyoshi Arai's life couldn't get any better, so instead took a turn for the worst.

Title: The Demon's Heart : Hell On Earth
Synopsis:
Matt, a cold-acting and a pessimistic boy who is scared of helping anyone in need as he thought he might make it worse or end up being hurt, goes to a construction site with his close friends Maria, Bayrauk, Scylla, and Cassie. Matt finds a black heart inside of a semi-transparent purple prism that seemed to beat slower than that of a human's, unlike his friends who found weird hexagonal stones each with an animal's face on it: an eagle(found by Maria), a bear(found by Bayrauk), a cobra (found by Scylla), and a bat(found by Cassie) Matt kept it a secret
Later that night, Matt decides to walk around a garbage dump to check if there were interesting things to collect since he couldn't sleep because of the slow heartbeats of the heart he found in the construction site. He loses track of time and goes deeper into the garbage dump where he finds what looked like a beggar searching for something to eat near the garbage incinerator and, for the first time, he decides to help and gave the beggar some money which, for unknown reasons, drives the beggar mad and pushes Matt into the garbage incinerator.

Title: My day
Synopsis: Basically like my internet diary. Is it a good idea? Probably not. Oh well, I'm not the smartest person anyways. Enjoy your time here, I guess.

Title: The Hesitant Magical Girl
Synopsis: No matter how hard you work, no matter how much you try, there will always be somebody better than you. However, when that special someone doesn’t want to do what she’s better at, that is where a new story begins. As much as she doesn’t want to, the fate of many rests in her hand. In the world of magic, a new challenger arrives.

Title: Fat Boy Hero
Synopsis:
Rueben Burger is a high school student and he is severely obese. He also suffers from a penchant for doing the right thing even if it means placing himself in a difficult or compromising position. Which is how Rueben finds himself in an apartment that is larger on the inside than it should be, about to be fired at by a weapon he has never seen the likes of in a building that is on fire. 
Super powers! The result of his sojourn in the burning building. Now Rueben has a few decisions to make. Does he become the hero he has always dreamed of being, or does he stay out of the fight to keep his Grandmother safe? Does Rueben give up his power to be the skinny kid he has desperately longed to be?
Find out this and much more in the first book of the Fat Boy Hero Series.
 
-History of FBH-
 
Fat Boy Hero is a story long in the making. The idea came from my love of hero stories, but the lack of relatable heroes. By that i mean there were no, or few heroes that dealt with weight gain. Something I have and am dealing with after leaving the Marine Corps. So Fat Boy Hero was born. Check out the link below to listen to an episode of The Round Table Podcast where I brainstormed the idea with the hosts and special guest Michael underwood.
 
http://www.roundtablepodcast.com/2013/03/workshop-episode-53-guest-host-michael-r-underwood/
 
This book is a side project and will be updated as time permits. I hope you do not find this too off-putting.

Title: Alviona (undergoing Rewrite).
Synopsis:
This fiction is going to undergo severe Editing and a Rewrite over next few months. Here is what it hopes to accomplish:
1) Fix the glaring issues from Style in every chapter 1-31 (Dialogues, POV switches and Head-hopping too much)
2) Add some new chapters in and justify the development between Sofia and Anita
3) Remove the info dumps and make it more organic
4) Finalize the genres that this fiction belongs to
5) Create warning in the synopsis relating to the contents of the fiction.
6) Overhaul and show what Mira's view on Alviona is (slowly)
7) Introduce new characters
8) Show chapters the way they were intended, as clues apparently were not visible at all!
9) Make Alviona a bit more serious.
10) Make me (Author) enjoy reading my own work more (yes! :))
 
Hi. I have been gone for quite a long while. With heart surgery and such that has happened two months ago, I had not had a chance to log on RR due to being hospitalized. I had some other issues that the admins were kind enough to deal with on this fiction. It's good to see everything in one piece.
The synopsis has been removed. Chapter 1 should be coming out sometimes before christmas. A lot has changed. I hope for the better. Instead of edits, I have re-read every single chapter and found it to be unsatisfying. A lot did not make sense and unless you have previously speculated what Alviona is, many things she does won't fall into pieces. Well then, time to address all of this.
 
Ladies and gentlelmen, this fiction is undergoing a full scale re-write. While the characters and developments stay the same, it's being done differently. So much that the world should feel darker as it should have been.
For those who have stuck around and know the story: Awesome. I worked hard  on this, and hope that you will like my re-write.

Title: Blooming Heroes
Synopsis:
Unitea is an average, peaceful village, and Mima is an average, optimistic, peace-loving girl. She has dreamed of becoming someone strong and heroic. Someone who could help those in their times of need. But in a town where nothing much ever happens, and having a not so useful power, she hasn't had much chance to change into that sort of person. Mima lives happily day by day with her friends despite that, thankful that nothing bad has come. 
One day, an unfortunate event occurs. With this less than ideal circumstance, Mima and her friends must learn to bloom into the type of hero she had dreamt of for so long.

Title: Tales of the Stars
Synopsis:
What makes a school different?
Is it their facility?
Is it their faculty members?
Or is it the very students that walk its halls and classroom?
Every individual have different answers for that question. But out of all of those answers, the 3rd answer is mostly population’s reply.
And of course that answer is mostly right; the students are the ones that make the school different not by appearance, but by the atmosphere.
A school could feel like a Military-like school or a Christian-like school or even a Prison-like school.
With the students alone can make a School’s atmosphere towards a warm and friendly feeling or a cold and uninviting feeling.
For Quincy Voorhees, a young man who wasn’t able to enter High School, he will soon experience these different “Atmosphere”.
Especially is that said “Atmosphere” isn’t on Earth.

Title: I Am A God Tree?!
Synopsis:
Satoushi Haruya a college graduate was killed by a bullet tree branch after he saved an unconscious man from a crashed truck that grazed him. Afterwards he found himself in another world as its God Tree.
He quickly takes root into the world of Esevia and begins to expand his territory along with an elf and her little sister (not an option)  and a possessed armor dullahan.
His name in that world?
Yggdrasil.

However this is not the end as his past exploits lead to him gaining the attention of the gods and lead to him being sent on a new journey though a fantasy world.

Title: Traveling Through the Tales
Synopsis:
After the number one Sword Immortal, Daofather Darknorth, left the Three Realms and headed off to the vast universe, countless soul were entering the Cycle of Reincarnation. However, one soul was sent out of the cycle and into a vortex that lead to another universe. At the same, multiple other souls were colliding and entered the vortex as well. 
The moment the souls entered, the vortex closed, sealing all pathway between the Three Realm and the alternate universe. As the souls wandered in the vortex, space and time churned and the souls were forcefully fused into a whole. Now, this one soul entered the new universe and was reborned into a clan. Although this clan was rather strong in might, it was only a speck of dust when compared to the vast universe. However, this clan would produce of one of the most talented individual that would become one of the strongest powerhouse, but just not the strongest.

Title: CHRONICLES of a PC Gamer Stuck Inside an RPG (Book Two: Successor)
Synopsis:
[2/28/19 Update: The CHRONICLES series has been removed from Amazon Kindle Unlimited.  This means the beta version of the entire series is available on RR.  Enjoy!]
Book Two: Successor of CHRONICLES of a PC Gamer Stuck Inside an RPG continues the (mis)adventures of Lawrence Eugene Mulligan, who was brought to a new world by a divine entity known as the Gamemaster.  Our main character ("MC") has only one objective: to become the King of the Kingdom of Merlin in order to return home.  Luckily for our MC, he has developed strong relationships with numerous Non-Player Characters ("NPCs"), organizations, and even Gods (!) to help Lawrence achieve his ultimate goal.
CHRONICLES of a PC Gamer Stuck Inside an RPG is a hardcore slice-of-life genre story which focuses on our unlikely MC as he handles quests and events that the Gamemaster constantly throws at the MC.  All in the name of entertainment for the Gamemaster.
Book Two: Successor is a sequel which continues the events of the final chapter of the previous book.  And thus, it is important for readers to finish the previous work before delving into this next book.  The official Amazon release (which includes an exclusive 2k words side story) is available at: https://www.royalroad.com/amazon/B07KDJXF4K

Title: Sword Immortal's Rebirth
Synopsis:
After sacrificing himself to avert the collapse of his world, Sheng Jiansui, the Quintessence Sword Saint thought that his soul would crumble away, his memory lost to the void. Unexpectedly, he is reborn to a new world as Heifeng Jiansui, a Prince of the Black Phoenix Empire ruling over a Great World! 
 
"In my previous life, I rose to the apex of the Sword Dao! In this life, my Dao shall encompass all there in the World!"

Title: A Dragon's Wish for Mortality
Synopsis: The year of the Kye Marah is at hand. The realm of Mur looks to the east. They watch for the black shadow of death. To protect the legacy of a man she both hated and admired, the dragon Diadric trades her immortality for a mortal body. A body unbound to her father mountain. On Mount Vaskmerr, she joins King Soltimork in a grand scheme to defeat the Kye Marah.

Title: System
Synopsis:
The story takes place on the world known as Edge, a place of fantasy and wonder.
William Crow is an orphaned teen on the cusp of manhood, and is also a member of a class known as "soulless", for in this world those who do not develop their own "soul skill" become known as such.
Soul skills vary in range and rarity, having many different functions and uses; however, not having one automatically makes an individual have incredibly low standing amongst society.
William's inability to develop his own soul skill, along with the loss of his parents at a very young age, drives him into the corner of life. Making him a reserved and often frightened individual.
However, his life changes drastically when he is chosen for one of the "Scouting" lotteries, in which the capital city forces some of the soulless to scout potential danger zones for monsters or enemy units. It's during this "mission" that he discovers the power that lies within him: System.

Title: Rising from hell
Synopsis:
After losing his family, Light fell into despair.
Then, hope came in amidst of despair.
He who wanted revenge but didn't have the strength to take it was transported to the place filled with death but he struggled to build his strength and swore to take his revenge.
Death cube, the dimension filled with death, in a special dungeon with high difficulty, light embarks in his legendary path to take his revenge.

Title: My Fantastic World Of Magic
Synopsis: So, in the magical world of Shadowmire, lies a young man, with dreams, not of grandeur, but of a life of adventure. However, after his map is switched with a forged one with a few details interchanged, he ends up in a land where anything could be an illusion. But bad as it may seem, it opens the path to a much more amazing future ahead of him.

Title: Ruin - Soon to be Published!
Synopsis:
The land of Ruin is a brutal, harsh, and unforgiving desert with little water and less kindness. Do not mistake its brutality for lack of life though. Thousands of traders and people from all walks of life travel its vast reaches daily looking to make their fortune in the trade of "black crystal" - the mineral that fuels everything from airships to, landships, to currency its self. There is even rumor of its magical properties.
Jim is just such a trader and frankly, he sucks at it. But, things are about to change for him. Ever the introverted hermit, he's about to be thrust into a world of intrigue, magic, and colorful friends. Ruin gives few second chances. Don't waste yours.

Title: The divine ranked dungeon
Synopsis:
A dungeon should never be born intelligent, and yet this one was not only born intelligent, but also remembering his past life! Now the world is going to see a dungeon unlike anything they ever could have imagined.

This is being written as a hobby. Releases my be irregular.

Title: I Guess I'm a Hero Now (Title may change)
Synopsis:
Raigan was forced to warn his world that invaders would soon come and destroy their world.
The gods of his world labeled him as a heretic and ordered their followers to kill him.
After finally being chased and finally killed, all he wants to do is rest until it is time for him to be reincarnated.
But one wandering god refuses to let him do so.
Now he he must  lead his world to take their home back.
What a tiring life he has.

Title: The Fall of Vaasar
Synopsis:
Everyone loves a festival in Vaasar.  The town is peaceful and the townsfolk relish a good show.  But shy Tamza is not enjoying herself.  Her father, a celebrated bear tamer, is stepping down and the time has come for Tamza to take his place and perform on her own.
Tamza is determined to make her father proud.  Before she can reach the stage, the crowd's cheers turn to screams as Vaasar is brutally invaded by a bloodthirsty force hellbent on destroying everyone and everything in its path.
Only Tamza has the magic powerful enough to save her people and her beloved bears - but first she must find the courage to use it.

Title: The frustratingly calm man

A man who takes things as they come.
A man who will take action when he deems fit.
A man who lives in balance.

Title: You're A Faerie, Wizard

Well turns out there's more truth to that than originaly thought. Due to certain circumstances, God decide it best that I was to be reincarnated in another world to prevent the destruction of Earth. Title: Reincarnation of the hero's companion
Synopsis:
When the demonic dagger had pierced his heart, Hawk was sure he would die on the spot. But instead, he found himself standing in a village as a child, covered from head to toe in mud. He finds out he's somehow been reincarnated after the betrayal and it's 30years in the future. 
With the only thing to help him his old skills, and now having been given the weakest magic mark, what will he do?

Title: The Casual
Synopsis:
Notice: On hiatus.
 
*profanity tag added just in case a bit of swearing is required, but I'll try to keep it as profanity-lite as possible*
RealWorldIII came with the motto "Bringing the imagination back into the gaming" with an innovative skill combination system that promises to create unique (see: not-actually-unique) characters tailored to each player's preferences (see: we-swear-it's-not-random)
Alex is a random guy with the motto "Well... whatever" with a history of being at the top of the gaming scene (see: he was a kid back then) that after twenty years of working for daily necessities finds himself facing a tough dilemma: do I go back to being a corporate slave, or do I gain money by playing a game no questions asked? (see: not really a dilemma)
The only question is, can an actual "casual", even if ex-pro, survive constantly playing a game? or will he end banging his head on the wall? 
The story will unfold mainly in-game, with little if any real life events happening.

Synopsis:

Title: Desert
Synopsis:
This is one of my works which I did as a task given to me as a member of Literature club. I recall forgetting to do it home so I had to do it in school. I had a nasty feaver that day which was repeatedly knocked me down. I could bearly keep my head up. But I had to give my teacher something or esle I would be in trouble so I battled like Kratos. In the end I wrote in little over ten minutes and handed it over to teach. I compleatly forgot about it until next year where, as it turns out I won a competition and got an award, diploma and a book with other particpants works! Mine was special... something about a style of writting etc. Funny thing is when teach praised me I had no clue what my work was. It was prose which told about a relationship of man and nature and their struggle.... Mind = blown. All that I know about Desert came from teachers words I really had no clue about my own work.
 
But I decided to share it with the world. I want everyone to witness my bull**it which earned me a victory.

follow max as he ventures throught the world of estrella and  subdue men and women alike.

These individuals are called 'Talents', and they are gathered and put into a school dedicated to enhancing the control of their powers and in turn, serve their countries when they graduate. Join our main character as he navigates through his unique high school life, all the while trying to cope with everything happening around him. [Slow updates]

Title: Chance for Change
Synopsis: Join the Occult Club, they said. It's totally harmless, they said. I guess they never thought that the Club might actually summon an otherwordly entity and throw our world into an interdimensional war.

Title: Open Source
Synopsis: A team of bioengineering specialists has been sent to a secret location managed by the mysterious political power known only as the Coalition to develop new technologies in the fields of biological and cybernetic warfare.  Just when it seems like they are about to make the breakthrough of the century, the lab goes dark.  Join the cleanup crew as they force their way back into the complex and investigate what went wrong, and uncover something that could change the way humans interact forever...

Title: Northern Conqueror
Synopsis: Betrayed, killed by his own flesh and blood Alexius falls into strange darkness after his death, everywhere he looks is only darkness he remembers his old life as he gazes into darkness but his eternal rest in that darkness comes to an end as a dark and cold voice finds him in there.

Title: My Witch-Infested Life!
Synopsis:
Key, who spent most of his days alone.
A person who doesn't want to socialize..
But he's life routine changed when his mom sent someone to watch him over. Unbeknownst to him, he's being watched over by a.. witch?
A loner and a witch. Now living under the same roof.

Title: Embracing the world with happiness!
Synopsis:
Kux lived a happy life. At least that was how it was in the eyes of others around him. Even he himself thought he was in joy, in bliss, in happiness.
A bundle of joy he was, spreading smiles and happiness wherever he goes.
This is the story of Kux.

Title: RE: Goblin
Synopsis:
////////////////////////////////////////////////////
The story follows a peculiar man Tom Leer, a lonesome individual with an out-right terrible past. Due to his history, he doesn't smile, nor talk much. Although he was renowned for his intelligence, the people surrounding him defined the guy as having a terrible "lack of compassion", and being unreasonably "cold-hearted" as well.
On one particularly bad day, Tom was walking along his regular path to work, when, from an open window far above, a flurry of random bricks were dropped.
Tom managed to skillfully remove people from danger in his greatest show of human kindness to date, suprisingly proceeding to dodge the bricks himself !
....but truck-san didn't appreciate Tom stepping out into the street while doing so...
______
 
When Mr. Leer woke up, he came face to face with the most hideous diety in all creation itself. They told him that he would be reincarnated against his wishes, and he wouldn't be allowed to take his ever-precious memories with him. Instead he may retain the 3 traits that defined him during life on earth.
The disgusting higher existence then sent our poor protagonist's soul down to the magical lands of Antasia!
 
Thus, came the birth of the most intelligent, uncompassionate, cold-hearted goblin named Oer.....
 
...wait?
 
...a Goblin?!!!
 
 
 
//////////////////////////////////////////
 
A novel dedicated to some rather dark thoughts.

Title: The Royal Magister
Synopsis:
I died and came to Earth.
Then somehow I returned to my old world.
And now that I'm home, let the war continue.

Title: The Tales of East and West
Synopsis:
These are tales from a land not our own. They are of monsters and men, of dragons and knights, but not in the way usually depicted in fantasy.
In this world, two massive continents are divided by a vast river.
In the West lays the Dark Empire, named thus not for its vile deeds, or visions of world conquest, conquest takes paper work after all and who really likes paper work? But is named instead for the people, or rather peoples, that make up its population.
In the West a Minotaur's only job opportunity isn't guarding some dusty old labyrinth, though there's nothing wrong with taking up the family business, but instead he can be a china shop owner. Where a simple orcish farmer doesn't have to worry about a some rouge dragon stealing his sheep, and is able to sue the living day lights out of the flying rat.
In the East, are the lands called the Many Kingdoms. Home to the lands of Man, the mountain fortress of the Dwarves, and the forest resorts of the Elves. It is a divided, but cultured place, with deep ties into magic, religion, and art alike. Just avoid the back alleys of the city of South Harbor at night, unsavory fellows roam there. Fellows with very sharp blades.
These are the stories of the people of this world, and how they have learned to deal with each other. Like annoying relatives that you can't get rid off, so you just had to learn to deal with them.
[Author's Note: I wrote the first story some months ago for a creative writing class. It went over well with them and my family, who for the pass months have been prodding me to publish it in some shape or form, so here we are.
It should be noted that each "Tale" (should there be more) will be a semi-standalone piece(s) that will have some connecting element to the others. Usually
I eagerly await what is thought of my story, and will be appreciative of any feedback, whether it be positive or negative. Though I do ask that it at least be constructive.
Thanks for reading, Metalsword, a.k.a Tim]

Title: Host Me!
Synopsis: This is the story of Yuuto, who upon turning 18 was unceremoniously thrust out into the world head first. He encounters misfortune and somehow ends up working as a host in Shinjuku to pay off his massive debt.

Ichiro is an introverted, quiet boy that's always jealous of his handsome, outgoing childhood friend. But one day, he receives an app on his phone that can boost all different kinds of social skills and abilities. But in order to increase his skills, he has to complete "love" challenges and collect feelings from beautiful girls...
Cover: https://www.pinterest.jp/pin/AaKRlEIf-TAxPHK0MKQNE2HW13s2h1W3FWb0Krev6tMxPlN2Mh2YwAc/

Title: Vlaryne
Synopsis:
Far in the future, a human colonization ship sailed across the stars. Its mission was to establish the first colony on the planet Keird. Unfortunately for them, they're attacked on the way and are deviated from their objective. The ship even passed through a strange portal.
After that, they crashed on a big planet and are forced to fulfill their mission there. But this new planet is already inhabited and strange phenomenons are happening since the crash. They'll have to manage to survive and find a way to install their civilization on a planet already shared among numerous species.

Title: A World of Many
Synopsis: Awakening from unconsciousness, Cyrus Speer suddenly finds himself deep inside a mysterious cavern. After accidentally activating a device he gains the means to defend himself from whatever may seek to harm him. Armed with nothing but the strange device, his wits, and determination Cyrus intends to find out what happened to him, where he's found himself at, and how to stay alive long enough to see tomorrow.

Title: Once Giants: The Neon Amazon
Synopsis:
Tina Thompson has the body of a super soldier and the debts to match. 
With a superhuman body that requires constant nano-treatments to stay alive, Tina slums it in the favelas of São Paulo as a drug lord's enforcer, cleaning up messes too tough for regular goons to handle.
 
When a collection run goes bad, Tina faces a choice: She can die, or risk everything on one last job. One to wipe the debts clean and fix her body permanently. But is her freedom worth the price?
 
Fast paced and gritty, The Neon Amazon is the first installment of Once Giants, a new Cyberpunk action series. If you love kick ass heroines, wise cracking mercenaries and political intrigue set against a new global space race, then Once Giants is the series for you!
 CLICK TO START THE NEON AMAZON TODAY!

Title: REINCARNATE INTO NEW WORL WITH CHEAT.
Synopsis:
HI THERE. I AM NORMAL ORDINARY HIGHSCHOOL STUDENT WHO GET HIT BY BUS AND REINCARNATE INTO NEW WORL FROM GODDESS WHO REALLY NICE AND GIVE ME CHEAT IN NEW WORL. I WILL BE GOOD GUY AND BECOME OP AND BEAT BAD DUDES.

Chapter updates will be random and short, this will just be somthing i do when i dont have enough time to do anything else. Hope you cringe! Enjoy.

Title: A Forgotten Specter
Synopsis:
A Forgotten Specter introduces the character of Sgt. Dorian A. Delaney, a Special Operations Assaulter in the Canadian Special Forces through accident and happenstance becomes an interdimensional traveller. Dropped into some ruins in the middle of nowhere with only the gear on his back, a little gallows humour wit and some new abilities, will he survive to see a new day, hunting ghastly beasts, learning magic and humouring himself with geeky puns?  Or tragically fail only to be eaten by the fantastical new world around him? 
Nahralm, a world of might, magic, monsters and Men sometimes impossible to tell one from another. This is the place he finds himself, using his training and survival skills he tries to make his way in the world only to be caught up in a plot will affect the whole of the Atharig continent.

It's my first real attempt at writing a fantasy novel. I'm a tabletop RPG enthusiast, and fantasy novel fan. I wanted to write something to give back to the community of writers and fellow fans of the genre. My style of writing is to make something I'd want to read, and hopefully others will too.

Title: The demon king, The demons, And the sufferers

I rule over the demons, The demons torture the wicked souls
The demons rule over the souls, and torturer them.
The souls rule over suffering, and the hope it brings.
 
I do not like torture, the demons do not like torture, the souls do not like pain.
I am full of pride, because of this citidel the demons have built for me, because the demons torture despite hating torture, because the souls will themselves to be tortured.
This is not a story of hope, of good versus evil, or of redemption
This is a story of the innerworkings of my domain, a story of none desiring torture, either to be, or to deal. This is a story of my life, and the life of a family, of demons, of sufferers, and of a demon king.
-note, this is an extremely dark story, and contains descriptions of gore and other disturbing subjects. viewer discression advised

Title: Continental Wars
Synopsis:
Imagine a fantasy world mixed with the Industrial Revolution (Nevyniu Continent) accidentally pitting themselves against an entire continent that is magically and technologically superior than them by centuries (Gaia Continent). The only thing stopping denizens of the Gaia Continent from overtaking the entire Nevyniu Continent is due to rivalary with other within Gaia.
 (Think Gate JSDF and World Trigger combined, that should roughly describe this novel well.)
- - - - - - -
When the ancient spell that shrouded the Nevyniu Continent from outsiders collapse, military expeditions sailed forward to discover the beyonds. They discover a new continent, the continent called Gaia, and it discovered them.
Turmoil stirs on both lands as the people of Gaia send their mechanical soldiers to harvest Nevyniu's resources and the people of Nevyniu desperately try to fight off the invaders. Enter a powerful, high ranking officer: Mihr Duvan, of the Kravlta Military Police. With internal conflict dividing the recently formed republic, Mihr Duvan was drafted to enter the expedition to Nevyniu only to find out that one of the major factions are planning to abandon him.
With the entire crew's life on the line, Mihr has no choice but to play along and survive in the new continent where he will be thrusted into a new world of danger and politics.

Verden Kyler is a gamemaster of a Game Master in a virutal world called Avant-Garde’s Mirror Sky. For unknown reason, he's been transported to another world that appears to be Avant-Garde’s Mirror Sky, but thirty years have passed and the players who once roam the world are considered distance legends.
Fortunately, Verden gets to keep his powers as a Game Master only unrestricted now. What shall he do?

Two individuals, one born from union between foreigner of a land across icy sea and a women that hails from a fierce nation. The other, a mysterious boy whose background is just as vague. Together, they are the Abyssal Tribulation. An assassin's group that is notorious in the underworld society.
Where the shadow lies, the duo will know all that happens.

Having remained as the least influential god for the past eons, Satan decides to use transform this soul into his champion.

This is a stress-relief fiction, as it gets boring to write only one thing constantly. Updates are 100% random, might be 4 in the same day or nothing for a month. Sorry, but I can't make promises with school around the corner.

Title: A Logical Everyday Fantasy (ALEF)
Synopsis:
A Logical Everyday Fantasy (ALEF)

I was once asked a question by what you could call a guardian of mine though really she was just a friend.
"If you had the chance to start a completely new life, what would that life be like?"
Quite a broad question I thought to myself at the time. A new life? What would that life be like? I answered this after several seconds of thinking:
"A new life to me would be making everything I've ever accomplished obsolete whether that be good or bad. If I were to start a new life, I would wish not for what I wish in this life, but a completely new experience that I've never known in this life. It could be a battlefield, it could be illogical compared to now, it could be tragedy, it could be loneliness, it could be a fufilling life. I would have my new life let me expierence what I never can now. Does that answer your question?"
"eh.. interesting answer, but vague. I would like to expierence a standard fantasy world overpowered protagonist style."
"Oi! You asked me not yourself!"
"Ehh too picky."
"Also that's pretty boring isn't it?"
"Don't crush someone's dreams Shin."
"Then don't say boring things Karen."
We laughed at the time of that question but I never thought that question would be answered seemingly by the universe itself.

ALEF is a story of illogical things being sorted logically in an everyday life of his new life. Sure it might have a beginning and an end, but don't all stories have it?  Don't all lives eventually come to an end?
[So welcome, reader, to a new world.]

Title: Artificial Selection: A Near Future Thought Experiment
Synopsis: Michael Livingstone is a literal intellectual prodigy born at an unfortunate time when artificial intelligence has replaced the human workforce, with the only exceptions of art, humanities, and AI development industries. Trust is deteriorating in society with the increasing frequencies of assaults, deception, and terrorism by and against the globalized national government. Michael always relies on his intellectual talent with space and perception along with some of his dauntless risk-taking spirit to escape danger in this society.  However, Michael soon finds out that this situation involves way more players, variables, and conflicts of interests than he could calculate. This situation is so much more complex than a protest against unemployment, in fact it is a life-and-death matter -- the survival of humanity's civilization.

"Tell me, where in this vast universe does hierarchy not exist? As long as egoistical beings like us triumph anywhere in the world, we will be branded. We will be told our worth by those who have equal worth. As long as they exist, there will be absolute control. There will be the superior and the inferior. Now tell me, can you live in the way things are now? Will you let them exploit everything that you are-- or will you share my name and join me on my quest to change fate itself? "
We are Noir. We in exist in multiple universes, experiencing all of the world's hiearchy-- and ultimately destroying them.

Title: Super Un-Natural RPG
Synopsis:
Hello all, this is my very first attempt at writing, which explains why I am here. I have taken zero writing classes and my grade in english was a steady B. But I have so many ideas swirling around in my head that I thought I would give it a shot, critics are welcome and I hope you all enjoy.
Cole Richardson is the archtype of cliche main characters, but that is where the familiarity of this story ends follow him and a few uniqe characters through his adventure in discovering the underlying truths of this world. LitRPG meets supernatural in this amalgamation of genres. 
If I get positive reviews chapters will be posted regularly if not then you can expect the whole story up when I feel like finishing it.

Title: Dream and Death are Synonyms
Synopsis:
After Nakame Yumeii lost everything he had, including his hopes and dreams, he killed himself by jumping off a building.
His life was supposed to be over, but he realized that he had been reborn in a fantasy world.
Now again, Yumeii is armed with an 'useless ability'. Fearing that history is repeating itself, he tries staying away from trouble.
However, his powers might turn out to be way better than he thought.
Follow the protagonist, as he strives for absolute power, in a power driven world, with an ultimate power.

Title: Noble Paradise
Synopsis:
Noble Paradise An Island In The Middle Of The Ocean
You Can Buy Anything You Want With Favours You Can Gain Those Favours By Playing Games,Betting On Things And If You Get The Dealer's Favour And An Emperor's Favour You Can Get Yourself An Empire With Only Two Favours
Everyone Can Join The Noble Paradise.But If You Don't Return Your Favours You Will Have A Bad Day. 
Welcome To The Noble Paradise

Title: The End is Just a Beginning
Synopsis:
Death. Many have tried to predict what lies ahead, However death is simply a made up concept as one must simply restart. Points are allocated based on decisions made from your previous life accomplishments. 
Sayn, a young boy simply wishes to comfortably relax in life. No working overly  hard, no conflict, simply drift through. Can he achieve this in a new world of fighting and magic? Or will he have to fight for his desire to relax.

Title: Heir To Demons
Synopsis: Damned to be cursed by all in the light, a man can either seek vengeance or peace. He can search for answers or follow desires. The single survivor of those called demons must find his place in life. This is his tale, the Tale of the Heir.

Title: ARIA Online
Synopsis:
L2P, “live to play,” is the tongue-in-cheek tagline of ARIA Online, a new VR-MMORPG that promises to be the most immersive game of all time. Containing an expansive fantasy world said to look "as real as reality itself" and a system where character deaths are permanent and monsters level up alongside the players, ARIA Online is certainly poised to deliver. Short of that goal, it at least has everything it needs to become a living, breathing, and truly high-stakes MMO.
But like all good dreams, this one does not last. Less than a day after the game's launch, ARIA Online’s neural network inexplicably goes rogue and locks its connections down. No longer able to log out, and with their very lives tied to the characters they made, ARIA Online’s players find themselves trapped in a veritable nightmare where they must constantly work to outpace their enemies.
Indeed, they can no longer “live to play.”
In this new iteration of the game, they must “play... to live.

Title: Rae Daes
Synopsis: Countless souls vanished one fateful day for a strange world where the laws of physics turn in implausible ways and fiction becomes reality. Behind these events is the all-powerful Rae Lord Anarak, but are things really as simple as they appear?

Title: How I Destroyed The Main Questline At My New Job
Synopsis:
Spending 30 years of his life leaving behind a trail of disappointment in his wake.
Feeling like nothing more than a shell of who he used to be on the verge of wanting to end it all Alucard desperately grabs hold on what's seemingly his only hope to add color to his bland life.
A tail of transmigration, blood, and destroying anything that gets in his way
Will he become a slave to his bloodlust, will he aid in humanity's down fall, or bring about their salvation?
A world in the face destruction who can you trust your back too?

Title: Magikind [Original]
Synopsis:
The third millennia, a time of change and evolution. An era, where people, through countless generations, have evolved strange powers and abilities.
Through several centuries of selective breeding, these beings, known as mages, have become part of the very foundations of society. However, some refused to change or adapt. They believed in purity and refused to interbreed with magikind. Known as the manush, they were a rarity among society.
Now, in the fifth millennia, the manush are thought extinct. With magikind ruling the world, a three-way war grips society. In these uncertain times, a manush called Gin, will herald a new era for all Magikind.
 
A story of how man could realistically evolve while still pushing boundaries.
 
Disclaimer: Chapters will be edited once the first volume is done. Bear the beginning for the time being, and hopefully you can see my writing improving over time (I've learnt a lot on how to write because of this (though I'm still not perfect :P))
 
Proud Member of Writers to the End, WriTE
 

The link to the pledged fictions
 
PS. If you find the 'notes' too boring or too info-dumpy, feel free to skip them and just read the main chapters. They're there for the reader to understand Gin's world (written in the perspective of Gin). But later on, we can see some interactions between the main characters and the occasional references to his past  in the notes, so it has its purpose.

Title: Living in another world with the summoner system
Synopsis:
I,lance, a crippled cultivator of the Continent of fantasia,Even though I am crippled i can summon beast and thats not all I am from another world,This is my adventure to be the strongest summoner of the fantasia
(LitRPG,Romance,Action, Adventure,Fantasy)

Title: Raider (A VRMMO Novel)
Synopsis:
Matthew is a productive member of society, always showing up to work on time, always paying his bills, he is the picture perfect working man in this modern 22nd century workforce. Everyone who knows him thinks of him fondly as a kind, respectful young man, when the work day is over however something changes… 
Something snaps…
After spending the entire day lying to himself and everyone else he finds himself in the desiccated streets of New Earth Online, a Niche virtual reality reality mass multiplayer game, where he is known simply as the Raider…
The question now is can he reliably juggle his two identities?  There is also the matter of that A.I. that let herself into his head and seems to have confused the word love with obsession…
This should prove interesting...
Author's note: Ok, so here we are, this is my first attempt at writing a Vrmmo novel, we shall see what it holds, updates are on Saturdays and Sundays, you can expect this one to have a lot of the same elements of my other novels, including a harem and sex, very descriptive sex...

Title: Star War
Synopsis: All is peaceful for the jedi at the training temple until something happens and one of the padawans is kidnapped. A team of two jedi masters go to rescue her, but are joined by an unexpected guest. Together, the three of them uncover something fishy going on with the jedi order which promptly makes them fugitives. Being the good natured people that they are, they try to help make things right anyways.

Title: A Fantasy Character in a Wuxia World?
Synopsis:
A young god from a fantasy world accidentally ends up in a wuxia world.
The power of mana he knows so well is useless in this world filled with qi.
 
Or is it?
Watch as he learns the way of the cultivators.
Follow his journey as he seeks strength he needs to protrect himself and the ones he loves.

Title: STAR WARS - The Trout (Fan-Fiction)
Synopsis: A long time ago, In a galaxy far far away... the CLONE WARS continue to rage across the galaxy with the Separatist Forces. Times are dire and hope is waning. Now, MACE WINDU and the Jedi Council face one problem after another against the Droid Army. With hands tied at all fronts, he puts his faith in a certain JINX of the Jedi Order to fight back...

Title: Candor: The Forgotten House
Synopsis:
*** Please read note below ***
As a 16-year-old mage from a powerful family, Jayce Candor had known from a young age what his future would hold. As the fourth son in his family the possibility of him becoming the heir to the household was very small. But, with his talent as a mage, his potential accomplishments in the military could lead to titles of nobility and political power.
However, on what would otherwise be an unremarkable night, everything he had ever known, the only people he ever cared for, and all of the plans for his future were destroyed. House Candor, one of the six great houses that helped build the Eldoran Empire had been erased from history.
By imperial decree, all those bearing the name Candor were hunted down and executed as traitors of the Empire. With no home, no family, and only death waiting for him, Jayce decided to escape north to the uncharted Northern Territories to begin a new life.
Forced into situations he was never prepared for and trying to cope with his past, Jayce tries to find safety in a place spoken about only in legends. There for the first time, he will make true friends and find people he will come to see as family. He will encounter strong enemies, build powerful alliances, and become a person his ancestors would be proud of.
But surrounded by creatures he thought only existed in tales and pressed by the Empire’s constant expansion, Jayce’s safety may be only an illusion. To survive a world fraught with danger Jayce will need to grow stronger with each new experience and rebuild his once forgotten house.
 
**********************************************************************
Note: The story starts slow. Although there is more action as the story progresses, there is a fair amount of introspection and character introduction in the first 30 chapters. Jayce is the main character, however, other characters play a large role and the story is seen through multiple POV's. This is a draft, it is not a finished work. This is not a story that focuses on an OP MC who beats up on weaklings. At times there can be a fair amount of internal monologue. Some of that may be edited out when I rewrite the story. I decided to keep it in the draft because I think it is better to have too much material rather than too little when I edit. Constructive criticism is appreciated as it helps in the editing and rewriting process. 
 
Check out my other story Shattered Mind here

Title: Hell's Dungeon
Synopsis: What happens when we die? Unfortunately no one knows... except for those who die. One lucky soul happened to land on the wheel of fate to transfer to his new role, a dungeon core. Virtually immortal, beacons for life and adventure with the gifts to play god, a dungeon core is one of the most coveted choices for reincarnation. But will our new Dungeon survive its first year? Survive or die, one thing can be assured. There will be Hell to pay.

Title: Way of the World
Synopsis:
In a world of martial arts and magic, where the strong do as they please, a young swordsman seeks revenge for his school's destruction and mentor's death, while trying to stay true to his own values. Arround him, the era shifts as immense powers struggle and scheme for the world's future.
Join our protagonist as he travels through exotic lands, meets strange and funny creatures and learns to remain human amongst the carnage.
Author's note: This is the first story I'm writting in a coherent manner (I have written a lot of DnD background stories in the past), so bear with me if I make boring or overdescriptive bits: I'll regularly come back to rewrite whichever parts feel unpolished, especially grammatical errors. I would also appreciate any corrections or suggestions.

Title: Mad Empress x Incompetent Emperor
Synopsis: Modern Historician Luften Died At The Age Of 36,He Wanted Learn About Human Golden Age That Happened Two Thousand Years Ago And God Started To Tell Him About The Tale Of The Mad Empress And The Incompetent Emperor.

Title: The Fortress That Stood
Synopsis:
"Sit down you noisy rabble." said the elder, quieting the children, "I have a tale to tell"
The children whine to the elder, "But you always tell the same story~"
The elders face wrinkled as he smiled with confidence, "Oh no, this time there's something new. A Tale I heard from a wandering Merchant in fact" he said as he patted his chest
The children looked at the elder suspiciously before sitting down in an orderly manner, the lights of anticipation flickered in their eyes.
The elder grinned at their response. He leaned down, "Now, I shall tell you the tale. The tale, Of The Fortress That Stood"

92 years later a boy and a girl get their power from a nine tailed fox and try to assembly a team to make the biggest country!

Title: VRMMORPG:Arts Cultivation Online
Synopsis: A college student died and was rebirthed 10 years back from his life thus he started his life as a gamer.

Title: Shadow Earth
Synopsis:
Vince was once an inhabitant of earth before he was transferred to the Demonic Realm. Forced to adapt Vince grew by learning several techniques and magic throughout the demonic world. Eventually, he became strong enough to fight the Demon King.
While he was unable to defeat the Demon King, Vince found a way back home. But what greeted him was the opposite of what he had expected.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Not my cover.
