Title: A Fascinating Remembrance
Synopsis:
I, the one who had ended up in the pit of life called death, just realized in one split second moment that I was not an ordinary person at all.
 These might sounds just like a nonsense to you all, but I was certain of it, I was certain about the fact that I was not just some sort of person you could find anywhere in this world.
 It might be a hallucination or delusions from the fear of facing death but I suddenly had this memories of me being a man that came from an age long before I was standing right now.
 That’s right, my name at that time was Xia Yu.
 And I was what you called master of martial arts.
 But I also not your ordinary master of martial arts as I was also guardian of this world, and as I am saying this, there are currently a calamity going on in the world.
 I who had no power given the chance by heaven to train for a thousand year on heavenly realm.
 A legend began.

Title: Destiny Monogatari: The Hidden Object S1
Synopsis:
Season 1.
Before 15 years, In Paradise kingdom which was ruled under the Nobility System. The last member of the Ruling family disappeared in a mysterious incident so the whole country nearly walked into a civil war.
Ganzo and Seel , the two of them were in the royal army and the rule the Families of the East and West respectively, they controlled the country using their influence around the Kingdom. They agreed to continue ruling the Kingdom under the Nobility System which was not to be changed easily.
In this Kingdom in which Magic (Gaibo) is everything, there are 4 main families,
1- The Eastern Family ( Ganzo Family )
2- The Western Family ( Seel Family )  
3- The Northern Family ( Nabako Family )
4- The Southern Family ( Kanti Family )
Each of these families rules their own land and under them there are smaller families that declared their loyalty to the ruler family of the land.
Each Family has a single ruler called the Father. When the father is to be changed for any reason, the name of the family is also changed after the name of the new ruler.
Since the Kingdom relays on Magic (Gaibo) – will be discussed later- each family has their own Magical Techniques and Skills that you will obtain if you have the blood of this family. These Skills are initially unlocked by saying specific words for each Skill.
The public –not noble- are capable of doing the Gaibo Skills but only ordinary skills that worth nothing in wars.
Along the Kingdom, Medical Guilds are scattered. These Guilds are usually used by the noble families that hire them to heal the injured warriors. Noble families also send their daughters to these Guilds to learn The Skills of Healing.

Title: The Demon's Adventure
Synopsis: Allen for whatever reason, felt that life was to easy. So when he was put in another world he decided to live it to the fullest leaving a line of destruction in his wake. Maybe his summoning was a mistake, just maybe.

Title: The Symphire Clan
Synopsis: Seera Symphire is an Everist, this means that she can communicate with nature. However recently the Everists of the Symphire clan are being either captured and sold into slavery or killed in the war. Seera's brother and father died in the war, and her sister was captured and sold. But now even her mother is dead.

Title: The Chronicles of the Rift and Abyss: Genesis of Immortalis
Synopsis:
In the universe, there is a centerpoint for all living things to thrive. A place known as The Abyss. Bianca SilvWorg, a member of the prideful Kalvor tribe have been wrogfully accused for supporting an insurgent group known as The Immortalis. Little did she know, on her execution day, the wheel of fate begins to spin, as she stares into a member of the Immortalis itself.
Will she survive through the coming storm of revolution, or perish like the rest? Join Bianca SilvWorg, the White Wolf, The Harbringer of Revloution and her fire team.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hey guys, the author here, I just wanted to let you know that this is my second series and my current series with Lucarius Trinity, will be continued after this one. I thought it will be better to tell Bianca's story and maybe go into detail about Lucarius Trinity later on. So hope you enjoy!

Title: Queens (The Wielders of Arantha Book Two)
Synopsis:
A cosmic chess game is underway. The planet Elystra is the board.
Earth pilot Maeve and her son Davin have joined the Ixtrayu, hoping to avert the destruction that their leader, Kelia, has foretold. Will Maeve's burgeoning Wielding powers be enough to thwart the machinations of Elzor and his lightning-wielding sister, Elzaria, before all the Ixtrayu have ever known are rent asunder in Elzor's quest for ultimate power?
Queens is Part Two in the three-part Wielders of Arantha series. If you love science-fiction or fantasy, then this series will thrill and enthrall you!

Title: Redemption
Synopsis:
My first attempt at a story as part of a therapy project proposed to me. 
Follows a man who doesn't believe he has a purpose in modern society. After a tragic event, he wakes up to find himself in an odd area with no real explanation. Follow his story as he investigates the events that put him there. 
(I'm trying to figure out the story as I go along any criticism is welcomed.)

Title: Griefer of the Gods
Synopsis:
Nate is a slightly above average young man whose life has just been changed drastically after a chance encounter with a falling star. 
What would you do if you were told that the power you just received caused you to encounter another side of the world that was kept hidden from the masses? 
"Do you accept refunds?"

Title: Glum

Many gaming veterans and hot-blooded youths embarked on a journey to conquer [The Upcoming]'s virtual world. This story follows the journey of Limp who was neither hot-blooded nor a gaming veteran.

Title: Reverse Fantasy online
Synopsis:
*This story will be a side project for me and my friends get back onto my other story so this one is made by me and me only ok also the main character of this story is evil not an anti-hero, there's just no villain tag i guess alright well good luck with reading this story oh and also if you have feedback at least make it somewhat constructive I don't need comments like this story sucks. Alright, my name is Mark I live in the USA. The year is 3015 A very good year in my opinion well that's because I am a gamer, and as a gamer there has been only one thing that I have wanted for my entire life virtual reality.
Just think of everything that can happen, Whole wars raged in the name of evil or good maybe some other things back to the main point. People dropping down from the sky with dragons or out of dropships in mech suits, anything is possible. Even the more boring things like letting people go to school from their homes.
Back to the cool things we could go toe to each other in fighting games, fly high up in space shooting each other with ships.There are millions of possibilities, And now they're coming to light the game that's been in development for years is coming out one of the first of many.
R.F.O Reverse fantasy online. A game that has near infinite possibilities a game that I have been waiting for years now. All I need to do is log in.

Title: Dawn of Antiquity
Synopsis:
The ground breaking virtual reality game "Dawn of Antiquity" and the "Virtual Pod" capsule that is used to play this prevailing game has gained tremendous popularity worldwide since the announcement that it would become available for purchase in one month.
This game is to be set in a world of endless wilderness, except for the one city that all players start from. Players will have the ability to hunt monsters, animals, and even one another to level up in this virtual fantasy world. Every player will also have the ability to settle down on these uninhabited lands to build a small home or a sprawling kingdom.
The game's state of the art AI will be constantly adding new content in the form of monsters, quests, lore and even new lands.This means that Dawn of Antiquity will be an ever growing world with unexplored lands always beyond the next horizon.
This being the first real virtual reality game ever is quite enough to make it popular, but to have a virtual world that continues to always grow has stirred excitement and imaginations of people around the world.  
Nathan Bryant, an avid PC gamer is one of the many excitedly waiting to make the step from PC to VR gaming. There is just one problem on the day the game is finally open to the public Nathan will miss out on the ingame opening ceremony due to a previously scheduled appointment.
This turn of events will leave Nathan with a life changing decision to make. How will he choose to live out his life? Will he continue to live the way he has for the past few years or will he throw caution to the wind for a fresh new start at life?

Title: Tales of Good and Evil
Synopsis:
A middle age man is talked into playing a new virtual reality game by his old friends. Although he, because of his past, dislikes VR he still agrees to join his old pals in this new adventure to experience their youth once again and have fun.
 

This is my first time trying to write a story, I known that im lacking in a lot of things and I hope to learn and better myself through this work.

Title: Start From Zero
Synopsis:
When you read novel with transported or reincarnated to another world story, the MC usually get powerful cheat or two. So, why i am not getting any?! There's no game elements to support me or some goddess to accompany me?! At least tell me how to get to nearest town!!

Author's note :
This is my first time writing story and i'm not an english native speaker. So, if there is error is my grammars please don't be angry. I hope you guys to enjoy the story.
Critique and suggestion always appreciated

Title: Familiar's Chronicles
Synopsis:
Jord was a VR Bug, if he desired he could go to the real world and kill the people that created a sapient AI like him, and made him suffer years of solitude because of being a VR Bug he couldn't really interact with his fellows NPCs. They only repeated the same things to him and with time they couldn't even see Jord anymore. He suffered, he just wanted to have someone to talk and a true place to call home with friends. His obsession was so big that his Core Power adapted itself to help him construct a house, but it came with the price of him forgetting how to use his powers to create something different of furniture or houses.
It changed when a Player came to him and gave meaning to Jord's existence together with his loved hooded cloak and gloves. Jord was only a Core Behemoth Familiar, so he was small and relatively weak. Making the act of a Player talking with him without reporting him to the Game Developers even greater in his mind, although he never asked the Player's name, the Player was his best friend.
But one day the Player stopped coming...
Jord waited for years, but he never saw the Player again...
When he was close to dying, a Grimoire came to him asking if he wanted a contract. And if he accepts he would be able to see the Player again!
Now he has to survive in the world of the Grimoire's master as his Familiar to encounter the Player again. And whilst he needs to create an Empire with the new system of the world!

Title: Blank
Synopsis: Blank

Title: A Room for One
Synopsis: Philip Gere is on his gap year, though unlike his fellow students, his is on a tight budget. Travelling through most of Europe on scraps, he relies on his gut feelings and trusting strangers on where to go and what to see. After a long, uncomfortable car journey through Eastern European countryside thanks to an old man who he couldn't understand, Philip lands outside the doors of the Hotel Otwór late into the evening. He didn't have much of a choice, and soon he would learn he didn't have much of a chance either.

Title: The Fallen
Synopsis:
The Well of Soul is a place out of time and reality. It stores and releases souls from every universe allowing the production of life. Many places in all of the infinite universes collide, these are called convergence points. Heros is one such convergence point. Upon this planet, the mages have conducted expierements upon the convergence points, allowing the Well of Souls to pour it's magics into the world through small cracks called "Veils".
Now, what comes through those veils are creatures of  all shapes, sizes and origins. Ranging from the common undead to mythic beings such as the Phoenix or the Titans. It is at these "Veils" that the mages and their kingdoms take on the creatures and capture them, turning them into slaves and weapons of war. It is here that our main character is born. Here is where the living, the mythic and the creatures of old shall meet "The Fallen"!

Title: Quantum
Synopsis:
Within an unknown world with unknown possibilities lives a young boy. He lives everyday doing the same routine until a disaster occurs. Trapped all alone with access to long-lost knowledge that shouldn't exist, how will the world change when he finally escapes?
 
This story is a slower one and involves the evolution of technology alongside magic and the paranormal. Not all tags and genres show up immediately. A story takes time to tell. Profanity warning checked, though the amount of swearing is very limited.

Title: Happy von Farburgs
Synopsis: There was a little boy named Cherfan,he and his mother lived in a tiny village in the mountains.Their life was going to be great because that little boy was born to be a great person in the military but then gods saw another option,that option gave them six more great humans and all they had to do was to change the road that The Emperor's Brother took to a tiny village in the mountains.

Title: The Stonewall Tournament
Synopsis:
The legend of Arun Stonewall is know all throughout the land of Corpus. Princes, Goblins, Dragons, no one hasn't heard of the legendary Stonewall.
Yet, how did he get this famous? Nobody knows. But at the time of his death, he wrote that his treasure will be passed around only to those who win a very special tournament.
With the very world watching, who will be the one to succeed the legacy of Arun Stonewall? Let the Stonewall Tournament begin!

Title: Strategy's Mistress
Synopsis:
A young seven year old girl enters an academy for strategists where only one in a thousand students has a shot at becoming a rank ten strategist! The path to the top is hard, hellish and unforgiving. Blood will flow like rivers, she will have to walk over heads and she will have to prove time and time again that she is the wisest, the smarters, the most brutal, the most decisive, the most sly and the cruelest. Even though the odds are low, she must persist and grasp her one chance. If not for herself then she has to do it for her late parents.

Confronted by the prospect of almost unlimited longevity and a ridiculously high level of power, he roamed and drifted in the infinite universe almost unimpeded, gazing at the cosmic marvels, gathering riches and growing even more powerful.

Title: The End
Synopsis:
In an apocalyptic world, scientists work feverishly to come up with ways to stop the ever-increasing death tolls. In the middle of it all, a secret project runs tests that shouldn't even be possible. But then again, things aren't the same when you know the truth.
Don't look back. If you do, you will be caught or you will die. Do not look back. Your very life depends on it. If you look back, the fire will burn your bones. You will die. If you do somehow manage to survive...let's just say you won't like what comes next.

Title: Mind Over Matter: Intellectual Evolution
Synopsis:
Four friends take to the forest in a panic. When Stephen finally had enough of his father's abuse he struck back once and for all. With a quick stab of a knife, the weapon found its way into his father's skull. After realizing what he did he acted quick to make sure there was no evidence. He called his best friends to come and help. Upon arrival the friends panic but still help him and they grab some garbage bags and shovels and head into the woods behind Stephen's house. This story follows Stephen and his friends starting here.
I wrote this after watching chronicle, and i wasn't happy with the ending. I'm generally not happy when they kill off my favorite characters. So I wrote something kind of similar but I get to control the plot and not make it suck. Enjoy.
Warning: Gore, Torture, Sex Scenes. Possibly romance tag later, but not sure for now. 
I can't figure out if what I'm writing is fantasy or sci-fi. I'm pretty sure Telekenetic Abilities count as sci-fi, but I'm not sure. Someone clarify that for me. Too much negativity will cause me to finish the story but not post it. Just to give me a sick satisfaction.
P.S.: I don't own the image. I'm currently drawing one.

Title: The Hive Lord
Synopsis:
Timothy Allens, a simple twenty one year old graduate of a three year college course and a man looking forward to the rest of his life. At least, until the first bus to his new job crashed, leaving only the weight of metal on top him and the feeling of his now blood-dampened shirt the last things he feels before falling unconcious.
When he wakes up in a forest, not knowing at all where he is, the threat of dying alone, in pain and fear force him to survive, and his tenacity demands that he thrive. He could not thrive alone of course, but that's where his new friends come in, cooperating in a grand display of  true symbiosis.

Title: Wave Fighters (LitRPG)
Synopsis:
Didier Shaw goes to sleep in his bed as usual - drunk and alone.
When he wakes up, he's not drunk, and he's not alone.
He finds himself in an oval stone prison, where's he's told that he is a wave fighter. It is a world that looks like a video game, where he is rewarded with skills and experience points for killing things. And he's going to have to do a lot of that, because unless he can survive wave after wave of monsters, he will never be given a pass home.
He and his fellow wave fighters must improve their powers and level up their base if they're to become powerful enough weave fighters to leave this new world.

Synopsis:
Going to university. Being dumped. Eating with my only friend. Living one day after another.
 
It's was supposed to be any ordinary boring day.
 
Then everything turned upside down.
 
Adventure. Meeting. Learning. Blooming. Rupture. Breaking. A wish. Desire. Bond. 
 
This my story, a slice of my life.

Title: Blood Circle Grandmaster
Synopsis:
Disclaimer: This is my first attempt at an actual novel thus don't expect me to be experienced in such worldly affairs.
In the world of Bethall where war, conflict, chaos, and strife run rampant
In the world of Bethall where treasures, miracles, beauties, and blessings gives salvation
In the world of Bethall where the strong rules and the weak obeys
in an unassuming small village, a legend is about to brew, with the catalyst being a child cursed without the ability to cultivate the energy of the nature through normal means yet being accepted and loved by the friends and family around him.
Outwardly he seems to be content with his life, yet inside his heart his ambition for greatness continues to fester ever so stronger every...single...second.
His name is Aaron Bernice "The Exalted"
Ever growing ambition for greatness, yet unable to achieve it, do the gods obtain entertainment from taunting lesser mortals? Breaking the shackles of fate, he refuses to be anything less than the gods themselves.
Because the weak have their own way of destroying the strong
Warning:Don't expect consistent releases unless i stop procrastinating due to some reasons, Also i don't own the cover art...i merely looked it up on google and thought it was nice so i used it.

Title: Lemme Smash! (Rewriting As A Separate Story)
Synopsis:
*DISCLAIMER*
This whole story is a joke, telling the story of our MC Hammer. Also, no events or characters are references. Actually, there might be a few. This is purely original. Maybe. Romance is also a joke. Along with all the tags, except reincarnation.
My sense of humor is really bad.

Our MC is a not so good guy.
Lusting for his sister, watching tentacle porn, throwing tissues with strange substances around his room, etcetera.
But, that all ends today. Today, he will leave this life. Start anew. Lose his virginity.
Unluckily for him, he leaves this life for real. Forever.
Starting anew in a fantasy world. A life of action, adventure, and eveerything shounen.
Reincarnating as a hammer. With the only thing he can't do, is being able to 'smash'.
Pretty ironic, considering one of the only things a hammer can do is smash.
Who am I? Well, I am the author of this wonderful hammer.
Don't mind me. I'm totally not an important character or anythi-"Goddamnit! Why can't I just come up with a good prologue?! I just... I just want a good prologue. Haaaah..... Well, this is the best I'm going to get. Might as well add the tags and content warnings now, before I change my mind."
'What the hell happened to him this time?'

Title: That Which Watch
Synopsis:
The world ended, no one remembers how exactly. This 'new' realm lives in the scraps of the old, likely greater world. There are no machines of war ravaging country sides anymore. No old men playing politics. Few people remain, and no one cares. The old world burned in its flames, and only the ashes remain. Yet it still has its guardians, even if they are rusted statues are all they remain. Yet people still live their lives in general ignorance of what was. This is just a small part of that.
 
I do not own the artwork used for the cover, I am simply using it until I acquire something else.

Title: Eons
Synopsis:
An exile prince creates his own power from a settlement that was created by his mother.
Creating the strongest settlement and reigning supreme in this world was his mothers last wish for him.

Title: Private Investigator John Ford and the Cult of the Magic Book
Synopsis:
Internet novelist Dandre Marshall could have never imagined that his roommate in London would be an eccentric private investigator named John Ford nor could he have ever foreseen that an investigation of the murder of a couple would result in a lethal confrontation with a cult of fanatics and their summoning to a magical world of kings, warlords, sorcerers and pirates. Will Dandre and John survive long enough in that new magical world to find out the secrets of the cult and a way to get back home?

I do not own the cover art, all rights reserved to the owner.
There will be at least one update every week, though from time to time I may update more often.

Title: Layers of Hell
Synopsis:
The forces of the underworld have been plotting to rise to the surface world and make it the 1000th layer of Hell. To combat this, Grim faces impossible odds in a world where death is the only way to progress. He gathers his allies, acquires powerful magic and weapons, and finally confronts the final boss Lilith. After many grueling battles, he at last emerges victorious.
As for his player, he is the first to beat the Layers of Hell, the most expansive game known. As a special offer, he is given the chance at a New Game+, promising exciting new content. What could go wrong?

Title: Winter Sovereign
Synopsis:
Serra Recquir, a boy born in the world of Sierra, was born with weak and with mediocre talent. Despite the odds, he pursued the path of cultivation. He faced numerous trials, deadly foes and great friends. Eventually, he stepped into the world of the Divine Realm. Breaking past the limits of the world and traveling to higher planes. After millions of years, he finally reached the summit. Becoming a Sovereign Paragon. Longing for the world he left countless years ago, he finally returns to his own world.
Author's Note: This story is different from other wuxia novels. If those novels focus on characters that struggle from the bottom and reach the top, this story is one where someone already reached the top. I figured it would be interesting to start a novel from this concept so I started it. Well, however this plays through, just like how I finished my previous novel, Doll's Smile, I'll finish this novel too. Of course, I'm writing this novel just for fun. I like to write lighthearted novels like this. Novels that I would read while listening to music and eating snacks on a pleasant and relaxing afternoon. Do forgive me if I'm slow in writing.

Title: Tris The Tinker
Synopsis:
One night. One item. One last heist.
After searching the world for clues and ingedients, Tris is one item away from crafting the Veil's most powerful artifact: an Infinity Potion. Good thing she knows just where to find one.
The annual Flower Festival is coming up, and the guards protecting the Crystals will be celebrating as well. All she has to do is go to the festival, make some small talk, then slip away to grab the Crystal. Easy, right?
When Tris's plan goes awry and a forgotten evil attacks the Festival, Tris must choose: the ultimate prize, or the lives of those around her.
Tris the Tinker is a LitRPG short story set in the same Veilwalkers universe as Lost Archive. You can read more about Tris and friends in that book, which is on Amazon now. I hope you will enjoy!

Title: 24 The Conspiracy
Synopsis:
In a few hours there will be an attempt to assassinate the president candidate. Jack Bauer and his unit must prevent it before it's too late, but soon Jack finds out that something bigger is going on and that the people who he really trust might be not who they seem to be.
A very suspense story with a lot of twist and shocking moments that always has something going on.
A day in Jack Bauer's life while he is trying to stop one of the biggest threat that America have known. With Chloe O'brian, Tony Almeida, David palmer and a lot of new characters that I have created.

Title: "Fight!"
Synopsis:
Ylo feels the stir inside him.  This is it.  The battle he's been training for since the day his life was shattered.  He has prepared as best he can, spent ages upon ages searching, studying, practicing, and mastering his mystic craft.  Until this moment he was sure he would be successful.  But now, as he stands at the edge of the circle, and he sees the figure he must face, so familiar, and yet, so strange, his confidence begins to wane.  Will he have what it takes to overcome his darkest demons?
Join him as he wields the awesome power of his Voices in duels to the death against a series of ever more powerful foes, and listen as he reminisces about the path that led him here.

He who experienced different kinds of happiness and suffering.

After millions of years.
Through the work of fate, a magic came from his original world summoned him back.
What kind of thing will happen?
If a GOD who escape from the world that tried to kill him goes back to get his revenge.

Title: Evolution System+Customisation System=Stronger System? Maybe not though...
Synopsis:
Synopsis- Dying due to what seemed to be an unavoidable drunken punch, Connor Connolly a 24-year-old man from England who is a little different when compared to the "normal public" keeps those differences along with a few additions when his soul transmigrates into a fantasy world of numerous opportunities compared to the mundane life of the earth where boredom was rife. His only asset? His mind and most importantly his imagination which he must maintain with practical knowledge from his previous life! Will his previous life's fascination with gathering what seemed to be random wildlife knowledge assist this hope for survival in the upcoming trials he faces that are beyond his imagination or make his situation worse because his past life knowledge is not always best in the world he has found himself a part of... All he has to go on are the words of the God who he heard from when he arrived in this crazy world and said "blessings" rewarded to him by this God.
[Stupid human, I do not have time for your mortal questions, so I will give you the basic rules” of my planet. They are “evolve to improve oneself for yourself” and for you a unique ability that can be likened to your so-called concept of “customization” to further adapt oneself to the environment and for you to use your so-called “advantage of being reborn with your past life experience and knowledge”. Beware though, the strength you gain will balance itself out when compared to the aboriginals for the system I have created over my lifetime is perfection embodied]
This is less brief in the actual prologue by the way as it also serves the purpose of giving you an idea of the world that Connor has been thrown into... :P
Schedule: 2-3 Chapters a week, however, there could be more chapters released on some occasions.

Title: Black Magic Hero
Synopsis:
After waking up far too early on a Sunday morning, Harold Lisbe begins the adventure of a lifetime! Summoned to another world in preparation for the rebirth of the Demon Lord, Harold is mandated to risk life and limb against the encroaching darkness. However, before our hero can begin his quest, he finds himself thrown in prison simply for being able to use Black Magic! Guided by the Goddesses of Light and Darkness, Harold must escape the castle dungeon and begin his quest to save the world of Asalbatarius!
 
Warning, contains ample male crossdressing, light bondage, and other suggestive content.

none of them are real, at least until a giant meteor hit, But that all happened in the past.

there was once a man, the last one, in fact. no longer did any humans exist, apart from this one, single man. the other beings found there to be no choice but to force him to impregnate one of the many frozen human eggs, whether he wants to or not.

Synopsis: Basically, Grant Chambers was summoned to another world with a system called the Skyrim System... there done, description over, where's my paycheck!?

Title: A NEET's Happiness
Synopsis:
What is happiness? For some it's the little things, for others only big events can truly make them happy.
People go their ways but some chose to not move along with the crowd. When all look down upon the one with the hidden strength, what could make them happy? Hidden secrets, lies covering the truth yet everything seems so obvious. Will she find happiness? Which place will be for her the one she will call a home? And what will her future look like?
A disgrace is sometimes better of being a failure.

Title: Greatest God Li Ma
Synopsis: What is important in this world? Fame? Money? Power? It all comes down to strength. It is the golden rule of this world. If you have it, you will eventually gain those three. The once strongest Clan in the region became a normal Clan. Trying their best to climb back to the peak, they needed someone to lean on, and that someone astonishingly became a God.Objective: I've been reading three novels now. It's all wuxia or xianxia. Waiting for the updates is killing me, so I decided to try creating one to see how hard it is. PS: I still don't know how to describe things that great. So if you'll excuse me.Genre: Adventure, Comedy, Cultivation, Magic, Romance, Martial-arts.Updates: I'm not sure yet, if some people are interested, I'm gonna update it as soon as I can.

Title: The Fall of The Gods
Synopsis:
Synopsis:
In the year 1966, an army of Orishas led by Sango stormed Amadioha’s palace and razed it the ground, starting a decades-long war between two of Nigeria’s most powerful divine orders. Blinded by the rage of battle, the gods did not detect the rise of a third power, far greater and deadlier than anything they could have imagined. When gods, on both the Yoruba and Igbo sides, begin falling mysteriously to their death, Sango seeks the help of Odion, a Lagos teenager destined to rise from his dark past to become a hero. But can a human hero save the gods from a doomed fate?

The Fall of the Gods is an action-packed YA fantasy based on the mythical bond that ties human life with the realm of the divine. It demonstrates the power of stories to change our lives. It also reminds us that Sango and Amadioha are not relics of the past and that, sometimes, what it means to be a hero in today’s world is knowing how to find inspiration in the stories of the gods.
PLEASE NOTE: Weekly chapters will be released every friday along with interludes once in a while about Nigerian mythology. I'm a young 17 year old writer and I am new to the site so I will appreciate your comments and reviews. Thank you very much.

Title: Tales of Taralensia - The Lost Son
Synopsis:
In the world of Taralensia, the shining city of Avenholme floats above the sea. The bird-winged race of Aven live peacefully but the turmoil of one family threatens to tear Avenholme apart. Roy Engelbrecht has the wings of a Peacock, born into a family of Eagles. Unable to become a success in the Skyguard, too impatient to become a Scholar and banned from becoming a Bard he makes a stupid, brash decision.
 Become a hero, or die trying.
 Unskilled, untrained and unprepared, he sets out into the world he is not ready to face. Soar through the world of Taralensia, with unique races, fascinating characters, and a colorful (and often deadly) landscape. Discover what it means to be a family and that it truly is to be a hero.

Title: Letters: Naruto's Rebirth and Redemption
Synopsis:
Naruto Alternative Universe! It all started with a letter. His conviction, his sufferings, and his journey. Naruto knew he have a lot of enemy, yet it doesn't phase him. He would face them head on, stabbing them at the back at the process. Using his wits, cunning, and charm, he would pave his way with their blood. Unravelling the secrets of his blood along the way. 
F?in!Kenjutsu!Naruto.
Cover art is The Heat of Illusion by amorphisss.deviantart.com on @DeviantArt
I do not own Naruto or any characters written inside the story.

Title: Soul Master
Synopsis: Ray was enrolled in a Soul User academy of Ardia when the city got destroyed by Reas. This forces Ray to make a new journey, far from his home in order to protect people he loves, find out about the origin of Rea and train to try to become the greatest Soul User in the world.

Title: Adventure Quest: Guardians of The Night Sky
Synopsis:
A mysterious disaster strikes, and a young Dove (an angelic being) ends up falling to earth. Upon awakening, he observed that he lost most of his powers and unable to return home...! Now, he must Walk the Earth with some friends, helping those in need and trying to find out what exactly happened,
...and if there's any way for him to get back home.
Join Audely and his friends solve the mystery they're in. How will they able to defeat such powerfull enemies? Will the meet a happy or sad ending?

Title: Birth
Synopsis: My attempt at a shorts story after reading about how Sun Wukong was given life. Short story, oneshot

Title: Laws Raine
Synopsis:
During a time when humans no longer exist, but instead replaced by fractions of sub species we follow a group in their time of era to find themselves. 
The story is set in a world where pure humans don’t exist.
“Humans” are now categorised into 5 ex-species.
Subhuman, Herbivore, Omnivore, Carnivore, Obligate Carnivore.
We follow a young gathering of Subhumans about to embark on their practical to decided what roles they play in their society — but what they didn't expect was their results.
Carl, the abandoned bastard son of a noble has other ideas... Not being as talented as his best friend Azekah and surely not as skilled as their leader Tyle; he spots an opportunity to trump them and prove himself as the one and only best Crafter — but how far is he willing to go? Could he even forsake his friends and trample on them, all for the good of his own social position?
With Master Crafters being the most sought after position in the Sub-human species — since they create everything from skyscrapers, to furniture and even weapons; just by being a high ranking crafter can bestow a life of luxury.  
How will these young protectors come to terms with their careers, will they be able to adapt? Or will they cave in? Their lives are only just beginning, but could the Laws of the lands as well as Carl have other ideas for them?
This is Laws Raine!

Title: Legend of Chase Marcus
Synopsis:
Judgement Day came unexpectedly. Billions of humans were slaughtered by demons, and their race was brought to the brink of extinction. Struggle after struggle, Chase Marcus honed his strength with a single-minded focus. Eventually, he succeeded in killing the Ruler of the Seventh Realm.
On the verge of death, a mysterious individual came and granted him the privilege to live his life once more, on the time before the demons invaded the Mortal Realm.

Title: King of the Mountain
Synopsis:
Normal over 30 science teacher is "abducted" and tested by the GREAT GAME as a beta trial inductee. The GREAT GAME will eventually be implemented and remake the world.  Our protagonist however is the only one that actually passes the beta test, which was not designed to be survivable, through sheer dumb luck and thus has an extreme head start on all other citizens of Earth.  Follow the journey of our hero as he tries to walk a thin line between preparing to save as much of his family and friends as possible while also trying to make sure that he will have enough power to make other people do most of the work while remaining safe and sound.
Poor guy is just a proto-hermit who wants to be left alone but also realizes the importance of others and family.  The new reality just complicates things.

Title: This World of Pure Imagination
Synopsis:
Watch as our hero treks this wonderful world known as "Imagination". Through lands of candy, forests of the Jurassic period, and lakes of fire; in this world, anything you can imagine can exist. Well, a hero if he can survive this crazy world anyways. You'd be surprised how scary a T-Rex can be when you meet it face to face. Oh yeah, did I mention magic and swords? Let's see if our upcoming hero can keep his sanity in this crazy world!
Note: This is an amateur work. This is my first story and this book is for practice. This does not mean I will not finish this book or that I am not serious about it though. This story has been on my mind for a while now, but it just hasn't been fleshed out enough in my opinion. This work will be what I use to try and hone my writing skills and I would love it if you could give me input to help me improve.
My Self Reflection (My weaknesses I think I might have):
-POV switching
-Organization
-Comedy might be forced. I try to put my own style of humor into it, but it might not fit that well. I'm sort of an eccentric person and I want to make my characters to be like that because in a world of imagination I think it fits.

Title: Dream Dungeon
Synopsis:
Welcome to the dream dungeon. Ely suddenly finds himself in a mysterious dungeon accessed only through sleeping. Many people are drawn into this dream world, confused and mystified. Those in this dungeon must kill monsters to survive; maybe even each other.
Join Ely as he struggles to survive a ruthless environment. What replaces his rest is untold trauma. What seems like an innocent game trope turns into a nightmare.
This is a story of tragedy and the path to ultimate power. All in the hopes of an uncertain survival.
_________
 
This fiction has NOT been abandoned. I made a haughty promise earlier to not worry because I'll continue this series, and with things lately, I've only proved myself a liar. Further promises dwindled, and I've lost trust. So many things have been going on recently that I've been booked. I will refrain from making any future guarantees or promises as my busy schedule will stay with me for a long long while. Time for me to actually spend on writing and revising won't appear until at the least November 19. I won't say expect that's when I'll restart, but you can expect expecting it to maybe happen.
That's really shallow. But with everything going on, I've let my small reading base down. I apologize. I still stick by my statement though that I won't abandon this project. I plan to stick it to the end, no matter the delay. Most importantly, thank you everyone; readers who both like and dislike my work. I appreciate your time spent on my dumb imagination. Stay toasty my readers in this winter season. Cheers.
 
UPDATE: We're back on track. Thank you for your patience. Any future readers, heyo! Glad you're here.
UPDATE 2: So far it's been 21 days since I last uploaded a chapter. The best thing done for any fiction, no matter how good it is, is that it continues, and I have a bad history with that. 1 fiction on hiatus and already more delays with less than 20 chapters in this fiction. I've been very preoccupied with adding more things to do in my life rather than actually committing to any particular thing. That applies primarily to this.
I cannot abandon this, as busy as my future looks and will look as I get busier and busier. Someday, I hope, I will be able to sit down and just write. just. write.
But for now, I ask for patience. I suppose I'm glad this fiction hasn't picked up so that I don't disappoint too many people if any really. But I need to commit and it's going to happen sometime and sometime soon. 
No more flowery words. I'll see you later.
UPDATE 3: It's very evident I won't be able to pick up this story for a while. With AP Testing, competitions, and other things I am busier than ever.
But I must complete this fiction. I have too.
Until next time.
UPDATE 4: It is now the summer. I owe everyone an apology. Chances are, nobody's around to see this, and that is okay. I only blame myself for this sort of brokenness of a fiction, not that it is actually that bad but I am just exaggerating it for dramatic effect.But what's not exaggerated is the severity of my broken promise. I apologize for my naive claims about finishing a novel that I couldn't finish and that I didn't have the discipline to finish. Nor the skills, really, I was and am still an immature writer.What is to place now? I want to make it clear I understand this is my fault. I will man up to this. And I will accept any criticism. I understand I messed up. Reading Stephen King's On Writing made it clear to me that I need to do two things:Read lots.And write lots.I have done neither. If I don't have the time to read often, how do I expect to write? I need to become more experienced. I need to become a serious writer.So if I want to dream of continuing, I need to at least fulfill both requirements. I enjoy writing. I haven't written seriously outside of school in a while. I planned to write this summer and finish this. I made a lot of promises that I didn't keep.So there's that. I won't enact any self-pity, or be foolishly obsessed. What I did was wrong, and I must deal with it. I let down readers. And I apologize.I hope I can find forgiveness. This is a writer's sin.I won't promise I'll finish this. I intend to finish this, at some point, because writing is fun and I want to write. But how things are don't reflect that. Maybe I'll finish this at some point. Maybe I won't. I won't be naive to make that promise.I thank everyone who has read this if this is the end. If not, and hopefully not, I thank everyone who is to read future chapters. I thank everyone who allowed me to live in the miniscule little dream of mine as I passed my days. I thank everyone who cares enough to read this.
Until next time, peace everyone. Thank you. You are all great readers and great people. I wish everyone the best in whatever reading/writing endeavors follow you henceforth.

Title: The Envoy From the Heavens
Synopsis:
You have always heard about the main characters in Xianxia and Xuanhuan going against the Heavens. Surviving against all that Fate and Heaven throws at them, the main characters always reign supreme. Facing such blasphemous behaviors from countless cultivators, the Heavens decided to send down an envoy from their realm to suppress those arrogant cultivators.
(This is somewhat Xuanhuan)
- - - - - -
“To cultivate is to go against the Heavens! No matter how righteous they place themselves, they are nothing more than savage beasts who fear death!”
Those were the words Long Tian’s father always told him. Whether they call themselves Devil Practitioner or not, they are not to be trusted. The hunt for power and immortality exposes the greedy nature of all living creatures.
Long Tian now lives alone after the death of his father makes a living hunting for the village. But fate was cruel and Long Tian died at the hands of a young noble over an unreasonable excuse.
However, the Heavens had plans for Long Tian.
Turmoil from the Heaven’s Realm has caused leakage of Heavenly Qi into the lower realms allowing cultivators to challenge their fate.
Tasked with suppressing those cultivators, Long Tian travelled through countless worlds to cease their defilement!

Title: K.A.I.S.E.R.
Synopsis:
Synopsis
Total War, Civilisation, Crusader Kings and every other Grand strategy game in existence, gives the player the role of a ruler. They learn quickly that they should not give a shit about their people’s wellbeing unless it somehow directly inconveniences the player with rebellions, unrest, lowered productivity and so on.
The player also learns that the only country that matters in the entire world is their country,  that a successful war is the most wanted commodity,  that being a power hungry maniac that is out to conquer the world and making people worship “My Big Dick” is a fun hobby to do for several hours straight,  that fearing Gandhi is a very justified thing to do.  They learn that backstabbing their allies in the back at the perfect opportunity is a must for any seasoned player.
Especially in Crusader Kings do self-centred sociopathic goals pop up, like “How can I as quickly as possible get rid of my drooling first born child so that my second born genius can become my heir?” or “Who else can I seduce so that I can expand my family so that I can construct additional trade posts?”
This type of character with these self-centred ambitions and self-centred goals that treats everyone else as a tool, obstacle or with indifference is what I like to call the mentality of a Crusader Kings Player.
That is a very rare mentality for a main character in literature. A mentality that wants to actively gain power, construct cities, countries, empires, go to war. This is a type of character who does not react, but acts.
And that mentality is what our main character is the incarnation of.
 
Spoiler
If you want to know in more specifics about when and where this story takes place, click the spoiler tag below.

Spoiler: Spoiler


The Empire of Earth has finally solidified as the major power in this quadrant of the galaxy. The year 4000 is just around the corner and the project codenamed K.A.I.S.E.R. personally overseen by the emperor himself is finally almost complete. K.A.I.S.E.R. will change everything.



Sentimental author stuff
This is a story I have been thinking about for over 7 months before I finally decided I should write it down. It was a way to entertain myself and a way to escape to a different universe doing some very difficult times.  This is also a story, I want to write due to the lack of main characters fitting the description of a Crusader Kings Player. (Though Overlord and Warlock of the Magus World are examples of major exceptions)
Please remember, this is my very first story and as such I will make quite a lot of mistakes but I will improve. Usually, I am not satisfied with a chapter after I have written it, but I know the only way to improve is to keep writing.
 
Upload schedule thingy
I don’t plan on uploading anything more until I have written the entire prologue as a way to test my dedication to this project, in fact I wouldn’t have made anything public, if it wasn’t a requirement to actually use RoyalRoadl.

Title: The Augmentor
Synopsis:
The world has always been focused on the best. The smartest, best looking, most athletic, the greatest Heroes. To others, Seth had never even come close to any of those descriptions. Labeled as an unpowered at birth, he strived to become something more, someone even the Powered could look up to. Of course, even with his determination, over time, the seeds of doubt inside him grew. He grew depressed, praying, hoping for another way... and fate delivered.
When walking home from school on a Friday night, Seth encounters a shadow with inhuman proportions and features who attacks him. Seth struggles with all the strength he can muster, only to find himself dead after fighting the creature off. After he dies, he meets a man who awakens his powers in exchange for the possession of his body. Seth accepts, and that is where the story begins...

Title: Becoming The Wolfman
Synopsis:
Hello everyone. I’m an avid reader but I’ve never tried writing my own novel to be published. So I’m going for it on Royal Road and let's see what happens.
 
Prologue
 
My story begins while working as a Security Officer. I’m Bill501 aka the Wolfman as I have about 15 different Wolf tattoos. Not that you would know it since I have to cover them all for work. I’m sitting at my desk waiting for lunchtime and greeting all the employees in the building as they walk by. All the sudden I have a splitting headache and I’m trying not to show it because I don’t have sick time and I don’t want to go home sick and lose money.
 
Suddenly a screen comes up but it just looks like floating text. It says Welcome to the System. Hell I read at least 5 novels a week that start that way so I’m like hell yeah so worth the headache. I’m over here saying status and character screen and anything else I can think of to bring up my stats and it doesn’t do shit…. 
 
15 minutes later I get a message that says loading…..

Title: The Demonic Servant
Synopsis:
When I first regained 'consciousness', I was but a broken being, my memories were mostly missing, and I was starving.
As time passed, I survived by feeding on the souls of the deceased in this desolate hell, where only the dead live. And unfortunately, these dead are not the kind of dead that stays dead. Instead, they're mindless souls of all shapes, sizes and power whom roam this cursed home of mine.
Name? I carry the names of millions upon millions of souls. Bob, Jerry, Askaram, Sara... 
Race? I devoured the souls of dragons, humans, devils and sentient rocks. 
As I lived... no, perhaps existed is a better world, I absorbed the memories, experiences, forbidden knowledge and devilish arts of many, many damned souls. After all, who could ever roam this forsaken land but the damned?
Now, for the first time in eons, I am finally granted a sliver of hope. 
To escape this hell, I am willing to serve anyone. The question is, will they accept my servitude?

Title: CHANGE IS INEVITABLE
Synopsis:
Dellam Naris one of the most talented mages and alchemists in generations has just discovered a new way to combine these fields. Leading him on a path toward unimaginable power. The only real obstacles are his colleagues and superiors within West Crescent’s mage's association. Having viewed his work as pointless at best and in some cases blasphemous at worst. They shunned him for diverging so drastically from the traditional teachings of magic and alchemy which have been systematized for millennia.
 This all changes however when news of his exploits begin to spread and the academic authority of the association is called into question. He has been healing diseases thought to be incurable by anything but divine intervention, altering wildelife and plants and some say he has even been dabbling in soul magic. A field of study outlawed nearly 400 years ago when it was brought to this world by a demi lich who broke into the world of Ahura and created a necropolis on the central continent. It took the combined might of 12 nations and the emergency summoning of entities from other worlds to stop the damn thing.
If these claims hold true then he may have stumbled on to secrets the association cannot afford to lose control of and the association may be forced to enact a punishment far worse than death.

Synopsis:

Yìzhì Xiaolóng is a young and promising cultivator
Unfortunately for him, he was send to the battlefield as cannon fodder, surviving with sheer will and luck battle after battle. Until he arrives to the most awkward battlefield in weeks since the beginning of the war, the two sons of the most powerful person in each sect face to face, an unavoidable battle happens.
After a long battle with the two heirs about to kill each other, the heads of the clans unable to bear with this interfere with the battle saving theirs sons but starting the final battle earlier than expected.
Yìzhì at the verge of collapse could only see everyone running for their lives, pushing him to the ground and afterwards being trampled to half-dead, thinking that the last moments he would see was the glorious battle of powerhouses, he didn’t felt any other regret than not being one of those powerhouses.
!!! Watch our protagonist take on the [Dragon ball] Universe with the most cliché reason there is ¡¡¡[Is in Hiatus… So that will be after I rewrite it…]

Title: The Lumberjack In The Parliament
Synopsis:
In this world people were divided by classes, not nobles and peasants type of class and yeah that was a thing too but classes like king, hero, healer, farmer, reporter and such. 
His Mother was a Noble Senator and His Father was a simple lumberjack as a result he gained both of their classes

Title: Dungeon of Trees and Thunder
Synopsis:
Benjamin, A half elf alchemist died and a dungeon was born. In an attempt to reach the peak of alchemy he refined smithed together crystals from the 7 elements. The heavens rebelled against his attempt and struck him down with tribulation lightning. Sparked by the lightning the refining backfired and his mortal body was destroyed. Forged by tribulation lightning a dungeon crystal was born and to gain sentience it sucked his soul inside.
On an isolated peninsula the new dungeon must grow stronger for the trials to come for every dungeon is a highly contested resource, especially out here away from the civilized lands. 
The novel will follow the dungeon as it grows and the adventurers as they use it striving to grow stronger.
*Any comments are welcome as I want this to become a sucessful story. I am posting this now to try and give me more of a drive to work on the story.*

Title: Eternal
Synopsis:
History always repeats itself.The moment I learned to talk, my father taught me to be a gentle and noble person.He put me on the path of the knight, and followed through each path of my life."*%&#* remember to follow the code of conduct of a noble person, save the weak and annhilate the evil."I followed through his teaching all the way until.
Until The moment I saw her.
It was that day, that I became everything my father hated. And my fate got sealed in stone.
And as I closed my eyes for eternity after 30years, I saw the wheels of fate move again. "History will repeat itself, and you can't stop it."

Title: RULES OF DARIUS
Synopsis: this is my story,the story of darius athene and the struggles i face to live in this distorted and fundemeantly challenged world.In 2025 a serious of nuclear test were carried out by the U.S and russia for they were at the brink of war.The U.N tried their best to maintain peace between the 2 nations but it was all for naught.The U.N main strength is the U.S and if they have reached the conclusion that  there is no diplomatic solution then the world is truly fucked and so it began.In 2026 the tension between the 2 nations reached an all time high.Everyone knew it was only a couple more days before the unthinkable happened.So everyone started preparing bunkers to save themselves.There was nothing i could do while watching all of this on the news.That is when i realised how insignificant i am.I am mearly a spec of dirt in this vast world.At that night i went to sleep not  knowing what will happen in a couple of hours.To be precise i went to sleep not being able to comprehend any of the things happening around me and so it began.....

Title: The Isolated Mage
Synopsis:
Blake Smith was on his dream adventure to see the North Pole. As He approched however, fate had other things in store for the arctic adventurer. Suddenly a voice inside his head is telling him that the human race is going to another world, a world with monsters and magic, only, it didn't go quite as planned for him.
 
This is my first book here on RRL so the writing style may change from time to time, but I hope you enjoy the story.

Title: Pokemon: Successors of The Forgotten
Synopsis:
Pokemon battling had been banned and the League was shut down until two years ago. Now with the league’s revival, many new trainers are now flocking to the gyms with dreams of becoming the new Pokemon Champion.
A group of young promising trainers receive an invitation from a wealthy friend of the family. This rich woman offers a great reward and in return, she asks for a simple task be done. What could this woman, who has everything, need from a band of young trainers?

First and foremost, this story is based on a Pokemon Tabletop Adventure (PTA) campaign. The campaign was the longest running PTA game that I am aware of, lasting roughly five years until the death of the development for the system.
While the story is based on the events that occurred during the game, I am taking artistic license for the purposes of turning it into a clear narrative. However, I will try to stick source material as closely as possible since this entire endeavor is to preserve and share the memories of the good times had during the campaign.
Cover art was Drawn by Yumebom:
https://yumebom.deviantart.com/

Title: The Help Doctor Harvian
Synopsis:
He used to work as a chief doctor in the Royal Hospital but he had enough of only helping upper middle classes and nobles,he was going to help the poor by opening a secret hospital but this hospital wasn't only going to be for medical care it was going to cover anything that a human needed and he was a kid of a rich noble he had the money for it and so he opened his secret hospital. 
But he had his intentions as well...

Title: The Cat and The Girl
Synopsis: Nineteen-year old Roseabelle lived on her own for the past two years, had a surprise visit from someone she briefly met when she was younger. Now that she is older, he came to repay the visit. After the time they slowly fell for each other.

Title: Evolutionist
Synopsis:
One day the earth changed, the continents united once more forming the Pangea. The changes did not stop there, three new continents of the size of Pangea appeared in the ocean, if the planet is large enough to fit all the new continents, or the planet has grown is still a mystery to be solved.
Monsters began to appear throughout the continent, the state of the new continents is still a mystery. Different types of monsters began to appear in different regions.
In this era of change and adaptation, heroes and villains have appeared. The old civil, military and social order was destroyed and a new world order appeared. The fort wins. What fits survives. and the weak are dominated.
Magic and superpowers ceased to be fictitious stories and became reality. Monsters, demons, and dragons are no longer just imagination and come true.
The world has become a non-respawn type game. The law is to keep yourself strong to survive and survive to became strong.The life of the Terrans has become a game. Literally, with status, attributes, resistances, levels and abilities and everything a game is entitled to.

The cover image is not my own. I copied it from the internet. I thought it was cool and it suited the story. All rights reserved for the owner of the image.

Title: Race of Culdovia
Synopsis:
Currently more of a blurb but as the story goes it will grow.
 
Culdovia is populated by many races and monsters. Some you may know such as the petite Halfling, accident prone Human, self absorbed Elf, and even the intellectual Half-Orc. Some you may not know, such as the eerily beautiful Dragonkiln or the hell raising Rak'lith.
This is a story of an odd group of adventures and their crazy race to reach the summit of Culdovia and to earn a place in the Hall of Godly Legends.

Title: The S.W.A.T member transported to another world
Synopsis:
Ezequiel was new Swat member in New York. A brave Canadian man dedicated to eliminating the crime in the city. He was also a good shooter and skilled fighter. Despite his abilities he still was single. His friends were always making fun of him because he was new to the department and all his dates ended badly. However, that wasn't a real problem, since all of them were focused on the mission and were covering each other's backs. At the end of the day, they still were good friends.
What was unknown for Ezequiel was that on the night of Valentine's Day, everything was going to change for him. He never imagined that he would take part in an adventure in which all his skills, his training and his mind would be tested to their limits. And first and foremost his abilities to escape and survive. How would his adventure end? Would he be able to live happily ever after, or would he meet an untimely end?
Warning: This novel is categorised as R+18 due to the sex scenes, blood, fights, swearing and more.
Genre: Male lead, anti-hero, a bit of LitRPG, fantasy, romance and summoned hero, monster girls.
Schedule: If  I can I will add one to two chapters every week. If I can't keep with that you will receive an announcement.
Remember this isn't real.

Title: The Cage
Synopsis:
Mighty abominations and their more powerful gods dance between the galaxies in eternal migration, exploring, experimenting and playing. They leave destruction in their wake, heedless of the suffering of the sapients they slaughter, alter or drive to extinction as they toy with entire star systems for passing amusement. These monsters are called mankind.
They are finally betrayed and defeated, but they cannot be killed. They are diminished and stripped of all memory of what they were, locked in a bottle reality on a false world called Earth.
For thousands of years, mingled shards of their Broken Gods continue to chance across the cage that holds the species of their birth. The shards merge with suitable hosts to create empowered archetypes who awaken to supernatural Gifts and fractured dreams of a lost history. The greatest among them are magnificent heroes and villains: The Vigilante. The Mastermind. The Assassin. The Polymath.
This is the story of their inferiors: The Beggar. The Homewrecker. The Gambler. The Henchman. The Miser. The Monster. Together, they will attempt to save the world, free humankind and escape the Cage. This will probably end really badly.
 
*Cover art taken from internet source of free-use, uncopyrighted photos and images.

Title: Tales of the Aspects
Synopsis:
This is where I am setting down short stories based on the world of my main story, The Cage.
In brief, the world of The Cage is one where humans were once cosmic, reality-bending abominations who plagued the universe. Like many Lovecraftian horrors, the afflictions they caused were usually purely incidental. They simply did not notice the suffering of lesser creatures.
Eventually, they were somehow defeated, stripped of memory, and locked into a false Earth in a false reality.
Pieces of their Broken Gods, once the most powerful among them, sometimes find the prison reality and merge with suitable human hosts. Archetypes with unusual powers are created, based on the qualities or flaws of the Gods from which the shards were made. Primary Aspects include names like the Vigilante, the Polymath, the Murderer and the Mastermind.
The main story has the Beggar, the Homewrecker, the Henchman, the Gambler, the Miser and the Monster as its protagonists.
The short stories here will feature characters that I imagined and wanted to write, but would not fit into the main story. Big names like the Cuckold, the Neglected Wife and the Addict will find a place here. Most of these tales will not be happy.
I hope someone finds some small enjoyment in my extremely humble scribblings. Thanks to any readers who give this a chance.

Title: Rebirth of the Phoenix

*The cover art isn't mine.

Title: Angry Eagle
Synopsis: Chazeka Wabli, nicknamed Rage, has a uniquely colored eagle crash into his chest after Chazeka receives a prophecy from his deceased grandmother.  The following day, Chazeka is sold into apprenticeship to a traveling Ironsmith.  Years later, a fight in a market place has Chazeka forcibly enlisted into the Overlord’s Guard.  Assigned to an undercover mission, Chazeka changes his name to Ista. When the group departs its base, Ista notices a strange tattoo on the wizard’s wrist as the wizard portals them to the mission’s starting location.  The wizard’s duplicity forces Ista to survive against Ogres, savage beasts, bandits and thieves.  During this harrowing time; he also learns about love and living; falling in love with his group leader, 350 years his senior. Mission completed, Chazeka reclaims his name, loses his love and starts on a completely unexpected path.  Yet it was foretold by his grandmother.

Title: White; and the colors you showed me.
Synopsis: White was all Chance Lyons had ever known. White tainted everything he ever touched: It was his color. That is, until he met Owen Keller, the boy determined to show Chance what it's like to live again.

Title: Out of Place
Synopsis:
Magic exists and those who wield it are called mages, but many years ago these mages were branded as heretics and instead were labled, "witches". Today, these "witches" number less then a thousand and are being hunted to neigh extinction. In order to prolong their demise and strike back against their foes the mages had to get creative and so they did. In their desperation they created something they didn't understand and used it in a way that only brought death and destruction. They created the beings known as "Nephilim". Nephilim are mages that were created artificially using the DNA of two powerful mages, combined with the essence of a "Soul Stone". Soulstones are a magic crystalline structure that houses corrupt spirits.
The Nephilim were all women for reasons unknown and when they hit the battlefield they brang nought, but death. Even with their new weapons, the mages were still a dying breed and with less and less mages each day, they grew even more desperate and depraved. They expieremented more and more on the Nephilim, etching magical glyphs and runes directly onto their skin, making them even more powerful. But, what the mages had not realized was that their creations were angry, but were fine with the mages hurting the older, battle hardened maidens. It was when the mages came for the young, was when the Nephilim turned.
You see the mages could only breed 3 nephilim at once in about 3 months time, but the children still took time to grow to fighting shape. They matured faster and had better growth rates,but they still required nurture and care. The mages left the care and training of the children to the other Nephilim. When the mages grew depraved enough to target the children, the Nephilim fought back. The story will follow the Nephilim Ellie, her daughter, Sarah and Cal Owens, a mage whom helped them escape. It will follow them as they come upon a portal to a new and better world. What is a monster created to kill and destroy suppose to do in a world of "peace"?

Title: Rocket in Wonderland Lost in the Multiverse
Synopsis:
When Rocket gets lost in the Multiverse, he found himself in an alien planet scavenging for spare parts he could use to repair his ship. He was guided by a smiling cat, who called himself Cheshire, along the mysterious world and Rocket intended to keep their relationship casual. However there was something about the feline that drew Rocket close to him and as he stayed longer, he discovered that there was something else going on inside the planet and its beings.
Being Rocket, he couldn't care less about the planet or the cat until the mysteries were slowly hinting that he and Cheshire might have a shared past.
 
DISCLAIMER: I do not own Marvel or any of its characters. This is merely a fanfiction and I do not intend to make profit out of it.

Title: Life is Boring.
Synopsis:
-Synopsis-
Rintaro Tanaka was your normal teenage student. He had good friends, good grades, and he was happy. That all changed though, two weeks before his ninth grade year had ended. Rintaro would lose those dear to him, and become a loner. Leaving his life in 'ruin', as he stayed inside. The entire summer break, he didn't exit his room for anything apart from grabbing something quickly, and showering. His mother tried to convince him to go back to school, hoping that everything would be better. After many, and many tries, his mother managed to convince him to go back. Though, he wouldn't do anything more than go. What will happen to Rentaro Tanaka, as he goes back to school, in his High School Year?

It is a story about two ordinary college students with their own, small circumstances, and love which blossoms between the two of them.
